title: Great Experience and Exceptional Hospitality
text:
Our stay was highlighted by exceptional decor, outstanding service, and remarkable hospitality. Paulina at the front desk exemplified this by gifting us with the unique room items and dog treats we inquired about, showcasing their above-and-beyond approach to guest satisfaction.

Thank you

title: An urban sanctuary!
text: I stayed here with my family for a weekend, and it was hard to leave!  I travel a lot for work and leisure, and finding a hotel with service, comfort, location, etc. is hard to find. This hotel covered it all and more. From the moment we pulled up to valet, we were welcomed with a warm smile and felt taken care of immediately. Breakfast was delicious, with fast and friendly service each morning. The rooms were comfortable, with beautiful views of the park and city, and I loved sitting on the little nook overlooking the busy streets. I loved the foam roller and steamer in the room- something you don't normally see in hotels, and are useful items to have! I'm currently writing this from another hotel, and it just does not live up to my experience at 1Hotel Central Park. Thanks for setting the bar high and spoiling us - we can't wait to come back!

title: Great staff - always make me feel welcome!
text: The hotel has a good price point and is clean and comfortable, although the staff are what makes it special.  Maryam has taken the time and effort to get to know me and was very helpful with finding the best room options for my family - as we typically travel with teenagers and need specific layouts and locations.  Thank you again! The front desk and bell staff are also amazing and are always there to lend a hand or provide assistance - Chester, Josea, Shane, Anderson, Gee, and Lorenzo (driver) go above and beyond to personalize the experience.  We find ourselves going back to the hotel often and the staff are a major part of that decision.  Looking forward to our next stay.

title: Don’t waste your time or money - Not 5 star
text: Ugh. So disappointing. Not a 5 star experience or anything like the level of service you get at other 1 Hotel locations. Doorman don’t pay attention; the Front Desk doesn’t deliver on commitments made; rooms aren’t made up until 5pm; when housekeeping is arranged, they don’t show up at the agreed upon time; the Park view is NOT a park view right now due to construction work on the building opposite; and you can’t see the room service breakfast menu the day before or order breakfast in bed until 7am. I could go on… Management doesn’t appear to care either - we wrote to them to voice our disappointment and received a “sorry, we hope to welcome you back soon” email. Do not waste your time or money here - The Conrad a few blocks away has much bigger rooms for less money with a true Park view and the service is excellent.

title: Genuine hospitality
text: Very friendly and accommodating staff.  My room was well appointed with extras you don't usually have in a room-steamer, yoga mat, etc.  I liked the "one less thing" where you could leave an unwanted item of clothing and they would donate it.  Talking to staff I learned many things about sustainability--they have a 5 min shower timer you can use if you want to try and conserve water.  Great location.  Staff were genuine and helpful with questions.  Jams restaurant food was very good and served quickly.

title: Go To Spot in Midtown
text: 1 Hotel combines a perfect NYC location with meticulously maintained rooms and attentive service. Our 2nd visit was as good or better than the first. Quiet, park view room was a welcome respite from the rush of Manhattan. 1 Hotel is our go to Midtown place to stay.

title: Fantastic Stay!
text: My friend and I had an amazing stay at the 1 Hotel Central Park! The location is amazing, rooms were spacious and super comfortable, and the food was also great. Huge shout out to G who works at the hotel, he made us feel welcomed from the moment we arrived. Cannot wait to come back hopefully soon :)

title: A Sanctuary in the City: My Exceptional Stay at 1 Hotel Central Park
text:
1 Hotel Central Park was a serene sanctuary amidst the hustle of New York City. From arrival, the concierge Michael stood out with his meticulous attention to detail, expertly handling my event bookings and reservations. Receptionists Chris and Jhané were the epitome of hospitality, making me feel incredibly valued with their personalized service.

The hotel's commitment to sustainability shone through its green, plant-filled aesthetics, offering a refreshing urban oasis. The eco-conscious yet luxurious rooms provided a comfortable, guilt-free stay.

A highlight was the weekend brunch, impressively catering to all, including vegan and gluten-free options, much to my friend's delight. Waking up to the beautiful Central Park sunrise was a daily dose of tranquility.

Overall, 1 Hotel Central Park is more than just a stay; it's an enriching experience blending luxury, sustainability, and top-notch service. Thanks to the whole team, especially Michael, Chris, and Jhané, for making my visit unforgettable. I’m eagerly awaiting my next visit to this unique retreat.

title: Excellent customer service
text: The gentleman named G, who managed the front door, was attentive and very friendly! My colleagues and I stay at one hotel Central Park, every time we visit NYC for business. The hotel is well kept, friendly staff and most importantly, puts sustainability at the forefront of everything that they do. Thank you always.

title: Treat Yourself to a Slice of Paradise
text: EVERYTHING and EVERYONE at 1 Hotel Cental Park was perfection!  We had the loveliest accommodations. The bed was beyond comfortable and the room was appointed with fresh greenery-felt like we were in Costa Rica!! All the people that worked at the hotel were so warm and friendly. ABSOLUTELY the most accommodating staff we have ever encountered!! THANK YOU 1 Hotel Central Park!!

title: New York business trip
text: Ji at the reception was very kind and helpful. All the facilities in the hotel was nice and the position was really nice, close to Central Park and in the very center of the midtown. We appreciated much the Gym and restaurant for breakfast too.

title: Great experience!
text: We had a wonderful experience at this hotel. The rooms were nice and beds very comfortable. It was a good location as well. G took great care of us - helping us with our bags, answering our questions,  and getting us to the airport safely and on time!

title: Awesome
text:
I had the best time during my stay at The One. Anderson was so helpful during my check-out process and made sure I made it to my car with ease. 

The rooms were clean and ordering  room service was a samples process. Would highly recommend their pancakes.  

I will definitely be back!

title: Great hotel.
text:
Great hotel. And G at the front desk is a legend. Excellent service and great location for mid town business and Central Park and fifth avenue shopping. 

Everything works. Can’t quite believe that Tripadvisor demand 200 characters before an opinion counts.

title: Green and romantic
text:
Just had the most amazing time at 1 Hotel Central Park for a romantic weekend with my partner, and I’m still buzzing about it! Seriously, from the minute we walked in, we felt like VIPs with the warm welcome and hospitality.

The vibe of the hotel was so chill and cozy, with that awesome green and natural decor that just sets the mood perfectly. Oh, and don’t even get me started on our room—it had this killer view of Central Park that blew us away.

The staff there? Total rockstars. They bent over backwards to make sure every little detail was spot on, from check-in to awesome recommendations from the concierge.

And let’s talk about Jams—that restaurant was a game-changer. We couldn’t get enough of the delicious food!

Overall, our time there was pure magic. We left feeling closer than ever and already plotting our next trip back. Seriously, if you’re looking to up the romance factor on your getaway, you gotta check out 1 Hotel Central Park. Trust me, you won’t regret it!

title: Unique experience
text: Heading to New York with my kids had me a bit on edge at first, but shoutout to the awesome team at The 1 Hotel! it was way smoother than I expected. The concierge hooked us up big time, recommending all sorts of cool family-friendly spots and even setting us up with a nighttime nanny so we could hit the town hassle-free. And get this, they sent up kid-friendly goodies to our room, which was such a sweet gesture. But what blew me away was how they knew my kids' names at the front desk and even the bellman! It really made us feel like we belonged in the big city. Huge props to them for making our New York trip super memorable and totally stress-free for the whole fam.

title: Home away from home!
text: During our extended weekend getaway to celebrate my husband's birthday and our kids' inaugural visit to New York City, we were warmly greeted with delightful amenities in our room. My daughters were delighted by the personalized "Welcome to New York" treats, while my husband and I were pleasantly surprised by a lovely bottle of Prosecco, a thoughtful gesture to commemorate his special day. The exceptional service further enhanced our experience, and we found ourselves enamored with the charming green decor throughout the hotel. Without a doubt, it has quickly become our preferred home away from home whenever we visit New York City.

title: Love the earthy vibes and closeness to Central Park!
text: This hotel brought nature in, even to the doors of the rooms, it was sooo cute and well thought out. Being an earth sign myself, I felt right at home and it was so nice having some nature vibes in the hectic city. They had so much attention to detail which I very much appreciated. My room was a bqsic room but still wonderful and felt very special.

title: A  welcoming and relaxed hotel, with even better staff.
text: While the look and feel of the hotel are relaxed & welcoming, the staff really stands out. Marlon the hotel manager specifically was truly amazing. He made our stay (family of 4) so easy, from recommendations to hotel amenities. Use of the hotel car made going places a breeze. The concierge helped us find and make dinner reservations in a sea of options. Will stay there again, and will ask for Marlon by name.

title: Better than home!
text: Great hospitality all around! Came on a business trip with a group. Staff was able to identify our needs and make accommodations. Meeting spaces were great. Love the vibe and the aesthetic. The location is perfect for a short stay or a longer trip into the city. Rockstars!

title: They are the best here!
text: The whole team was so helpful and kind! Would recommend this hotel to anyone coming to New York! Everything was clean and the staff made sure our stay was exceptional. Their meeting spaces were so cool and the food was absolutely fantastic!!

title: Amazing Stay!
text:
We decided to check out the 1 Hotel Central Park in NYC, and are so glad we stayed. It was fantastic! From the moment you walk in, you feel like you're in a cozy oasis right in the middle of the city jungle. The blend of modern luxury and eco-friendly design creates an inviting space where you can't help but feel at home.
The rooms are like little havens of comfort and style, with everything you need to relax and unwind after a day of exploring the city. The proximity to Central Park is perfect, and the attention to detail in every aspect of the room, from the organic linens to the sustainable amenities, is truly impressive.
But what really sets the 1 Hotel Central Park apart is the people. The staff here are incredibly friendly and approachable, always ready with a smile and eager to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Particularly, at the front desk. Austin, Josue, Joshua and Janae were absolutely stellar. Whether you need recommendations for the best local spots or just want to chat about your daily experiences, they're there for you with genuine warmth and hospitality. They were like having friends in the city, and it makes all the difference in the world.
Another stand-out that makes the hotel incredible is their restaurant, Jams. The food was absolutely fantastic. Only to be outdone by the service. Ediliana, our server, had such detailed knowledge of the food and made great recommendations.
There are several choices when it comes to picking a hotel in this neighborhood and I can tell you, I have stayed at some great places, but this has been the best one yet. Definitely not to be missed.

title: Can we normalize negative stars?
text:
Even if it's just negative 1 star to make a point.  

Bottom line up front: we transparently told management we intended to leave a negative review and we were offered a credit for one night. We posted the negative review and were subsequently contacted by management and told they'd refund our whole stay if we took the review down. When I asked the manager why the full refund wasn't offered during the original conversation, she told me she didn't believe we'd post it. Very interesting technique, 1 Hotel.

We stayed at this property over Christmas and are still actively telling everyone we know visiting the area to avoid this place (and yesterday was Valentine's day).
We were victims of the bait and switch you can see in other reviews where we book and paid for a higher tier king bed room, but instead got a view that isn't as advertised, a queen bed, and no heat. When conversing with the front desk about the issue, we were told at first we were wrong, there was no way it was a queen bed, only for the manager to later confirm it was (management-probably need to coach your front line, this seems to be a recurring issue for your guests).

We were offered another room on floor three next to the loud appliances that no one ever wants... that's exactly how it was pitched to us, "sorry we gave you a lesser room, but the only other one we can give you is even worse and no one ever wants it." Classy.

After we finally got settled into a third room that magically became available later, the manager tried to deploy service recovery techniques with us and connected us with the concierge that was supposed to help us rebook a show we missed due to the check in disaster, but the concierge never called us back. He'd called us to confirm the price point we had, so he knew how to reach us...

As I spoke with the manager about our dissatisfaction and points of contention (all of which are not listed in this review), she verbalized to me that they are not what you would consider traditional high end/luxury. I had shared my very positive experiences with her that we had at The Pierre, Mandarin Oriental, The Trump, The Conrad, Lotte, and Loews, and she basically admitted they aren't up to those standards. But yet, they are happy to charge a nightly price that would lead one to believe they rival the other properties.

If you want a place that will give you the room you pay for, have a team that will honor their commitments, not have to listen to the room service crew complain about management, know what you're going to get when you order room service, have a helpful hand at the entrance when your hands are full of luggage, get help hailing a taxi if needed, have heat or air conditioning, and not have to audit your folio for incorrect charges (yeah.. the 'one night credit' they offered was originally applied backwards and they instead were charging us even more for the horrendous experience)..... even the management agrees that 1 Hotel is not the place for you.

title: 10/10 would recommend
text: Attention to detail and service was amazing, the concierge is extremely helpful and thoughtful, and provides amazing recommendations. Anderson was extremely helpful in coordinating the retrieval of my luggage and airport transportation

title: Great Experience, I will be back!
text: The place is beautiful very welcoming. Drinks were really good I got a “Side Cart”. I loved the green in the distance to the park & 5th ave. The staff is great especially Anderson he showed amazing customer service & has a bright personality. He was a true pleasure!

title: Luxury and Eco-consciousness in the Heart of NY
text: This hotel is an incredible oasis in the middle of New York City! We stayed here over a long weekend and loved everything about 1 Hotel! The staff was so friendly and helpful! The hotel restaurant was delicious and healthy. And we loved the plants and wood everywhere. It felt like the future of hotels! The rooms themselves are much more spacious than most NY hotels and they are beautifully appointed - nice robes, cozy and soft bedding, and totally spotless. The little touches were what will make us come back - a yoga mat and foam roller in the closet (!), filtered water so you can drink out of the tap, extra bedding if you need it and one of the best hotel gyms we've seen. For families traveling and staying in the same room, the bathroom walls are glass, but there is a curtain you can use - just something to be aware of. We will definitely be returning!

title: Best in NYC
text: Clean and comfortable room (studio king), great bathroom, and great added security feature for hotel elevator. Room service delivered asap and house keeping is excellent. Chris at the front desk is super helpful and amazing - he went above and beyond to help me with check out and scheduling a taxi to JFK. I would stay at this location again because of Chris and the hotel accommodations and will definitely stay at another 1 Hotel location because of how great my experience was at the Central Park location.

title: An absolute gem in a perfect location!
text: Couldn’t be happier with our stay here for a quick weekend getaway to nyc.  Perfect location for everything we wanted to do, very manageable size hotel made coming & going easy.  Room are spacious & the bed was comfortable!  Bathroom was a good size & shower water pressure & temperature perfect!  Joshua at the front desk did an excellent job checking us in early on a Friday & explaining all the amenities the hotel has to offer.  We used the hotel car service to drive us to dinner Friday night & the driver was friendly & made us comfortable during our ride.  We will definitely stay here again next time!

title: Great visit
text: This place is amazing, the staff is very nice and accommodating. The hotel is beautiful, modern and cozy. The area is very safe and it’s the perfect location to explore NY, various places and subway stations at walking distance. The restaurant is delicious and has great drinks! Will definitely stay here again!

title: Highly recommended/amazing staff
text: Highly recommend! I just left NYC after 18 years so returning to a hotel in a place that still feels like home is weird. 1 Hotel went above and beyond. The space and rooms are beautifully designed, sleek and clean. The real stars of the show were the staff. I travel a lot for business and their team truly stood out. I am currently a nursing mother who was on a business trip and Joshua at the front desk went above and beyond to make sure my room was ready when I arrived so I could pump after a long commute, he even received a replacement pump (mine broke 2 days in) from target delivery and had it brought up to my room while I was out. Another woman at the front desk was also amazing (I didn’t get her name unfortunately) as well as the valets, housekeeping and room service staff. Will definitely be going back. I’ve also stayed at the West Hollywood and Brooklyn locations a few times, also great but what a team at the Central Park location. I hope you all see this review, thank you for making a very stressful trip easier for this new mom!

title: Weekend Birthday Getaway
text: Wouldn’t even consider another hotel. Down to earth staff with a general positive vibe throughout the hotel. Clean, smells amazing, easy to communicate via the app or text. These little details are very much appreciated. Beds are a little hard but I will overlook that any day in favor of clean, beautiful rooms. Delivered a little treat to the room for my birthday. Sadly, little things like this are a thing of the past at most hotels now a days and to receive such a surprise is very, very much appreciated. All around amazing experience! Love the 1 Hotel! We are going to Hanalei Bay in February and can’t wait to visit another 1 Hotel property. Thank you!

title: Amazing Stay!
text: Cleaned room daily and fresh apples were available each morning right as you stepped off the elevator. Received  amazing service by all of the  employees at the front desk and door. Nobody hesitated to assist with questions and always greeted me with a friendly hello.

title: Must stay asap
text: 1 Hotel Central Park in NYC exceeded my expectations with its impeccably clean rooms. The staff provided exceptional service, creating a memorable and comfortable stay. A perfect blend of luxury and hospitality.

title: Must stay!
text: 1st time & we will be back! I LOVE the 1 hotel brand. Great service from the moment you arrive to the moment you check out. The location is great for anyone traveling for pleasure but also for business.

title: Home away from home!
text: I was so pleased with my stay at 1 Hotel Central Park. They think of every detail from the moment they greet you at the door when you arrive to they incredibly chic and sustainable rooms. The support staff are positive and take care of your every need. I can't wait to stay here again on my next trip to NYC.

title: Exceptional experience
text: Our experience was exceptional. The staff was welcoming and exceedingly helpful in every way from the front door to the room. The bed was comfortable and the room was completely soundproof even on the street side. My daughter enjoyed the window seat most of all. The bathroom was spacious and well appointed. The lighting and air controls allowed us to adjust to our liking. Absolutely wonderful stay.

title: Hands down best hotel in the city
text: I recently stayed at th 1Hotel Central Park and was blown away by the service and establishment. The rooms were so clean and the most comfortable bed I have stayed in. The staff was amazing especially the front desk and concierge. This was my first time in New York in the winter and they helped me with all my accommodations and made amazing restaurant reservations for me. I can’t wait to go back to and stay at the 1Hotel in the spring and enjoy that amazing view of the park!

title: Memorable stay at 1 Hotel Central Park
text: I had an exceptional experience at 1 Hotel Central Park. The staff's attentiveness truly stood out, making my stay enjoyable and memorable. The hotel's prime location added to the convenience, offering a great blend of comfort and accessibility. Highly recommend for a delightful stay in the heart of NYC.

title: Best Overall Hotel in NYC when considering staff, cleanliness, location and price.
text: My wife and I were in NYC for medical appointments and a Billy Joel concert for our birthdays.  From the minute we arrived at 1 Hotel CP the team was amazing.  Professional and kind are the best words to describe the team. Josh at the front desk, Shane at the door, all helpful, considerate and charming.  Arriving in our room we were met with a surprise bottle of prosecco for our birthdays.  The room was super clean and well appointed.  The location is perfect as well, we love being close the Central Park and its a quick trip to the Garden for a concert or Upper West to jazz. (We went to Smoke Jazz).  We spend time in NYC and 1 Hotel CP will be our new home away from home.  I share my comments with the hotel once we were home and without two hours I received a personal response from Paulina.  The communication of the team is unmatched.  Thank you 1 Hotel CP team.

title: Great to come back)
text:
Great value for money. Nice and helpful staff. 
Perfect location: walking distance to all main museums and CP. Eco design is very cozy, nice sofa right near the window to watch the city. And the hotel signature aroma - it’s adorable.

title: Muy recomendable
text:
Me gustó mucho el hotel, no conocíamos esta cadena y nos sorprendió mucho. El trato del personal fue lo mejor, siempre muy atentos y pendientes de lo que necesitáramos. Además es pet friendly, nuestro perrito estuvo feliz y consentido. 
Las instalaciones están muy bien, y nuestro cuarto tenía una vista muy bonita. 
La ubicación es perfecta, a unos pasos de central park, la 5ta avenida, y muchas estaciones de Metro y autobús para llegar a Soho y el upper side más rapido que en Uber.

title: When trash meets luxury prices
text:
Save your money !!! And your energy.  Book somewhere else .  We stay at luxury hotels for a living this is trash . 

-wanna be luxury hotel. 

- rooms are small

-under staffed 

-30% higher prices then most in the area 

- communication is nil . 

- you will be promised the stars and get a cheese platter. 
After being downgraded . Waiting 4 hours for check in . They knocked off 25% of the bill hahaha still 5% higher then a way better hotel in the area 

- if you are okay with a grand a night to feel like holiday Inn this is the place for you ! 3 room changes all had big issues like no heat.
I sat by the door for 2 hours letting heat in from the hallway . They came to fix it promised they would call in 20 minutes with an update. Never did . They also had no idea how to fix it . I had to help . I even have photos . 

- now they wanna make our stay better by trying to get tickets thru the concierge.  I'm like okay maybe it's not a dump. Nope I it is . Brian called asked the details promised to call back never did . Never heard anything about it again . 

-I listened to staff outside our room complaining worse then me about the hotel and management.  

Paulina tried to make things better but she has zero pull . This is not unique to 1 hotel central park I have done south beach . The Brooklyn one . It's all the same . They buy in expensive areas make you think they are great then you just deal with hotel staff. We spent just under 5 hours of our 36hrs dealing with there issues. 

Better places to stay 
Loews Regency 
The Conrad 
Lottee
Trump

Honestly anywhere but here . Save your money!!!!!! If I could have done zero stars I would have . I have 25 more places to leave a review for this hotel I'm going to do everything I can to make sure someone else's trip is not ruined. We own a bunch of businesses if my customers were even half as sad as we were I would have comped anything I could .  

The icing is they want you to come back after you tell them non stop how bad of a experience it was . 

Save your money!!!!!! Honestly the money is just that . Don't waste 10% of your whole stay trying to deal with over worked staff that can't do anything.

title: Vendem e não cumprem
text: Estou hospedado no hotel vindo passar o natal, comprei no Brasil um hotel caro com café da manhã incluído porém isso não existe nesse hotel! Tem oferecem 40 ud$ por quarto como crédito de café! Absurdo pelo valor cobrado, não indico!

title: Love 1Hotel Central Park!
text: I’ve stayed at 1Hotel Central Park for both business and personal trips this month. I very highly recommend the property. The staff are attentive and friendly, the lobby and rooms are amazing!  Their attention to detail is evident in every aspect of the hotel. All very impressive!

title: What an amazing hotel! From the service to the location, it was a perfect holiday.
text:
The service at the 1 hotel is some of the best I’ve ever experienced. We were very lucky to be in contact with the concierge, Michael, who helped us with everything when navigating New York. He was extremely helpful and kind, especially when it came to my birthday, as he helped my family surprise me with my girlfriend. Also, G was incredibly accommodating and lovely to talk to, organising our luggage and giving us a place to sit while we wait for our transport. 

The location was so good and the design of the hotel was beautiful, as they incorporated natural elements and a homey atmosphere.

This is the best hotel I’ve ever been to!

title: Great staff
text:
Wonderful experience all around. 
All of the staff is kind, polite and helpful. 
Look for Gi at the door to help with your bags and don’t hesitate to reach out for anything as they will do everything to accommodate.

title: Wonderful stay
text:
We spent 4 nights at 1 Hotel. Beautiful Hotel with an emphasis on sustainability.
Amazing greenery throughout the Hotel. Wonderful attention to detail.
Friendly staff who always greeted you with a smile. We sleep with a fan on at night and they quickly accommodated our request for one in our room.
We came to see the Macy's Parade and had the perfect view.

title: NYC Go-To
text: As context, multi-decade traveller who these days usually stays at 4/5-star hotels.  Whether for business or pleasure, when in NYC this refined yet unpretentious hotel is my go-to.  The location, facilities, decor and staff are all great.  Special shout out to Anastasia at the front desk.

title: First Class Service
text:
I recently stayed at 1 Hotel Central Park while in town for business.  On my last night, I had a medical issue and Paul (manager on duty) and Emerson (front desk) were outstanding with provided me with first class assistance until my situation resolved.  They made me feel comfortable and knew exactly how to help.  My stay was already perfect, but the interaction with the staff at the hotel confirmed its status as a 5 star hotel. 

Thank you Paul and Emerson for such wonderful service!

title: Thanksgiving Day Magic!
text: We traveled as a family of 3 with another family to NYC to celebrate Thanksgiving and 1 Hotel Central Park was the perfect location.  Our main priority was getting to view the famous Macy's Thanksgiving Day parade.  The route passes directly in front of 1 Hotel but the logistics of getting a good spot can be tricky due to NYPD security and limited access to certain areas. Maryam with 1 Hotels secured 6 tickets for our party to stand and view the parade from a perfect location.  SO magical!  Throughout our stay we felt like 1 Hotel staff was very attentive to all of our needs.  The lobby and Jams restaurant were cozy and inviting.  Proximity to Central Park and shopping (Bergdorf, 5th Avenue, etc.) was perfect as well.  Would definitely recommend 1 Hotel Central Park for your NYC stay!

title: Planned a "stay-cation" in the city with my wife and dog. I love that they are dog friendly. We had a great time.
text: Great hotel, love the brand. The staff were excellent, the room was clean (with a killer view) and the hotel is located in a great location off Central Park. We will certainly stay here again if given the opportunity.

title: Multi generation thanksgiving family trip
text: The staff was incredibly friendly and extremely helpful! We brought along four generations and the bellmen were particularly kind and attentive to my father's needs. This hotel may be smaller in size, but that just means you have the opportunity to get to know everyone during your stay, if you choose too  Oh, and let me tell you, the hotel and restaurant have such a delightful atmosphere and vibe!

title: A great place to stay
text:
We found ourselves in New York with a reservation at a terrible (Marriott) hotel masquerading as a very nice hotel we had stayed at in 2006 - this will be the subject of s separate review to come as a cautionary tale to all.
The very nice people at the 1 Hotel were very sympathetic to our plight and immediately found us a very nice room which they kindly gave us early access to a very nice room. The whole hotel has a very nice eco oriented feel and all the staff were very friendly and efficient. This was totally at odds with extremely offhand service we were faced with at our first hotel. The lobby and dining area were full of lush foliage and it was a very pleasant place to just sit and watch the bustle of NYC go by. The food was excellent. The hotel is in a perfect location being just one block from Central Park and just a 15 minute walk to Times Square. We cannot thank the staff enough for helping us salvage what looked like a very disappointing visit to New York.

title: 1 Hotel Central Park is my Go-To Hotel in Manhatten
text: Yet another wonderful stay at 1 Hotel Central Park!!   Such a positive experience.   The lobby is festively decorated and feels so welcoming.   Such a great location, convenient to everything.   Room is perfectly appointed and so clean and comfortable.   The staff at 1 Hotel could not be more helpful and professional.   Shout out to Christopher and Shayne  who went above and beyond with exceptional service.   1 Hotel Central Park is my go-to when I stay in Manhattan.   It never disappoints.

title: 5 stars!
text: What an amazing stay! From the door staff all the way to the housekeeping and jams team all the service has been exceptional! Everyone has been so accommodating. I can't wait to come back! Btw I recommend trying the french toast! Delicious!!

title: Great experience
text: I had the best experience at the 1Hotel Central Park. From the moment we arrived the front desk representatives were so kind and helpful and we were greeted with a smile. They were prompt in delivering our bags to our room and the views from the room were spectacular. Any assistance we needed or when we would call down the front desk were responsive and would assist quickly. We can’t wait to come back in a few months and stay here again

title: Great anniversary getaway!
text: Had the most wonderful stay for our 10th anniversary.  Upon check-in in we were told our room was upgraded. So kind! We had the most beautiful room with great views.  They even brought champagne to our room with a nice note. The staff was so helpful and accommodating. The hotel itself is just gorgeous. So close and walkable to everything! We would stay again in a heartbeat.

title: Lovely stay in NYC
text: Exceptionally well, run, beautiful, cozy, and modern hotel. When I find gems like this, I am reluctant to give reviews for fear that it will become a victim of its own popularity. Nevertheless, I couldn’t resist spreading the word this time.

title: Under expectations
text:
Nice room but without real views to the Park (although was booked and paid for it).             

The attached picture is the best way to illustrate this review.

Clearly under expectations.

title: Loved being at the 1Hotel
text: We stayed 4 nights at the 1Hotel and every single staff person from greeting us the door to the front desk to concierge to housekeeping to dining room made us feel super special.  They were there to make our stay as comfortable as could be .  The hotel and rooms are great !

title: Solid environmentally-minded hotel in a good located. Not sure if it’s worth the price.
text:
I stayed here for one night to see a comedy show in Times Square. The hotel is centrally located to most everything and close to the subway and walkable to many attractions. 

The good:
-well-decorated room with a comfortable bed. Other reviews note that the rooms aren’t large. As a single traveler, it was fine for me but if I were traveling with my family of 3, it would be cramped. 
-Beautiful shower and bathroom with a thoughtful timer you can use to conserve water.
-Lobby staff are helpful.

Could be Improved:
-I don’t often write about price but felt that this was a premium-priced hotel that didn’t offer a premium experience. Don’t get me wrong, it was lovely but it seemed like I was paying for the experience of staying at a green/environmentally-minded hotel that offered basic amenities and a solid (but not exemplary) room experience.

title: Extraordinary visit!
text: Hands down, best hotel in New York City! Every interaction we had was memorable, from the moment we walked in, the doorman greeted us with a smile, a personalized welcome note in our bedroom board and little touches throughout the room like filtered water and the option to donate clothing. Can’t wait to go back, my new home in NYC!

title: Firendly, professional and sustainable
text:
As a professional sustainability consultant in building design, I recommend 1 Hotel for their authentic biophelia, sustainability and care for the wellbeing of their guests!

The atmosphere was calm, welcoming and relaxing.

title: Perfect fam getaway!
text:
Perfect location, since the moment we walked into the building we got amazing service from the whole staff.
My husband is a big time germaphobe and he was so happy and comfy there, everything was very very clean… it's out 2nd home in New York.

title: Just nice
text: Spent the weekend in New York for my husbands 50th birthday.  Hotel is nice but didn't wow ether of us. Whenever we travel for special occasions the hotels always acknowledge it in some form. Some leave notes, some a desert or complimentary drink at the bar. 1 Hotel did nothing even though i informed them prior to arrival.  Really disappointing. We upgraded the room and it was nice but the bathroom was odd in the sense that it wasn't very private.  They have designed a glass shower that is part of the main room but also part of the bathroom so in order to get privacy while doing what we all do, you need to pull a curtain which barely covers, nothing romantic about that :( . They also provide a courtesy drive within 1 mile of the hotel, don't count on it. Of the 6 or so times we requested, it was never "available' even though it was clearly parked right out front.

title: Great Travel Experience
text: Fabulous restaurant, eco friendly concept, great decor, fabulous linen, porters and reception staff very friendly, G was fantastic ...assisting with extremely heavy baggage🧳...with a smile 😃 overall good experience. Would have preferred🫙 bottled water in room... although💧 water is "filtered" it didn't look great.

title: What a gem!
text: This is a different experience from the moment you walk in. Beautiful surroundings, an un-preachy focus on sustainability, natural plants everywhere, living-walls tastefully and beautifully incorporated into every hallway, attentive and friendly staff despite the busy-ness of this location, Jams restaurant is as advertised, complimentary transportation provided within a radius of the hotel, Central Park is just outside the front door, we will be back!

title: Plants, food, fun
text: The 1 Hotel in Central Park was amazing. It is three minutes walking distance to the South end of Central Park.  I love plants in my environment and there were plenty of those everywhere. I even bought one of the books I found in my room.  I had the King Terrace on the 19th floor which was a recent expansion.  I advise getting a Terrace room even though it’s pricey because the view was spectacular and the room itself is comfy and quiet with the door closed. It can be tough to book so try two or more months ahead of time.  The restaurant, Jams, is amazing. There are certain days and times you need a reservation. That was one of the best breakfasts I ever had. The staff truly make the experience 5 star.  They really want you to be happy.

title: Great Engagement Weekend at One Hotel CPS
text: We stayed at the One Hotel Central Park South for our engagement weekend with immediate family members in early October. The experience was wonderful – the staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, the rooms were high-end yet cozy and inviting, and the dining / social experience at Jams had incredible food and beverage all weekend long. Huge shoutout to Lauren Yanoff for helping to organize and coordinate all aspects of the engagement weekend / celebration. We'll be back soon to stay at one of our favorite spots in NYC.

title: Great stay, small room.
text:
- Super friendly staff, especially doorman who has the best sense of humour, thank you! 
- Hotel lobby smells so good. 
- Queen room (alcove): Very small, window view is basically the other side of the building with more windows. Felt very claustrophobic and will not fit more than two standard sized bags when kept open. 
- Rooms very clean, room service available once per day with turn-down available in the evening. 
- Full amenities available. 
- Gym is great with many options. 
- Food at restaurant is mainly vegan/vegetarian not sure about other options. 
- Location: Central Park is 1 minute away, 5th Avenues around 10-15 minute walk. Hotel located in a safe block with lots of tourists around. Subway access is also nearby next to hotel. 
- Honestly too expensive for the small room that we got but I guess this is New York. Just get a bigger room or a room with a view.

title: A Gem in NYC
text: A super comfy bed, lovely clean room, great bar and restaurant and the friendliest staff. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  All the staff were great but a special mention to Anderson who went out of his way to be helpful. Thank you so much!

title: The staff are so so lovely!
text: The staff are truly truly incredible — gee at the front door was so kind and beyond helpful. They are so attentive and willing to help with anything. It was climate week and was I mposible to get around but they managed to get us taxis no problem!

title: Loved everything.
text: Absolutely incredible stay, everything was perfect. Amazing service, room was nice and gym was great for a hotel gym. Such a cozy place to stay during the holidays. Great location and house car service was very helpful.

title: Excellent hotel, truly special and outstanding vibe
text: It is the perfect hotel. Great location in front of Central Park, eco friendly, positive vibes, elegant and sophisticated in a cool way, not pretentious, outstanding ambience and delicious food. I loved the room, so compact and clean. Rooms are on the small side but it is NYC. So it is quality that matters. Can’t wait to be back. Memorable stay.

title: Spectacular services
text: Sustainable, outstanding services and environmental responsibility . First time and we will come back with our kids . I really recommend  the experience in NYC . The local is wonderful and so close of Central Park

title: Relaxing, comfortable stay, highly recommend
text: The Hotel is very warm, great restaurant, food was very good. front desk service is fantastic, relaxing vibe. Rooms were not big but still nice size. Beds are very comfortable. Love the plantings all around. Perfect location. Valet takes long so plan ahead.

title: In NYC for a girls trip
text: G, Jerry, and Anderson - the absolute best!!! 5 stars for them!! They were so eager to help and the best personalities! The hotel was gorgeous and the botanical garden that greets you is breathtaking upon entering the main entrance!

title: ANDERSON AND GEE!!!
text:
Beautiful and unique hotel. Perfect location. Amazing staff! 
Anderson and Gee were phenomenal! You will not be disappointed with this location. We will, definitely, come back here next time we visit the city!

title: Amazingly comfortable
text: Very comfortable, eco-friendly(which we love), clean, smells wonderful, very aesthetic and beautiful. Everyone was so kind and super helpful. The effort put into being sustainable and not wasteful is amazing and what everyone needs to do! Mahsi’choo for leading the way.

title: Amazing Hotel & Exceptional Staff
text: On the way to the airport home from a birthday visit to NY and had to write an amazing review of our experience! It is rare to not have one complaint about a hotel stay so this is a first! From being met at the front door upon arrival by Jerry with the biggest smile, to having a LOT of luggage expertly handled by G, to walking into a beautiful room with soft linens, filtered water, wonderful lighting and a fantastic shower, to great room service, to the delicious Jams restaurant we were in heaven. The concierge staff was fabulous - particularly Michael and Luis - who took care of our reservations even prior to our arrival and booked a car service for us a few hours before we left! Jerry and Anderson flagged down multiple cabs for us and I think Jerry asked how my birthday vacation was going every time we saw each other! The icing on the cake was G, Anderson and Jerry quickly making sure our bags got packed in the car as we left! Start to finish it couldn’t have been better! We will be back for sure! This is the place to stay!

title: Grateful for our Experience ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
text:
Andrew, Anderson and Chester were amazing! And those were only the names I remember. We truly had an amazing time and as a business own want management to know you truly have the right processes in place to have the crew you do. We were greeted with smiles and a gift for our 5 year old son who soon was busy playing w it upon arrival. We couldn’t wait to wake each morning to the eggs (cooked on olive oil) bacon, gluten-free bread and delicious 1/2 cafe cappuccino! I am literally depressed to go home! 

Thank you again, Andrew, Anderson, Chester and 1 Hotel. We appreciate you.  🩵 Can’t wait to revisit again soon!

title: Great hotel, wonderful location @ Central Park, but the staff is what makes it stand out! Major thanks 2 Andrew & Maryam
text: Amazing hotel and wonderful staff and service. Andrew and Maryam were always attentive and took care of everything we needed. Definitely recommend this property because of the helpful staff! Thank you

title: Best boutique hotel near Central Park for the money!
text:
Incredible stay with my 12 year old daughter.  Our birthday is the same day so a joint celebration was made very special by "G", and Michael and the entire staff w birthday cards and treats! Room was perfect, esp the window seat.  The bedding and pillows/ mattress quality was 5star all the way!  Generally Very quiet / well insulated, but if noise bothers you, request a room over 10th and interior facing away from 6th avenue.  Those rooms are quieter.  We will miss the friendly faces that  always greeted us , esp our friend "G" and the entire valet/ bellman staff and we will for sure miss the superior customer service!  The fastest response time to get ice or a toothbrush (we loved the special wooden ones) or anything we needed!  
We also enjoyed a breakfast at Jams!  Beautiful place with wonderful / healthy food!
Can't wait to come back to visit! #worth the money!!

title: Not nearly what we hoped for
text: Didn't like our stay @ all! We love the 1 chain but this one misses the mark! Rooms tiny and not comfortable - front desk staff and Mgr not accommodating or hospitable - concierge is wonderful but that's it - not luxurious at all! Had much higher hopes - location good but subpar

title: Great service.
text: Loved Janae (sp?) at the front desk. So helpful. Made my stay. I like 1hotel also for black out rooms. Quiet. Good bedding and feather pillows.  Will be back again. I’ve already stayed 5 times this year.

title: G
text:
outstanding customer service! especially G, Anderson & Jerry. very nice, welcoming, and helpful.
loved the plants in the room and how they have plants on the outside of the building 
room was kinda hot tho at 69 degrees. 
nice bartenders

title: Lowered expectations
text: I expected a lot better at this price point after reading all the great reviews here.  As a friend said, one needs to really lower ones expectations on service when one visits new york. After several mishaps during stay, including with room service, will probably not be back here. They didnt even accept their mistakes, making me feel like a complete idiot. e.g. they refused to believe that what they sent with room service was different than what was in the menu - and that too completely burnt. At a nicer hotel they would have simply apologized and sent a replacement. But instead what i. got was a long argument which i didnt need and spoit my mood. And they would enter your room even when privacy light is on, without even a phone call. Also the location is basically tourist central, so not exactly relaxing. And the rooms feel really small, especially the ones facing inwards.

title: 2 thumbs up!!
text: The hotel and everyone who works there are so friendly and helpful! I’d say location is very convenient to get around all over NYC. The room is great, and they have nice “green” touches throughout. And I also highly recommend trying Jams for cocktails and a bite to eat! Will be back soon!

title: Amazing hotel
text: Beautiful hotel, gorgeous and clean rooms. The breakfast is so delicious, my favourite in the city. Super friendly staff too. Special mention to the lovely Gee who helped me with my car and was so patient and friendly. Will be back for sure! Thanks Gee!

title: G is the best!
text: G was incredible. Helped with my heavy luggage everytime I had to go somewhere. 1 hotel is top tier. Wonderful service. Rooms are perfect and the atmosphere overall is exceptional. Highly recommend. Truly a five star experience.

title: Wonderful stay!
text: Service is friendly, hotel is clean and located conveniently in Midtown. Room is comfortably laid out with all bath amenities you need. Great place to stay for both business and pleasure! Will be back again soon!

title: Perfect Stay
text: This hotel is so beautiful!! Everyone is so nice and goes above and beyond to make your stay perfect. The room layout and the amenities are so cool and very creative. I love the bathrobes. It’s like wearing a sweatshirt. Cozy!

title: Everyone was so great!
text:
Gee and jerry were amazing !!!!!!!!!  
Gorgeous hotel ! Everyone was very nice ! 
Going to NY In Aug was a great time of the year to go … right next to Central Park and beautiful weather ! 
Thank you again!

title: NYC gem!
text: Such a great location one block away from Central Park. The rooms are stylish and comfortable and the bar downstairs is a great place for people-watching. Gee on the door was so helpful and welcoming - we love coming back to this hotel whenever we’re in NYC!

title: Trendy hotel walking distance to broadway
text: This was our first time staying in this hotel. We never usually stay in midtown but we were going to see a broadway play and visited the Miami location so we thought we would try this out. The hotel was shabby chic in the best way possible. It was such a memorable scent as soon as you walk in and the decoration transported you out of midtown. Joshua checked us in and made us feel at home. He recommended a few of his favorite restaurants near the theater and suggested we use your house car. we didn't get a chance to ride it this time but we will definitely try next time. it was a wonderful stay and we can't wait to return.

title: Will be back
text: This hotel was a dream - very cool aesthetic inside, excellent food (both via room service and in the restaurant). Lots of cool attention to detail in the design and focus on sustainability. The hotel staff was great, in particular Anderson was friendly and helpful.

title: Hip hotel at the base of Central Park
text:
This is a very well located hotel at the base of central park. The price is reasonable and the rooms were nice. 

It is more of a hip, young vibe and the room is modern but not luxe.

This is the kind of place I would take my teen age kids or recommend to 20-30 yr olds.

title: Beautiful hotel!! Great location!
text: The ambiance of this hotel is truly special! Favorite hotel in the city to date!  Service was wonderful and the room was clean and very comfortable.  Love the design of the hotel and rooms.  Highly recommend!

title: Truly a Pleasure
text: I recently stayed the weekend here and it was a fantastic experience from start to finish. I travel over half the year for business and I stay all over the world. The rooms, amenities and staff were all world class. Would highly recommend for business or pleasure.

title: Equipe atenciosa, bem localizado, mas esperava mais
text:
Hotel bem localizado, serviço bom, mas sinal wi fi ruim, academia fraca
Pelo preço esperava mais.
Barulho de cachorro em outros quartos. 
Cama e blackout muito bons. Toalhas muito pequenas. 
Atendimento de carregadores de bagagem muito bom, Gee muito simpático e prestativo

title: Ideal location for an NYC stay
text: Perfect location for a family trip to NYC. The hotel rooms were loft style and incredibly comfortable. Food at Jams restaurant was exceptional, particularly breakfast. Concierge staff were helpful and friendly and we would definitely stay again.

title: Best Boutique Hotel in NYC—bar none!!!
text:
Best boutique hotel in NYC! Vibe, ambiance (scent like walking into Le Labo!), decor, customer service, environmental focus, and LOCATION—everything is world class. Above all else is the staff—Gee, Shane, Flo, Chris, Lorenzo, Luis, and Michael are the best of the best! I’m sure everyone else is too, but these people went above and beyond during my three stays in the last three months. Will be back every time I’m in NYC. 
Also, Jams restaurant on the main floor is fabulous. Ask for Rowan as your server. And the 1 Hotel private driver, who drives the swanky hotel car is an expert at his craft (as well as a great conversationalist, if that’s your preference).

title: Girls weekend
text: Weekend getaway with my sister and nieces celebrating their 16th and 21st birthdays.  I have a new favorite hotel in NYC.  Great location, clean, green and amazing bell staff.  The room was so peaceful and refreshing.  There are yoga mats with foam rollers in the room with space to stretch out (not common in the city).  Shout out to Anderson and Gee who gave us tips on where to find the best bagels, coffee, shopping and transportation.

title: Shout out to Anderson and Gee
text: Anderson and Gee were the sweetest, they told us where to go and what good places were around. Whatever we needed they were super helpful and accommodating, going above and beyond to make sure our stay was special. We will definitely be back and I would recommend this hotel to friends.

title: GREAT HOTEL HIGHLY RECOMMEND
text:
1Hotel Central Park is excellent.  The vibe and design of the hotel and rooms are inviting, well designed, chill, natural, and aesthetically pleasing.  The staff is super attentive and wonderful customer service (thank you CHESTER at checkin!!!!).  
Super easy to get to via subway, steps from the park, and shopping.
Rooms: beautiful design, coffee, shower, amenities.  Loved the bed, bedding, robes.
Gym: plenty of options, plenty of room, Pelotons and other up-to-date options.
Bar/Restaurant- delicious and healthy.  
I traveled solo and will return with my wife.  Can’t see staying anywhere else when in NYC.  Highly recommend.

title: G Rocks!!
text: Service was amazing. G was super helpful and awesome!!  Have to also give a shout out to Shane! He always makes me feel super welcome!! The overall experience, as always, was the best!!  Hotel 1 is always my first choice!!

title: Thanks a lot for the stay.
text:
The room was great and G was very kind.
One thing though: your CRM is not very good as they never recognize us when we check in. It would be appreciated to receive a “welcome back” message upon arrival ;)

title: I stay here frequently.
text: Clean, cool  family friendly hotel. Maybe cost more than other hotels but worth it. Shane and Gee always helpful out front with bags and check in staff great as well. Steps from Central Park and great shopping

title: Top-tier Hospitality
text: By far the best part of our stay was the impeccable service we received at the hands of doormen/bellmen, Anderson and Shane. Both are outstanding individuals who went above and beyond to serve us  — the 1 is lucky to have them. Overall, we had wonderful time here and hope to be back!

title: Great service!
text: Service was awesome- the doormen, front desk, concierge, everyone! Especially appreciated Anderson and Shay’s help with seamless exits with luggage/taxis/etc. Felt very welcome and cared for at 1 Hotel Central Park thanks to the staff!

title: Stop looking, this is the spot!
text:
First- the staff is amazing, friendly & helpful.  Andrew and Anderson at the front door are awesome dudes! Ask them anything about the city or hotel and they will give you their expert recommendations. 
The food at Jam is also 5 star quality, make sure you get the chicken, how do you all make it so juicy, every time!

title: The best hotel in NY
text: The staff was amazing from the moment we booked until we left! Eager to help answer questions in the planning stage of our trip (and we had a lot) and very willing to accommodate us with fridge space, arriving early, etc. Special thanks to the wonderful young man at the front (he had locs/braids and a 2 year old kid, I didn’t catch his name) and Chris, Benny, and Anderson. All of them and everyone else made our stay great, and we will definitely be back!

title: Great boutique hotel experience
text: Love the boutique hotel feel, best location, steps from Central Park. amazing front desk and bellman staff. Concierge was very helpful. Complimentary car service that will take you within 15 min of the hotel was a huge bonus. Clean rooms, that feel cozy and warm.  We will be back!

title: Staff is phenomenal
text: Hotel is phenomenal. Rooms, location, and especially the staff. Every person was exceptionally helpful. Christopher during check in and throughout our stay was awesome, and a huge shout out to G who helped us at the end of our trip for hours when our flights were cancelled and we (two adults and two awesome but rowdy boys) needed a home base to regroup. Not our first stay and for sure not our last!!

title: Very memorable stay at 1 Hotel Central Park!
text: Truly enjoyed 1 Hotel Central Park.  The staff was very friendly.  The doormen and valets were especially welcoming.  From the moment I walked in, it felt like a home away from home.  Location was excellent.  Subway access was literally right around the corner.  Also, can’t forget Jam’s.  Very good breakfast and evening bar.  Obviously, in the service industry, people make the difference.  The people I met at 1 Hotel Central Park are making a very positive difference for their guests.

title: Unparalleled service
text: The one thing you can’t pay for was the best thing we experienced. The customer service was unparalleled. From the moment we walked in we felt like the only people in the world. They treated us like we mattered from the moment we checked in, to past the moment when we checked out.

title: Smartly Designed, Warmly Staffed
text: I've stayed here multiple times for business.  The rooms are clean and smartly designed, even if small (like all NYC hotel rooms).  There is a great gym, and it's also incredibly close to the park.  The restaurant and bar are really good (especially given they are connected to a hotel), and have top notch staff like Will and Egypt that excel at creating a warm environment.

title: Best Choice for visiting New York
text: The rooms were extremely well-prepared and every detail  made it very relaxing and made us feel very at ease. The rooms were incredibly spacious and even had a large window seat with a nice view of New York! The hotel staff were welcoming and friendly and made our stay even better.

title: Missing item
text: The room itself was ok and in good condition and my stay was average, however be very aware of your belongings especially if you leave any behind. Immediately after checking out I realised I had left inside the wardrobe a designer lamp I purchased during this stay in NYC. Almost instantly I called the hotel and received very little reassurance and no information on whether or not they had retrieved it. After continuously trying to attempt contact with various member of management or staff through emails and phone calls, I have been completely shut out with radio silence. I’m still waiting to hear but in any case it is pretty disgraceful that a reputable brand does not seem to have proper attention for their customers to the point of ignoring their calls. I hope I’ll be proven wrong  and I’m still waiting for my lamp to resurface.

title: Great time at 1 hotel central park
text: 1 Hotel Central Park is a haven of eco-luxury. With its sustainable design, breathtaking views, and impeccable service, it's an oasis in the heart of NYC. The rooms are stylish, the food is divine, and the commitment to the environment is inspiring. A truly remarkable stay. . Anderson and Andrew are the best! They helped us with logistics and traveling.

title: Family trip to NYC
text: Anderson and Andrew are great! Wonderful stay here at the 1 hotel Central Park. Great service and great location of the hotel. Staff is really nice and made our trip seamless. Will definitely stay here again!

title: Amazing food at Jams.
text: We dined at Jams. The food was exquisite! We had the organic chicken and the waygu burger. The chicken was so moist-  love the herb seasoning. The burger cooked to perfection. And Anderson, the hotel doorman was fabulous! Thank you Anderson for your wonderful service.

title: Great stay
text: Anderson and entire reception staff were fantastic. Exceptional service. Great location, I will definitely be back. Restaurant is great as well and rooms well appointed, distributed well, and enough storage. Beds were comfy and bathrooms luxurious.

title: Anderson is the best
text:
I’ve stayed at this hotel so many times and find new reasons to love it more each visit. Today there was a large parade blocking off all nearby streets. Anderson pushed a cart of our luggage several blocks away to ensure we could make our flight. But it gets better. We were about to leave when our daughter realized she did not have her suitcase. Anderson ran through all the traffic and crowds back to the hotel with the cart, retrieved her suitcase from storage and ran it back uphill several blocks to our driver.
He is the best. Great hotel with low key luxury and high key service. Thank you, Anderson!!!!

title: What a magnificent staff!
text: The concierge, Lorenzo, made sure we had a successful stay in NYC. Our housekeeper, Selina, was super nice and did a great job. Our check-in and out process with Chester went smoothly. We felt well taken care of. I would totally recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in NYC.

title: Great Service!
text: Was in the neighborhood after work and popped in w a colleague. The place was packed for a Monday night and we were seated right away. I had the burrata and the chicken suggested by the female manager which was great, my guest had the kale salad and trout that he enjoyed. Our server, Saydimar was friendly and efficient. The cocktail list was current and the ranch water was well executed and balanced. A warm and friendly place that sets apart from all the stuffiness that is midtown.

title: Our Favorite NY Central Park hotel
text: The 1 Hotel Central Park is an oasis of calm and nature in NY City. Christopher at the front desk was an amazing help, as were all the staff. Our view of Central Park was amazing and the restaurant was innovative and tasty. It will be our new go to place in Manhattan.  We love the 1 Hotel's commitment to sustainability and the touches of nature that permeate their properties.

title: Amazing! A must stay in NYC
text: Amazing hotel and staff! From our arrival to our departure the staff was fantastic and accommodating.  The room was very clean and well maintained. The hotel is very well situated and walking distance to many great amenities and restaurants/bars. Luis the concierge was super helpful in trying to get us reservations at some of the best restaurants and he went above and beyond to make sure were happy. I would definitely recommend this hotel and I cant wait to come back !!

title: Gréât hôtel and location
text:
L’hôtel est parfaitement situé à côté de Central Park et la 5eme avenue 
Métro au pied de l’hôtel et commerce juste à côté.
La chambre studio king est nickel avec de la place et un emplacement  pour s’allonger contre la  fenêtre avec une vue sur central Park.
La sdb est bien mais un peu petite, nous avons eu un pb avec la chasse qui n’a pas été résolu mais contourne dommage pour une chambre à ce prix ..
Le staff est plutôt sympa sauf le jour du checkin la personne n’était pas très agréable et encore une fois à ce prix cela n’est pas terrible.
Le petit déjeuné est pas mal

title: 1 Hotel Convert
text: From the perspective of both a guest and a hotel professional, the front staff (doorman, front desk, concierge) were all exemplary. Emerson, I believe, checked me in. Loved the room, City Lounge King. The use of space was so creative. The window seat and the glass shower were very cool. The sand timer in the shower was a great connection to the hotel’s sustainability commitment as were many other messages and touches I noted in my room. I thoroughly enjoyed the 1 Hotel Central Park. Highly recommended!

title: Hidden Fees and average service ruin a decent property
text:
Positives: the location is good: Central Park, theatres, midtown business corridor and Lincoln Center are all fairly close.  There are lots of good restaurants w/in 15 minute walk, as well.  While the rooms are smallish, the shower had good pressure and the bed was comfy … they use a heavy comforter which some people may like more than me?  The place seemed clean and I saw staff sweeping and polishing.

On the negative side: the lobby and restaurant were small, crowded and loud.  I arrived late and was unable to get a meal at 9:30pm!  That is too early for a hotel kitchen to close in Manhattan.  They don’t have soap in the rooms … just pump canisters with shower product … seems cheap, to me.   The hotel charges a $45 “Resort Fee” that is not discussed when you make a reservation.  The hotel has no resort … it’s a hidden charge for the Wi-Fi, in-room coffee, fitness center, etc.  These are amenities they advertise as “free”.  It is a total rip off and just a way to charge more for the room while appearing to be price competitive.  I am sure a lawyer said it was legal and some executive got a bonus for dreaming up the scheme … it is false advertising and annoyed me.

title: SURPRISE OF A LIFETIME
text: AMAZING! WOULD GIVE 100 STARS IF I COULD. We had a trip planned for Jan 2023. We booked a Park View suite and were so excited to get checked in. Once we arrived, Chris helped us with our check in. When I say we had a surprise of a lifetime, I mean it 100%. He let us know that someone had cancelled their penthouse reservation for the weekend, and he could upgrade up for a FRACTION of the costs. We obviously took the deal because it was a once in a lifetime opportunity for us and not something we'd be able to do normally. It was incredible! Service was phenomenal and I will definitely be booking here again on our next trip! 10/10

title: Excellent base for midtown NYC
text:
Our favorite New York City hotel for when my husband and I come to the city. Very cool design, super clean, excellent service, and convenient location.
My husband especially loves how quiet the rooms are despite being in midtown, and I love the window seat in our room for people watching. 
But, it's the staff that really makes the place. Special shout out to Shane at the front door who always offers a warm, friendly greeting when we arrive helping to make us feel like we're in our home away from home :)

title: Came for play read of family member at NYU. Had brunch at jams. Treated & celebrated success of play. Very noce polite s
text: Cleanlieness outstanding!! Service superb. Never missed oppt to smile and be helpful. Best doormen ever Abderson & Chi. Will be back for sure. Always stay in Village but now found my new home. The pkants the aroma so beautiful. Everyone on thier game but so kind.

title: Excellent service and location
text:
Stunning boutique style hotel. Excellent service and great location.  Restaurant, Jams, was really good. 
All round great experience.  Enjoyed my stay.  The reception and concierge team were outstanding and always available.

title: Modern hotel next to Central Park
text: Beautiful and clean rooms. I specially love the window seat with a view on the buildings. The steamer and yoga mat were appreciated. The Bamford bathroom products were good. Breakfast is à la carte, good dishes and quick service. The location is 5 minutes walk to Central Park.

title: Good stay!
text: Overall, it was a very good stay. Fantastic locatiom, cool rooms. I thought the whole "green" thing was going to be too much, but it's very well done. The breakfast is pretty good as well and convenient to have a restaurant next door. My only gripe is the elevator. Only one was working during my stay, and it was painfully slow. Had to go up 9 flight of stairs twice. Probably good for me, still.

title: A not-so concrete jungle
text: Really cool ambiance, very beautiful, a fresh take with all the nature decorations in a bustling city. Everything feels very natural and there were really cool ways they showed their environmental friendliness.

title: Love this hotel!!
text: Had a wonderful time here! The hotel was spotless and has such a great environmental friendly aesthetic. Anderson was so helpful and answered any question we had. 10/10 recommend!!! Truly love this hotel!

title: Best of everything!!
text:
Shout out to ALL the staff at 1Hotel.  Our check in process was a breeze and was also upgraded to the next level up from
The room that I initially booked.  Room was cleaned and beautiful, no complaints!!  Gee helped us get settled in and also recommended some good restaurants. He booked our pickup to go eat as well as helped
Booked our ride back to JFK. He was very accommodating and made sure we were taken care care from beginning to end. We were taken care of so well and greeted with respect from all departments.  Murat the hotels Director of good and beverage came to talk to us while we had lunch and made us felt very welcomed. Wish we had more time to enjoy the hotel; this was a day trip returning home from a vacation in St.Lucia. We will definitely be back when the weather is nicer so we can enjoy the outdoor seating. Keep up the great hospitality- you will continue to do well if the service continues like the way we were treated.  Nothing bad to say, food, cocktails, cleanliness, comfort of the bed, was all top notched.  Thanks again for making our stay so welcomed and enjoyable.  It was short but sweet!!

title: Fabulous, warm, friendly
text: Fabulous, gorgeous place that's both sophisticated and warm. It smells AMAZING throughout the entire hotel, and the soaps and shampoos and lotions are divine. Super nice staff (Thanks, Chester at the front desk!), great food and a comfy, nearly soundproof room (in midtown Manhattan, no less). My favorite hotel chain ever.

title: Fun mother/daughter weekend!
text: My 12 year old daughter and I loved our stay at the 1 Hotel Central Park for our weekend of fun in the city!  First, our arrival was seamless.  The staff was so accommodating and attentive. They helped make sure we enjoyed the activities we wanted, the directions we needed, and the  transportation we required.   Second, the room was clean and comfortable and quiet.  Third, the food was delicious.  Lastly, the location was so convenient.  My daughter and I safely walked to most of our activities.  We loved seeing the sites of NYC and our stay at 1 Hotel NYC was perfect.

title: Exceptional experience every time
text: Every experience at the 1 Hotels is exceptional. The rooms are luxurious and the natural aura makes it feel like you're living in a spa while there. As a former NYer recently relocated, I always feel right at home while staying here.

title: Comfortable and Safe
text: Nice Room and the view was amazing. Very nice ambience of the hotel. I really felt safe and comfortable staying here. Hotel staffs were very helpful. I took top floor room. Room was clean. Everything was neat and clean. Thank you to the hotel team for making my stay amazing.

title: Great location
text: Nice modern hotel. Friendly staff and very clean. Restaurant in the hotel is nice. Free apples for guests. Smells good when you walk in. One block away from Central Park. Great restaurants and cafes within walking distance. I would stay here again.

title: Midtown Gem-Truly Outstanding
text: Stayed at 1 Hotel Central Park over Easter weekend with my wife and our adult daughter. What a outstanding experience! Fantastic location in Midtown, friendly people, attentive service, great food. All around great stay. Eager to return.

title: Great location, better rooms, best staff!
text:
My family had a wonderful stay for a long weekend.  Our rooms were clean, spacious, and fun. The hotel has so many unique and creative touches, including a lot of natural decor. 

The location is great, right off Central Park and an easy walk to the theater district. The area felt safe and clean and had everything we needed. 

The hotel staff were all incredibly helpful and kind and went out of their way to make our stay a good over.  In particular, Anderson and GK helped us make sure we made it to the train station safe and sound. 

Highly recommend, will be back soon!

title: Wonderful stay in the heart of Manhattan
text: Love everything about this place - decor, staff, plants, food in the restaurant. Central to so many locations and about 30-45 mins from JFK airport. I loved waking up early and walking with my coffee to Central Park

title: Overall the stay, service and staff was amazing and words Chang desorientiert what an incredible stay we had.
text:
The staff was amazing and everyone was very nice and made us feel incredibly welcome. Anderson and Gee (I don’t how to spell the name but it’s pronounced that way) helped loading the taxi and were in general a big help. We really enjoyed our stay and not only the staff at the reception, doors, … were amazing but also the cleaning staff did an outstanding job and the rooms were always clean and organised. We also liked all the tiny and environment friendly extras like the pears and apples you could take from the lobby, the option of reusing towels instead of getting new ones and all the other extras. 
In total we had an amazing time staying at your Hotel and we hope we can come back sooner or later.

title: Our fav spot in NYC!
text: This hotel not only is in NYC’s best location, it has the service to match! Always top notch! Always so friendly and filled with service! Amazing brunch! We will return- beautiful aesthetic and fabulous service and location!

title: Going back again for sure!
text: We just stayed at the 1 Hotel for the second time. The first time was 4 years ago. The hotel  is fantastic. It exceeded our expectations on all counts. The location is stellar but what really makes it great is the staff- from the front desk, to the bellmen, to housekeeping- they are so professional and friendly. There is always someone there when you need it- with a smile. Also- the beds and the sheets and pillows! Heaven. Last, special shout-out to Lorenzo the driver. You are the best. See you next time.

title: Fantastic location! Awesome staff!! Amazing hotel!!!
text:
From the moment we were welcomed at the door, we knew we chose the perfect hotel! Their staff  are super friendly and their passion for sustainability is very evident throughout. 
Our room was awesome and extremely comfortable & spotless!  
The hotel location is fantastic and within walking distance to so many great places. 
Truly a 10 out of 10 hotel!!

title: Best service unmatched
text: favorite hotel I have ever been to from the moment you walk in the overwhelming feeling of relaxation hits you. It’s a little oasis in the city with the best employees. Big shot out to Kyle, Anderson, and Emerson they made my stay amongst one of the best I’ve ever had.

title: Attentive to Details and Excellent Concierge Service
text:
In March, my husband and I visited NYC for the 1st time.  Situated on Central Park, this hotel is the perfect location for walking to major attractions such as Times Square, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, Broadway.  The desk staff was courteous and attentive during check-in and check-out.  Housekeeping came multiple times a day, refreshing the bed and leaving fresh bath mats and towels.  We enjoyed the fresh fruit free to hotel guests.

What stood out the most for me was the concierge service.  Despite emailing me weeks before our trip inquiring about transportation needs, I procrastinated and didn’t reply until the day before our trip.  Nonetheless, Lorenzo arranged our transportation with a smile in his voice.  When we arrived at the hotel, I inquired about a restaurant to celebrate my husband’s birthday.  Barayam recommended a lovely steak house, made the reservations for me, and had a bottle of Brut sent to our room to celebrate.

We will definitely return to 1 Hotel Central Park when we return to NYC!

title: A Green Urban Retreat.
text:
A natural sanctuary, in the heart of the Big Apple, the 1 Hotel Central Park distinguishes itself as a unique green-themed hotel. Designed to feel like a rain forest , the property boasts greenery like ivy growing on the exterior, a lobby decorated with 24,000 hanging plants and locust tree twigs on the front door. A block from Central Park with CarnegieHall and 5th Avenue a hop-skip-and-a-jump away. I found the hotel's location ideal for my attraction explorations.

My pleasurable Alcove King portrayed a stylish urban design , green elements and a homey atmosphere stemming from a neutral colour scheme along with mesmerizing treetop views. Chic modern furniture, reclaimed and salvaged wood, live edge wood desk with industrial accents were all in keeping with the eco-mantra of the hotel.

The 1 does have an all day restaurant, the Jams. It is an airy, wood filled facility serving seasonal fare such as gnocchi and trout amongst other delectables. My choice of the signature kale salad and roasted chicken were tops on the taste scale. 

Addition amenities included a 24 hour gym, small business centre and nominal meeting and lounge space. Staff were accommodating and jovial.

So, if you want to step into a quiet, eco-conscious,  luxurious reprieve from the manic of NYC........then try the .........1 Hotel Central Park,,,,,,,,,,A Green Urban Retreat.

title: 10/10 - can't wait to return.
text: The staff and quality of 1hotel made our stay so relaxing. I visited with my 3 and 5-year-old and we felt welcomed, cared for, and accommodated as though we were visiting a five-star, five-diamond resort. The beds were comfortable, the room was dark, and we were on the street side of the hotel and rarely heard vehicles. The window bench felt like a special touch that we used nonstop. Andrew and Floresca were so intentional, and asked about the kid's comfort several times.

title: Perfect spot!
text: Really great experience for our family. Spent 4 nights here and it was the perfect home base. Location was ideal and the decor and service made it next level. My 13 yr old daughter wanted to move in :) Highly recommend! Thanks to Anderson and G for the service.

title: The standard is set by 1 Hotel Central Park!
text: Amazing hotel in the perfect location with impeccable amenities and service. The rooms were so chic, the views were astounding, and those at the front desk were consistently kind, courteous, and attentive.  Anderson was especially helpful!

title: One of our best hotel experiences ever!
text: Clean, best location, live beautiful greenery everywhere. Excellent service at every turn. Beautiful shower and higher floors have orrery view of the skyline. 2 mins to Central Park! Jams restaurant was the best. Loved the green juice too

title: Beautiful respite in the best spot in NYC
