text: This hotel was fantastic! The people, the rooms, the smells, & the vibe! All terrific!  Already planning our return visit! Every time we walked through the green arches our hearts relaxed. Anderson also took great care of us!

title: Best Kept Secret
text: I think I’ve found my new place to stay in the city! The best kept secret in NYC! Environmentally friendly and chic are the best ways to describe this beautiful hotel! Can’t wait to return with my hubby!

title: Great location and unique ambiance
text:
Great location. Special ambiance throughout the hotel - lobby and rooms. ‘Nature’ and real greens (!) are part of the interior design and creates a nice calm experience. A bubble within the city.
Breakfast and the restaurant assortments are in line.
GK at the concierge is amazing.

title: My favorite place to stay in NYC!
text:
Wonderful experience! I love the eco, sustainable and responsible practices, including hi quality "clean" products in the bath. Jams is cozy and delish, just a short stroll to the park, cozy beds. Most importantly - the people were warm, very helpful and made me feel at home. 

A very special thank you to: (it was just the Oscars so I am using Oscar language!) 

Brayam, Mensa, Emerson, Benny and the thoughtful housekeeping team

title: Super responsive staff, and totally pleasant experience
text: The staff is super responsive and nice. The room was so comfortable and really well appointed. They are dog friendly, and when I arrived, there was a bed and a toy and a treat and bowls all set up. The plants in the room are really wonderful. One of my favorite features is the filtered water in the sink and the hourglass timer in the shower. Rose in housekeeping was amazing and Andrew at the front door was so helpful. The whole staff was!

title: Poor service, unexplained credit card charges.
text: Service was spotty throughout the stay. People at the reception were generally unhelpful.  Unexplained charges were made by the hotel on my credit card and once I called to ask for details of the expense their attitude was aggressive. Not coming back.

title: Home away from Home
text: Personally and Professionally I work with a lot of brands who champion #Sustainability but I have not found another hotel brand that lives it, breathes it and shares it as much as @1hotels.  Christopher at the front desk made my stay exceptional and the rest of the team made it feel like a home away from home.  This is not my first stay with the hotel and will not be my last with the collection. #wonderfulstay

title: Drinks with friends - lovely afternoon
text: Came here with some old college friends to catch up after a couple of years. Had the best service with Mamun - was very receptive to our table despite having lots of other customers. I’ve been here a few times previously but had an exceptional time with him as our server. Very welcoming and engaging.

title: Exceptional service and yummy brunch!
text: Amazing brunch in whole Manhattan! We were late by 45 mins after the time we reserved but they still accommodated us.  The Jam’s Benedict was amazing and the pancakes were so yummy. Perfect for Sunday brunch with your girlfriends. Our server was Mamun and he was extremely helpful, recommended us the right dishes. And was very warm and welcoming. His tip to get the orange juice was appreciated :) location wise very close to Central Park and the whole decor is really instagramable and inspiring :) can only recommend to come to this place.

title: Few days away in the city.  Museums, Restaurants, Broadway, Central Park.
text: The bed was the most comfortable sleep I can remember.  Adventure awaited in every direction out the door and the hotel was very special- every staff member was as friendly and as helpful as they get.  The shower was amazing!  I loved this place, everything about it.  I’ll be back.

title: Must Stay!!!!
text: I love NYC, and spent so much time in the city in my 20s. When I visit now that I’m older, I tend to stay in the Mandarin or The Four Seasons, or the Ritz and I really expect a High quality experience. I tried this hotel on the recommendation of a group of friends who are all staying here. I have been so pleasantly surprised. There is not another hotel. Stay where the staff has been as welcoming and accommodating. They have thought of what my needs could be, and responded to them even before I made a request. The a pitta me of true customer service. I plan to return an added surprise and bonus from this hotel. Is they have a sustainability theme and the rooms have lots of greenery. It’s just all around lovely. The best part of my stay is the amazing staff!

title: Loved it!!
text: I loved my stay at 1 Hotel Central Park! Everyone that took care of us was warm and friendly especially Flo, Chris and Benny. The restaurant was delicious and the rooms were super comfy and aesthetically pleasing.

title: Yummy food, great service
text: Had a lovely breakfast at the hotel's restaurant Jam. Rowan was a great server and the food was delish! He recommended the vanilla syrup for my matcha latten and it was a great addition! I'll absolutely be back.

title: Great staff and a welcoming attitude
text: Great atmosphere yes the pillows are great!! As well as our whole experience. The hotel is beautiful! A very wholesome place. Great location. Solid value good food and good drinks. The staff is very friendly/

title: Classic Service
text: I love 1 hotel Central Park so much! The hotel is beautiful but The Staff is really what makes it Special . Their attention to detail in Specially our server Rowan is outstanding Rowan take so much pride his work and truly love his jobs can’t think a single negative to say. I should also mention  the food is very good price also reasonable for the quality we will be definitely be back! It will hard to anywhere else in NYC After This.

title: Mixed Bag
text: The hotel is lovely, and filled with spectacular houseplants—anyone who is a fan of houseplants must see the decor.  Do NOT eat at the restaurant if you are a woman by yourself—the waiters studiously ignore you and seem to believe that you’re lucky to get anything.

title: Overall nice!! But room for improvement...
text: We really liked the vibe and our stay overall, but I have some constructive feedback. I have shared some of this with the hotel but no reply yet, two days after checkout. We had two connecting rooms. The room was chilly (February!) and after one night I had to request the heavier coverlet that is shown in the photos. My teens' room had none. There was no mention of room service so I had no idea that was an option. The breakfast credit doesn't come close to covering breakfast at JAMS unless you are a single person, perhaps a couple, or if everyone just has something tiny. Our room occupancy was technically six and even though there were three of us, we went well over the breakfast credit until the final morning when we each ordered a small item and just one glass of orange juice (the kids drank water). Other five-star hotels have breakfast included booked with AmEx or Virtuoso, etc, so something similar would be nice. The house car was a nice touch and we used it twice. The staff (front desk, concierge) were lovely but I did have to ask a couple of times about our dinner reservation. Finally, I support towel re-use etc. but it was not clear to me if the towels had been sitting there for a while (stored next to a flushing toilet) since they were replaced or refreshed only upon request. In hindsight I wish I had asked for the towels to be fully replaced.

title: Lovely breakfast
text: Food was so great, wonderful server Rowan was very kind and it was the best breakfast ever. The restaurant has a nice ambiance and the people are helpful and nice. Good menu, nice drinks and lovely food!

title: Ótima opção para café da manhã
text:
Lugar com decoração charmosa, bem localizado, perto do Central Park.
Ótimo café da manhã, com opções saudáveis e serviço atencioso! O parfait yogurt e o croissant são boas dicas!
Thank you Rowan for your good service!

title: terrible
text:
terrible

you pay 7 nights 2 rooms and
- can t get internet (hotel goes cheap on wi fi speed at rooms)
- can t check in before 4 pm
- get a moody hostess and staff in the morning shift at the restaurant

title: 40th bday
text: Staying here for my husbands 40th bday tomorrow. Already got amazing service on the phone with Christopher . He was so kind and helpful. We love Hotel 1 - stayed in the Brooklyn one in the past and now excited for Central Park location . I’ll update our review once our stay is complete , we plan to eat at Jams too on Sunday . But I wanted to give a shout out to Christopher ahead of time because I haven’t experienced such nice service BEFORE even getting to the hotel !!

title: An amazing experience
text:
If you have never stayed here I would highly recommend you do so. Everyone from the General Manager Olivia Bashford to Christopher front desk manager to house keeping and restaurant staff go out of their way to make every part of your experience five star!
The rooms are aesthetically beautiful and lux and I truly can not say enough good things about this hotel 
Will for sure be returning very soon.

title: Weekend in New York
text:
Our favorite hotel ever, with such a fabulous restaurant _ Jams.

Wonderful brunch with exceptional service from our server Rowan. 

Everyone was delightful, the food exquisite and the decor and ambiance, brilliant.

title: Clean, comfortable & green
text: I really loved this hotel. There are plants everywhere and the whole place feels really cozy and homey. Super friendly and helpful staff, and — maybe most importantly — a comfortable, quiet night of sleep. The room was also pretty big, especially for NYC.

title: We love 1Hotel Central Park
text: We have been staying here twice a year since 2015 and can't imagine staying anywhere else in the City. The hospitality is genuine and the environment is truly an oasis. The staff is friendly, helpful, accommodating, delightful and at this point, is like family.  We love the commitment to sustainability that is present in the decor and surroundings.  Jams is a great asset to the hotel as is the fitness center. The rooms are well appointed and add to the restful environment.

title: The best yet
text: I travel to NYC often. I've stayed in many hotels - this is extraordinary. I will never go elsewhere! Refreshingly spotless and comfortable in every way possible with exceptional staff too. A wonderful experience from check in to check out.

title: The best experience!
text: 1 hotel Central Park will be our new go to when visiting NYC! Not only was the hotel beautiful, clean and refreshing but the staff made our stay beyond memorable! Everyone at the front desk, all the door men, GK and especially Chris M. made this the best trip we have been on in years. Chris was attentive, accommodating and went above and beyond when working with us to ensure we had the best trip. I could go on and on about how special they made us feel, we didn't want to leave! Thank you to all the staff at 1 hotel Central Park, your customer service was amazing!

title: Nice stay
text: Appreciated the filtered sink water and shower (great pressure as well).  As other reviewers have mentioned, the rooms are small.  I did not have enough counter space to put my toiletry items or makeup in the bathroom, so ended up using the living area for storing my toiletry items.  Great night sleep though and appreciated that the room could be pitch black (which is rare in a hotel room).  Food was great.

title: Wonderful staff in an unbeatable location
text: My wife & I stayed at the 1 Hotel Central Park for a weekend getaway to the city. We booked the hotel because of it's fantastic location and proximity to Central Park. However, what will make us come back in the future is the spectacular service and treatment by staff. They are amazing! We were traveling with 2 young kids, and from the initial moment where we met Shane - he went above and beyond to make sure that we were comfortable. Even sharing that he had a young child of his own. We loved our weekend and thank you to the staff, and in particular Shane!

title: Lovely hotel
text: Lovely hotel, fantastic staff, comfortable and well equipped rooms. Great location too on 6th Avenue, one block from Central Park. Perfect for our stay in NYC. From check in right through to check out we were looked after. Loved the funky style of the hotel too.

title: Great service!
text: Mamun made our brunch experience amazing! Gave great recommendations and great overall service! The food and drinks were excellent. Food and drinks came out quickly and the overall atmosphere was wonderful. Would definitely come back!!

title: Not as expected!
text: A friend of my recommended me this Hotel and I had high expectations of it as a 5 starHotel. I stepped out and had asked housekeeper on 14th floor if she could clean while I was away for 5hours and when I came back, it was not clean. Later when I asked her for just replenished the towels and garbage, the towels she gave had stains on it! Also, while staying at it, there was lots of noise as one of the manager was talking loud on her EarPods  with her curly high pitched voice. Overall unfortunately it was not a pleasant stay as well as did not live up to the 5star hotel!!!

title: Warm and Inviting
text:
Loved everything about this hotel. 
An oasis in the city that is committed to sustainability. 

Felt the vibe was one of peace and tranquility. 
Got a great sleep in a bolt hole of calm. 

Also loved the room service dinner - healthy and fresh. 
Will def stay again

title: Great Stay
text:
Amazing views, great staff, fantastic cocktails and food. Always feel like I’m in the comfort of my own home when I stay, and love the sustainability efforts too. Most importantly, the beds and sheets are the best.

Cheers,

title: Restaurant
text:
We stayed at 1hotel for one week having breakfast everyday in the restaurant.
The food is good and the staff very kind our server Rowan always welcomed us with a smile,remembered our orders and made our day start with a good mood.

title: Love this hotel!
text: Such a cool hotel, great outdoorsy/green theme.   One of my favorite places to stay in NY, with reasonable prices.  Very very clean.  Comfortable beds, great linens, spacious bathroom and showers, great water pressure.  Enjoy relaxing in the window seat and reading a book in the evening, looking over 6th avenue.  1 block from Central Park.   Nice restaurant/bar (Jams) downstairs.  Rowan was my server one morning - he was awesome!   Super customer service all around!

title: Amazing stay at 1 Hotel Central Park!
text: My husband and I had the best stay at the 1 Hotel Central Park for my birthday! From the time we booked, we felt taken care of:  Michael in the concierge space, helped us book delish restaurants, fun comedy, and made the trip so pleasurable! Andrew and Shane greeted us at the door and helped welcome us and make sure we had rides where we need to go. Christopher checked us in with a big smile and easy check in and a perfect room. Our stay was so nourishing and festive and a great birthday celebration! We look forward to coming back soon! Thank you!

title: Comfy with a great location
text: Really enjoyed our stay.  Great staff, and great location.  Walking distance to shopping and dining, and Central Park was only one block away.  Jams restaurant had good food and drinks.  Peloton bikes in the workout room was a plus.  Would definitely recommend it.

title: Jams Brunch
text:
We stopped in at 1 Hotel Central park for Brunch.  The food was delicious, I had the Brioche French Toast. This was the best French Toast I ever had the Brioche bread was nice and soft with the outside buttery and  toast.  The only thing better than the food was our waiter Tarel.  He was very attentive and wanted to make our eating experience great.  The next time I'm in New York I will definitely visit again, hopefully Tarel will be there.

Penny

title: Beautiful, clean hotel in the heart of the city!
text: Had a wonderful stay at 1 Hotel Central Park. The hotel was beautiful, clean and the staff was incredibly friendly. By far one of the nicest hotels I have ever stayed. Thanks Rowan for being a phenomenal server at Jams!

title: Comfortable hotel, great midtown location, lovely staff
text: Great stay here. Rooms are really comfortable. Staff are great. Breakfast menu is small but tasty with fresh healthy ingredients and the servers in the restaurant are very good. Special mention to the night manager Paul and my restaurant server Rowan; both were super helpful and friendly.

title: 10/10 SERVICE!
text: Went for breakfast. My server tarell was extremely polite and helpful. I was unsure what to order, and Tarell recommended the chia pudding and other wonderful items on the menu. He definitely helped make my experience such an amazing one. I will definitely be back!

title: Jams visit
text: Me and my husband had a wonderful dinner at JAMS and let me tell you, it was everything we needed! The staff is wonderful and the service we got was exceptional and welcoming. We tried the special salad and it was delicious. Our waitress Maria was very helpful and charming. She gave us nice suggestions what to visit in NYC. The real plants around the restaurant is a nice touch. We are coming back, thank you!

title: Eco-themed Hotel with Great Service in Midtown
text: The natural/sustainability theme is something quite different for a New York hotel in a super-convenient Midtown location. Lots of wood and plants, plus a chill vibe. Quiet room with super-nice bedding, too. Emerson Kerr in guest services was responsive and very helpful! Great stay!

title: Lovely property
text: Wonderful location, sparkling clean rooms/property and delicious restaurant.  The proximity to theater, the Park, Columbus Circle/Bergdorf/Shopping is bar none the best. Staff is friendly and helpful.  Felt safe and the room design was warm & eclectic. Would stay again and recommend.

title: Amazing Staff and Beautiful Hotel
text: The staff was so accommodating and wonderful when I needed to check out early. Beautiful, clean, stylish hotel and the rooms were cozy but chic. The restaurant was amazing and offered delicious healthy options

title: We love this hotel
text: We love this hotel!  Comfortable, calming decor; friendly, efficient staff; excellent breakfast.  We enjoy the fresh fruit that you can pick up in the lobby.  Shane helped us get out the door and off to Penn Station in such a nice way.

title: So good!!
text: My friends and I took a girls trip to NY and our first stop was the 1 Hotel Central Park. We were greeted by the most wonderful server Tarell!! It was pretty busy when we went but the service was impeccable. The food was great and the drinks were delicious. At the end of our meal, Tarell gave us a list of things we had to do and see during our trip in NY. We can’t wait to come back!!

title: Great service
text: The restaurant had a nice ambience to it and I had a very enjoyable experience. The French toast was great. The server, Tarell, was very welcoming and did a stellar job making sure I was taken care of during my visit. A great way to start my visit in the city.

title: Family big birthday
text:
This was a special occasion for us and we wanted somewhere where we were made to feel special, and the team here know how to deliver. 
The reception team are on the ball , really welcoming and efficient. 
With the help of the concierge ( who helped with most of our day to day planning) were not only knowledgeable but pulled off what we couldn’t have done on our own.
Bar and kitchen staff really hospitable.
On the front door GK was outstanding with his friendly , courteous and professional approach. 
Surely this hotel must be the best of its kind in Manhattan.

title: Recommend
text: Emda was very kind and the service here was great. 100% recommend for a chill family brunch in nyc. Food was great. Burger was delicious and coffee at the start was also great. Central Park is also a walk away after.

title: A perfect brunch
text:
We had a beautiful anniversary brunch- the atmosphere and food were great and our server Emda was perfect!
Would definitely go again!
Almond Croissant was delicious along with the Greek yogurt granola parfait ❤️

title: Brunch at Jams
text: Me and my family had brunch at Jams and it was delicious!!  The ambience of the restaurant is great as well as the location just infront of central park! As well thank you very much to Tarell for his amazing and prompt service!

title: Wonderful stay in NYC
text: Just a block from Central Park, Hotel 1 is a great hotel- This is a smaller hotel, with all the accommodations you need to feel at home. Staff was always friendly- Christopher checked us in, shared the details of the location and hotel and was incredibly welcoming. Thank you!

title: Stay at 1Hotel Central Park
text: Awesome staff and experience as usual…Christopher at the front desk is the best. Always friendly and helpful, makes my stay even better! Jams restaurant is great for hosting meetings, breakfast, lunch or dinner.

title: Exceptional Service
text:
It was my first time staying at The One Hotel. I was met with a friendly staff and loved my overall experience. Particularly I met Murat and he was so genuine and welcoming and really went above and beyond to ensure I had a pleasant experience. 

I look forward to my next visit!

title: Exceptional Experience
text: First time to any 1 Hotel and this property sets the standard at a extremely high level. The team is on it. They are gracious and warm. It’s gorgeous with intimate details that elevated my stay. The location is perfect. I love that they have a program that lets you donate garments you would rather not take back home. The food in the restaurant is so good that I had the majority of my meals there or in my room. S/o to our server, Tarell, who was slammed w a big party at another table but never rushed us and made great recommendations with a warm smile. I only wish these were in every city on the travel schedule. Love that the room has Chromecast and glas shower.

title: Great stay!
text: FUN and amazing atmosphere!!! From the moment you walk in your in a special place.  Rooms are larger than most boutique hotels and the staff is weel trained and helpful. Looking forward to next visit. Thank you!

title: Lovely hotel with bad restaurant
text:
lovely hotel, boutique style, intimate, friendly and attentive service.
Comfortable bed, everything I needed in the room was there.

Four stars are due to badly prepared breakfast at their restaurant. Frittata was not good at all, watery coffee.
No need to eat there, plenty of places around.

title: A Garden Oasis in NYC
text: 1 Hotel Central Park is a beautiful hotel close to everything.  The hotel lobby is gorgeous and inspires a green garden oasis.  We loved the bar and the common areas.  The room is spacious enough for 2, the in room Nespresso is wonderful, and so is the fact that all the water is filtered!  Chris at the front desk made check in and check out warm, welcoming and fast!  We can't wait to come back!

title: Emerson is the bomb!
text:
due to inclement weather on Dec 23rd, our flight was several hours delayed.  i was in contact with emerson at the front desk several times updating him of our arrival times. even though we finally arrived at 1am after his shift was over, he had left instructions for the night shift about our impending arrival.  
and the next morning, he expedited our upgrade to a slightly bigger room.

title: Great Hotel, Great Service!  Thank you Christopher!!!!
text:
I love this hotel.  I grew up in New York but moved to Los Angeles 6 years ago and One Hotel is the one I always stay at.  Great location, love the ambiance and commitment to an environmentally friendly experience.

Christopher at the front desk is the best!  He treated us like we were special, trying to make us comfortable and going the extra mile to make us happy.  I feel like I have a friend at the hotel.  I've travelled a lot over the years and I can tell you Chris would be a gift to any hotel.

title: My favorite in NYC!
text:
Definitely my favorite hotel in NYC knowing that I have visited many others ...
The spirit of this hotel is really something...It feels home !
I cant go from there without buying their candle with their famous smell that you have everywhere in this hotel and that makes feel so warm and cosy :)
The hotel is really comfortable with a great location next to Central Park but what makes it more special is the people working there.
Special mention to the incredible Michael at the reception who will make you feel so comfortable and will do anything to make your stay an amazing experience and the amazing Emda at the restaurant! This guy will always find a solution even if you order strange things not on the menu (me) he will manage to please you always with a warm smile and good mood! thank you Emda and thank you all the crew!

title: Best in NYC - and close to Central Park, the Subway, Nordy's, The Plaza, Bergdorf's etc. etc.
text: Can't say enough great things abut this property, location and THE STAFF. Shane at the front door, Andrew, the entire FRONT DESK and Concierge team; they're all truly excellent at their job and make staying here feel like a home away from home. Major bonus; all of the living plants make this urban space feel alive in the best factual way.

title: Location, Rooms & Hotel Staff Are Wonderful
text: Great room size for nyc and location can't be beat. The jam restaurant hostess was rude and she was not accommodating, I was very unpleasantly surprised. The Rooms were beautiful light and easy to go up and down to the lobby, felt safe as well. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful.

title: Best Hotel Experience in NYC
text: My flight was cancelled and I found this hotel at the airport on booking.com. I am so grateful I did.It's the type of place that makes you feel at home and cared for by all the staff. It was also my first stay in 1 Hotels but I booked it because of the price, room and location. I needed something that could accommodate working in the room. Kyle was so present and knowledgable right when I checked in. The lobby smells like a Le Labo fragrance shop. Best accommodations, gym, bed, room service, and hospitality I have experienced in years. I will be booking at 1 throughout the world.

title: Comfortable and peaceful
text: The lobby is a welcome oasis from the city streets, and I was quickly taken care of by the front desk. The elevators respond rapidly and there's never a long wait. The room has a modern HVAC installation that works nicely. It is extremely well appointed. The bathroom is separated from the main living area with a glass expanse that can be covered with a curtain for privacy. The shower is strong and has excellent temperature adjustment. There's no view to speak of, at least not on the 9th floor, and the noise from nearby construction and street is muted to a moderate extent by the windows (it's not perfect, but you can easily get a good night's sleep). The bedding is very comfortable. There's a rack of apples by the elevator in the lobby and I frequently found myself grabbing one for a snack. Overall, the entire location is well-managed, well-staffed, and well-appointed. High marks.

title: You want to come back!
text:
Absolute perfection! 
We love 1 Hotel Central Park. Its location is fantastic, overlooking Central Park & within walking distance of many sightseeing sides! One of the best things are the windows nooks. We love the architecture and used materials. The service was impeccable. We will come back.

title: Perfection
text: Location was perfect, hotel was amazing. Loved our adjoining suite for our teen boys and us. Couldn't have been better for our family stay. Chose the hotel for the easy laid back vibe and their sustainable practices and found so much more to love. Value ended up being better than I expected too - got a great discount for staying more than 3 nights by booking on their website...we stayed 5.

title: A well located and cozy place in the heart of Central Park.
text: It was my second stay in 1 Hotel (first was in Miami) and I really enjoy the eco sustentability and friendly-cool vibe of the hotel, which is very well-located in NY. The room are not too spacious. The restaurant is good, but there is lack of options. I missed a wellness center.

title: O melhor atendimento no melhor Hotel de New York e na melhor localização
text: O 1 Hotel Central Park é maravilhoso em todos os detalhes. No atendimento são nota 10, em especial o sr. Christopher na frente e o sr. Luiz concierge. Equipe super atenciosa. Hotel impecável. Nada de plástico, tudo natural. A melhor localização, uma quadra di Central Park. Com certeza, a nossa casa quando estivermos em New York

title: Breakfast
text:
My family ate at the restaurant and Emda serves us…..he was great!!! Food was great!!!
He was very attentive and the food came out quick. If you are in the area stop in and request Emda. I will be back.

title: Great service and food!
text: We ate at the restaurant and it was AMAZING. We went for brunch and it was so yummy. Ordered such an array of food and every meal was so good. Our server Emda was PHENOMENAL. Party of 10 and we were served quickly and he gave us tips and ideas for what to order.

title: Jams Restaurant
text: We celebrated my birthday brunch at Jams. Emda was our waiter and went above and beyond to make the experience special. The food was delicious and the attention to detail from Emda made it extra special. We love Jams and will be back again soon!

title: Great ambiance and food
text: We had a wonderful experience at the restaurant with Kiri as our server at Jams. Beautiful evening complimented by her thoughtful recommendations and kindness. Thank you so much Kiri! We will absolutely be back!

title: Didn’t deliver in parity with the rate
text:
Great location and theme. But when we arrived at the hotel about 5pm, after a long flight from Sweden, our room (4 person family) was not ready. I find this unacceptable for such expensive and high aiming hotel. We were offered a 100USD credit at the bar while waiting, which ended up being 1.5 hours. This compensation doesn’t at all reflect the level of the mistake they did by not having the room ready in time. We stayed for 6 nights, so we should have been offered relevant compensation. 
I will not stay at this hotel again.

title: Super hôtel mais chambres décevantes.
text:
Nous sommes une famille de 4 (2 adultes et 2 ados) et avons pris 2 chambres: 1x City King + 1x Alcôve Junior Suite et l’hôtel nous a mis dans la 901 et 903 qui avaient l’avantage d’être communicantes. Malheureusement nous avons été déçus par les chambres… 
Rappelons que pour 4 nuits nous en avions pour plus de 7.500€!!! Et à ce prix là nous étions seulement au 9eme étage avec une vue horrible dans une cour sale et sombre. Dans la 901 il y avait le bruit de l’ascenseur de service (qui est collé à la salle de bain) ce qui dérangeait même la nuit et un bruit d’évacuation de douche énorme et anormal. Aucun luminosité dans le salon qui était décevant. Nous avons signalé cela et avons eu seulement 179€ de remboursement. Peut-être que les chambres avec vue sur Central Park et en hauteur sont mieux. 
Pour info les salle de bain donnent sur les chambres avec seulement un rideau pour se cacher de la chambre et les WC sont dedans (non séparées) donc peu pratique quand on partage la salle de bain. 
Par contre le personnel est adorable et les parties communes très belles, la déco à la fois chic et éco-responsable. 
L’emplacement de l’hôtel est top pour accéder à Central Park, Times Square, la 5eme,…

title: Very good place and delicious food👍👍👍
text: I like the food,i like the place.Espessaly our waiter Kiri,she was so nice.Thank you i will advise this restaurant .We went with family and kids liked the food so much.Clean place and also good mucic.

title: Pre-Christmas stay at 1 Hotel Central Park
text: I can't say enough about this hotel. Beyond the awesome sustainability philosophy of the 1 Hotel brand, the staff (or 1 Team as they are known) at this property consistently go above & beyond to make your stay incredible. Management truly cares about not only the physical environment at the hotel itself (we were first here in 2017 and the hotel has never looked better) but ensures the 1 Team is focused on customer satisfaction, and then some! We stayed here the week before Christmas and unfortunately had to cut our trip short by a day as a big winter storm was forecast for our last day. The 1 Team took such great care of us - starting with Chester at check-in, explaining all the aspects of the hotel (and greeting us in the mornings as if we were part of the family) and then Flo, wanting to be sure our room met all our expectations.  Brayam and Luis, the Concierge team, gave us great recommendations on what to do, and what to see, and handled our restaurant bookings. When we told the team we were excited to see a Knicks game later in the week (our first time at Madison Square Garden), Andrew & Flo sent up a sweet plate of cookies and chocolate and wished us a great time at the game. Such a thoughtful gesture! We were going to grab an Uber to MSG when at the last minute, Chester flagged down the Hotel's Electric Audi courtesy car for us. Talk about being driven in style to the game! One morning while waiting for my family at Jams for breakfast, Nicole the hostess saw I was alone and struck up a conversation with me, and made sure to sit me next to a power outlet to charge my phone while I waited. She also held our table until my family arrived. Again, it's these small gestures that really do make a difference! As we had to depart a day early, Josh at the Front Desk made sure our bill was adjusted, and ensured our last dinner reservation for that night was cancelled. Luis recommended an excellent restaurant (Sarabeth's) very near the hotel for our 'last breakfast'. It was excellent. All in all, we can't wait to come back to NYC & the 1 Hotel Central Park. The hotel is fantastic but it's the 1 Team that makes this the best hotel in NYC! Congrats 1 Team on exceeding our expectations once again!

title: Extraordinary service by Rowan!
text:
I heard a lot of good things so finally we visit on last Tuesday.
wow great Ambien 
nice and fresh food and yummy definitely. 
I just love avocado toast.
excellent service with knowledgeable by Rowan.
very nice and clean.. 
highly recommended.

title: Excellent service - ask for Emda
text: Excellent food and service at Jams, the 1 Hotel Central Park restaurant. Emda was our server and he went above and beyond. Super attentive and took his time to walk me through all the items on the menu that can be prepared gluten free. If you’re staying at this hotel or anywhere in midtown, definitely check this place out.

title: Jams brunch
text: Had a great experience at this hotel! Came to Jams for brunch and Emda helped us. He was super nice and helpful. Great service and excellent food! Highly recommend. The ambience is super cute here and it’s not overly crowded. The music was great. Overall really enjoyed our brunch at Jams with Emda

title: Emda was the best server at jams
text: We had the best service with emda. He was so accommodating even though our order was incredibly complicated with our dietary restrictions. Restaurant had excellent French toast. I’ll be back hopefully with emda as my waiter at jams. Great hotel stay too

title: Jams Restaurant
text: We had a lovely experience at Jams. The food was amazing and the service was perfection. Emda was our waiter and he was the best waiter we ever had. We come to Jams a few times a month - it’s a perfect option for Saturday / Sunday brunch and always leave happy (especially with Emda as our waiter). Highly recommend

title: Jams (Emda Server)
text: I visited the Jams restaurant with my sister and Emda was our amazing server! He had the best customer service and made it a great experience. Absolutely one of the best servers I have ever had and the food was also fantastic!

title: Christmas 2022
text: An excellent hotel with a great location and very attentive and friendly staff. Great base for exploring uptown NYC. Jams was lovely, and the lobby was very comfortable. It was expensive, but given the time of year and location, it was good value.

title: We loved Jams!
text: Emda was a great server for us at Jams! He made sure we were always taken care of, very friendly, would most definitely come back again. The French toast was great, my wife had the Avocado toast and said it was amazing!

title: Best  restaurant close to Central Park
text: I visited Jams at 1 hotel, ever since I walked in the door i felt i was transported into a different space in the middle of hectic NY streets the atmosphere is lovely and the plants make you actually beat in the area, the host Cailah was super kind and even thou i was a couple of minutes late she accommodates us in a beautiful table, where Saydimar immediately greeted us our server who was kind and made on point suggestions we end up trying the kale salad, and a bison special that literally melted in our mouths it was delicious i totally recommend this place for couples and groups.

title: Best Hotel Brand out there.
text: The room is emaculate. The team at 1 hotel is phenomenal, always attentive to your needs. Friendly, individuals who make the time to know who you are and help you out with whatever you need. I highly recommend this brand hotel to all individuals. You will not be disappointed.

title: Great hotel in a perfect location for NYC
text: We loved staying there. You can walk everywhere and are right across the street from Central Park. The hotel has a nice lobby, good bar and restaurant and the rooms are comfortable . Jams is popular and has good food. The concierge and front desk are very attentive, kind and helpful. We loved it !9

title: Central Park Gem
text: Although the rooms are a little on the small side, this was the perfect place in terms of location for a Christmas break. I loved that the Bergdorf window displays were right down the street. Love the sustainability commitment. Only wish I'd been placed on a higher floor to really enjoy the Central Park View more. I'd stay again, but definitely prefer the 1 Hotel Brooklyn Bridge better.

title: Excellent Stay
text: This is our second year staying at the 1 Hotel Central Park and they again exceeded expectations.  The hotel gives you a warm cozy feeling with all of the beautiful materials and plants used throughout the lobby restaurant and rooms.

title: Great restaurant
text:
Great service and a good place to start the day with a good breakfast ! 
Nearby central park makes it nice to go before or after breakfast for a morning straw.
The menu is also very good with a lot of variation! 
Compliments to Roukan for the good service!

title: Amazing as Always
text: Staff is always so friendly as we have stayed there many times and in other states. We asked for a room with two double beds and they quickly accommodated. The rooms are always so clean and have everything we need. And of course the One Hotel scent is now my favorite whether traveling to your hotel or in my home. See you in Hawaii

title: Review
text:
My first time in NYC and even though this hotel is downtown I had the best sleep ever. The interior design is beautiful and very detailed. The service impressed me and I ultimately had a good time at this hotel. 

I visited this hotel with a few family members. We were 7 in total. Rowan and especially Jacqueline did an amazing job as a waiter and made sure everything was like it was supposed to be. I definitely recommend this hotel to others planning a trio to NYC.

title: Hotel 1 restaurant: nice for family
text: We stayer in the restaurant. Good food, variety in menu and fresh vibe. Extra decoration during christmas holiday season. Emda was very kind and polite in serving us. Thanks for having us and maube see you in the next year 2023!!

title: Great restaurant
text: Wonderful experience at the restaurant with Emda. We had a great lunch and we were able to relax and really enjoy our time there. I recommend the lobster roll if you have a chance is quite good. Have fun.

title: Amazing!!
text: Our stay at the hotel was magnificent. We enjoyed our room view and scenery. Room was well organized and clean. We really appreciated  the staff especially Anderson and Josue, whom gave us some great touring sites to visit. We would definitely stay at this hotel again.

title: Excellent
text:
From check in to check out the service was excellent.  Great bar, breakfast & lunch. Our room was beautiful.
Mr. GK at the door was welcoming and very attentive.  Great location, great service, beautiful hotel and great staff.   Thank You!

title: JAMS - Thank you Rowan for your kind and exceptional service!
text:
Visiting from San Francisco.  Stopped for breakfast at JAMS before skating at Wollman Rink in Central Park.   Easy to walk to JAMS from midtown hotel, even easier walk to Central Park.   Restaurant has beautiful, cozy decor.  Seated right away without reservations.   Served by a kind and elegant server named Rowan who answered all of our questions and served us a delicious, healthy and fresh meal with kindness and attentiveness.     My daughter gave the Katsu breakfast sandwich rave reviews and I had the freshest salmon bagel with the best - large capers with stems.    Rowan encouraged me to get the green juice - which I will be returning for.  :)

We thank you Rowan for making our experience at JAMS so lovely that we hope to see you before we go back to California!  Wishing you the same kindness you showed us in the New Year.

title: Christmas in NYC!
text: I never write reviews but I was blown away by 1 Central Park! The location is perfect, just steps away from Central Park, Times Square, 5th Avenue and Rockefeller center where me and my family fell in love with Christmas in NYC! But it was the staff at this hotel that has me writing this review. After originally booking at another property (which was a nightmare), we stopped by 1 Central Park and were greeted by Josue and Chester, who showed us a room and got us a great deal for a last minute change on a busy holiday weekend. My family loved the decor and my kids were even interested in the eco-friendly aspect of the hotel. Anderson the best photographer/bellman in NYC took great care of us through out our stay and even recorded a TikTok for my kids. The rooms here are on the smaller side but the hotel makes up for it with an amazing staff. Merry Christmas to everyone at 1 Hotel Central Park and have a Happy New Year!

title: Great Experience!!
text: The 1 hotel Central Park is simple great: clean, sunstainable, and the employees are very very helpful and friendly. At the breakfast Rowan was amazing! He took every wishes we had seriously and was happy to please us.

title: Very nice hotel!
text: The hotel is very pretty, the room looked beautiful, and the gym has everything you would want for a nice workout, except for a pull up bar or lay pull-down. In the restaurant, the food we had for breakfast was great, Rowan was a nice and friendly server!

title: Great new central hotel!
text: My daughter and I decided to stay at 1 Hotel for our pre-Christmas holiday. The hotel was very central to all we had to do and see in NYC and overall is an excellent value. I have been to the chic location in Hollywood, CA (we are from Los Angeles) and had loved it as well. This was a great little spot and was perfect for our mini-vacation in the city. The lobby was super cozy with plenty of seating to chill with a glass of wine and was decorated so beautifully for the holidays. The rooms were extremely clean and well-appointed. Not overly luxurious, but the bathrooms were spacious and had great lighting. Everyone on staff was very helpful, nice and super accomodating. The menu at Jams was a bit limited and we had hoped to see a bit more offered especially for dinner, but everything tasted great and was delivered very quick. Housekeeping was also fantastic and the rooms were always very neat  and tidy. They were very accommodating especially because my daughter had a head cold and they let us stay in the room late and still managed to have someone service the room which was so helpful. I know that bed comfort is a hard thing to rate as it is such an individual preference, so I say this with that caveat in mind but I found the beds to be a bit too hard for me and made it difficult to sleep. But I am super light and not the average size where most would prefer a more stiff bed so I am sure this would be comfortable for most. The location couldn't be more perfect. It was one block from Central Park, Subway stations, 5th Avenue shopping (Bergdorf's,, Tiffany's etc.). There is a Starbuck's across the street along with a wonderful Merci Market filled with everything you could ever need. I loved our location, the hotel and the staff! We will definitely stay here again!

title: Emda was great!
text:
My boyfriend and I dined at Jams and Emda was our server, He was great and took very good care of us! 
Emda was kind and polite and always had a smile:) 
We had the burger and it was amazing.
Thank you Emda for this experience!

title: Restaurant
text: Great service! Rowan went above and beyond to make our meal great. He was very attentive and ensured that our meal with our two toddlers was exceptional. Our toddlers had the New York strip steak, medium rare, and they loved it! It was cooked to perfection and really juicy. The seasonal gnocchi that we ordered was spectacular as well.

title: Cold, cramped rooms
text: This hotel has a great location, great service and great food. The room we had was a suite and I can’t imagine what the smallest rooms were like though. We basically lived out of our suitcases on the floor with clothes on the couch and bed because there were no drawers or anywhere to keep your things. The heater and thermostat didn’t work properly and the room was freezing. Had to have maintenance come three separate times to try and fix and reset the system. Finally we just accepted that the room was going to be cold and slept in warm clothes and socks. Too much money to pay for cramped rooms and no temperature control.

title: Jams
text: Edma was exceptional waiter so is the food:) we had a burger a chicken and fish tacos. Everything tastes really good, very tasty. thank you so much, will be back. All the staff is helpful and very friendly

title: Great facilities great staff
text: When entering the hotel you are met with wonderful people and an equally wonderful lobby. The start of our experience was foreshadowing the rest of the stay here at the one hotel as we went on to meet many more pleasant staff such as Emda, to name just one. This hotel is a great pick and I really don’t think you will find anything quite as unique as it within New York.

title: Great hotel and restaurant!
text: The hotel is wonderful and cozy. The restaurant Jams is the perfect sanctuary amongst the concrete jungle. We ate here three times and our server, Emda, served us each time. He was very professional, attentive and knowledgeable about the menu. His service topped off what was already a great experience.

title: 5 Stars, For Sure
text: Our parents have stayed before, but this was our first time here as a family. Not only is the space visually stunning, but the service is impeccable, including that of Kiri and Emda in the restaurant. Thanks for such a lovely time!

title: Jams NYC
text: Went for brunch, the place is super cozy with top notch decorations. Our sever was Rowan great service he was very attentive and helpful. The food was great they have an excellent variety of dishes for everyone. Totally recommend this restaurant

title: Cates Family Christmas 2022
text: We have had an incredible time when in NYC. The 1 Hotel at Central Park has been great and our entire group loves the quality. All the staff from front desk, concierge and dining room have made this stay memorable and special. Server Rowan was especially helpful and we were expressed by his service.

title: Love the service!
text: This was my second time staying at the hotel. Stuff is very nice and professional. Chester made the check-in after a long flight very pleasant and quick.  Guizel at the restaurant was very sweet and helpful. Currently my favorite restaurant in NYC!

title: Breakfast at the 1 hotel
text: We were given a table very quickly and our server Rowan was very friendly. They were able to adapt the food to our wants and needs and it came fairly fast. The food was excellent and we were satisfied with our meal

title: Best NY Hotel
text: Cannot say enough about the 1 Hotel in Central Park! I LOVE this hotel brand and this location did not disappoint. Central location. Amazing staff. Cozy rooms. The restaurant is amazing. Room service fast and easy. The signature smell and sustainable mission keep me coming back!

title: Amazing welcoming staff
text:
We have had a great experience in general and loved the meal at the restaurant
Staff were friendly and helpful 
The front desk lady called Mariam was so welcoming and smiley 
The food was good, we were met by the manager Guzel who gave us a warm welcome and checked in with us 
Thank you all for the great service

title: The location was super, and all the green in the hotel was really nice!!
text: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel, the rooms were wonderfull, the staff was very kind!! Especially Emda the waiter in the restaurant was real kind for us. We enjoyed our breakfast as well!! And the free fresh apple’s in the lobby was genius.

title: Great atmosphere! Great service! Great food!
text: Such a lovely atmosphere in the restaurant. Our server Emda was very friendly, professional and attentive ensuring we had a great experience (which we did). Additionally, a huge mention to the chefs, the food was  absolutely delicious that I would’ve kept eating if I could’ve!

title: Gorgeous hotel close to everything
text: Perfectly situated hotel, walking distance from central park, Rockefeller center, Carnegie hall and the Moma! The decor, is simple, clean, and modern. My room had a  nook next to the window that was soooo cute. The staff is great, especially Josue he was super helpful and gave me wonderful recommendations for restaurants and activities. I also loved the shampoo and conditioner, they provide great quality products.

title: Christmas lunch
text: Na een heerlijke wandeling in Central Park kwamen we terecht bij 1 Hotel en dit was een heerlijke middag met een fijne lunch. Het heeft een hele fijne atmosfeer en goede service, Emda heeft een topservice gegeven. Zeker voor herhaling vatbaar.

title: Emdadul - thank you for your service
text: I loved the vibes in Jams and the food was good too. However the best thing about Jams was the service that we received from Emdadul. He provided the best service that we have received in New York so far in the 10 days that we have been here. Thank you very much :)

title: Emdadul is the BEST sever ever !
text:
Wow, we had Christmas brunch at Jams and had the best day ever. We were served by the friendliest, smilest, warmest and welcoming server called Emdadul. 

I've been on holiday in NYC for 2 weeks and he is possibly the best server I've had here and ever.

Such a lovely man, quick to serve us, amazing professionalism and would love him to be my server all the time.

What an amazing restaurant with delicious food and vibes.

Thanks again Emdadul.

Merry Christmas 🎅

title: Thank you Emdadul
text: Had a Christmas Day brunch at Jams and Emdadul made our visit special. Thank you very much. He was very attentive, efficient, warm, smiley and caring. The food was good too however we would not have had the same experience without him.

title: Lovely Christmas Brunch
text: My friend and I went for Christmas brunch and had a lovely meal! The food is wonderful and the staff, especially Emda, were super kind and attentive. Will come again when in NYC! It’s a beautiful spot

title: Go have brunch at Jams!
text: We loved our Christmas Brunch at Jams at 1 Hotel Central Park. To me, service can make or break a meal and this was definitely a service winner!! Our server Emda was amazing and helped us celebrate my wife’s birthday with a smile and impeccable service. The croissants were tasty and authentic, the French toast was rich and satisfying, and the Benedict was a true classic done to perfection. We loved the organic greenery and the lighthearted ambience made for a wonderful experience. So glad we chose to dine here!

title: A great place for Christmas in New York!
text: We had our Christmas lunch at Jams. The food was fantastic however our waiter Emda was exceptional! He was so welcoming and really made our Christmas lunch a special one. Thanks Jams and thanks Emda for making our New York Christmas memorable!

title: A perfect holiday stay
text: We loved our visit to the 1 Hotel. It was extremely festive and felt homey during the holidays. We loved our breakfast at Jams, thanks to our server Rowan - he couldn’t have been more helpful. Happy holidays!

title: Holiday season
text: This was my first stay at this hotel, staff were all exceptionally helpful and welcoming.  Allowed me to check in early and room was spacious, clean and quiet. Chester, Josue, Milne and Shane were all helpful!  Thank you!!

title: Semplicemente eccezionale staff professionale e simpatico in particolare Rowan dello staff ristorazione
text: Fantastico tutto molto buono e ben cucinato standard alti per New York Rowan che ci ha servito molto attento al cliente gentile e simpatico sicuramente da tornare location bellissima e cibo ottimo staff eccezionale anche nel periodo natalizio tutto perfetto

title: Amazing Stay
text:
We arrived into NYC from Philadelphia in the afternoon before our scheduled check in time. Christopher made sure we got into a room right away which included a complimentary upgrade. He was so nice and friendly throughout our stay. As was Gene who was very helpful assisting us with our luggage and Uber. The hotel its self was a breath of fresh air and embodied ecofriendly.   I especially liked the note by the bed that said if you overpacked they would donate any clothing item you left behind.

Wonderful stay, we highly recommend this hotel.

title: OFF THE CHARTS EXPERIENCE AT 1 HOTEL CENTRAL PARK!!!
text: My daughter and I stayed at this IMPECCABLE property the weekend before Christmas 2022. We were blown away by the kindness of the staff, the beauty and warmth of the hotel, superlative dining experience at Jams and this hotel could not be in a better location. I am highly recommending 1 Hotel Central Park to all of our friends. 5 STARS ALL THE WAY!! And, a huge shout out to Chester, Fio, Luis, Shane, Nirio and Josue for making us feel so welcomed. You all are the best!! :)

title: 3rd Visit to 1 Hotel Central Park
text:
This is my 3rd stay at 1 Hotel. 

Your first steps inside are welcomed by the friendliest host, but the design, decor, and fragrance slowly melts you into this warm & cozy space. I've been to many hotels and they were overly modernized...too trendy. Here, you feel the intention of bringing nature and earthiness in. The space ushers you into a relaxed state. I loved all the beautiful plants lacing the walls, the construction of the furniture, the water feature, that sounds and feels like a waterfall. 

The location is great, as you are steps away from Central Park and midtown. This is definitely a wonderful location for all tourists.

And, Jams, is one of my favorite restaurants when visiting. The kale caesar salad with the roasted chicken is just amazing! The fries, the calamari, and finally, the chocolate chip cookies were all a win!

I would recommend this to couples and families. 

Look forward to my next stay in February!

title: Customer service
text: This hotel is absolutely clean and beautiful! GK gave my friends and I the warmest welcome to the hotel. He is genuinely a kind person, helped us with parking and luggage! Excellent services and I will be coming again!

title: Awesome experience. Awesome staff
text:
Enjoyed the entire experience !  At the restaurant Friday evening Luis Morales served our table. He was absolutely super. So attentive and professional. He helped make the dinner experiences even that much better.
The room was also beautiful. They upgraded us which we so appreciated. 
Just a great experience from beginning to end

title: A wonderful holiday weekend to remember
text:
My wife and I came to New York with another couple this past weekend for a fun holiday getaway. We had a wonderful time, and our stay at the One Hotel was excellent. All of the staff, from the doormen, the front desk team, the people who clean the rooms that we met in the halls, and everyone in the restaurant, gave us a feeling of being happy, wanting to make our stay to be the best and offer first-class service. A special shout out to Maria at the front desk, I called tonight to see if, for some crazy reason, someone had turned in my wife’s lost earmuffs… after looking at several places, she found them!!
To everyone who works at the One, thank you.

title: The 1 hotel
text: My fiancé and I visit the 1 hotel and it was amazing .. Josue who checked us in  was great and accommodated.  The room was nice, clean and best part id the location is great. It’s a walking distance to Central Park, restaurants etc. Anderson was pleasant and helpful . Would definitely stay there again …

title: First time staying at Hotel 1 Central Park - Beyond Our Expectations
text: We had a wonderful and relaxing experience at 1 Hotel Central Park. Chris gave us the best room with a view and it made our stay. Andrew was extremely helpful securing our luggage and overall we felt very well taken of.

title: Terrible Service
text: Staff could care less if you are there or not from. Bellman to restaurant.   If you need front desk call 3 or 4 times, eventually they will pick up.   Restaurant not busy at all in the morning (early) and fully staffed but you will still have to wait 20-30 minutes to ask for a water - ordering is a completely different timeframe.   The management certainly does not believe in hospitality

title: 1 Hotel Central Park - You're a 100 in our book!
text:
I don't often leave reviews but our stay at 1 Hotel Central Park was so exceptional I had to.  Every detail was perfection and I love that they are focused on sustainability.  The overall feel and vibe from the moment I walked thru the door was wonderful but the best part of this hotel is its staff.  Chester who works at the front desk checked us in and could not have been more helpful and accommodating (Chester you rock!),  We soon met the manager, Murat, who was warm, welcoming and made us feel at home.  He showed us the 2nd floor which I highly recommend if you need to have a meeting or just get some work done in a quite space (we were on a work trip), he even came by and chatted with us at breakfast and brought over a green juice! (thank you for keeping us healthy Murat!)
If you're looking for a comfortable stay in NY where you feel like your surrounded by natures elements and can feel good about participating in sustainability efforts, I recommend checking out the 1 Hotel, we will definitely be back!

title: THIS HOTEL IS SPECIAL!
text:
I recently stayed here at the recommendation of a friend and my 3 night experience was nothing short of SUPERB.  As soon as you walk in, you can see and feel the premium quality and plush vibe.  It didn't feel like a traditional 5 star "hotel".  More like a resort, in the middle of midtown Manhattan!  The staff greeted us warmly and made me and my girlfriend feel right at home.  I had the privilege of meeting the young hotel manager, Murat, who was so polite and attentive to all of our needs.  The hotel was relatively busy, (given it is such a popular place) but everything seemed to be running smoothly due to the excellent staff.  Despite the fact it was busy, Murat made sure that we were well taken care of and that our dining experience was perfect.          
And the FOOD!!  I had the calamari appetizer as well as the Jams chicken and they were both AMAZING.   
I have stayed at many premium hotels, but the 1 Hotel has that rare combination of a luxurious living/dining experience with world class service to boot.   FIVE STARS.   We will be back for sure!!!

title: Great stay in the city
text: Great hotel in a great part of the city, Josue at the front desk was amazing and Anderson was very helpful. The hotel is a short walk to central park and has lots of restaurants to choose from in the area, there's even a wine store across the street. Hope to come back for the thanksgiving day parade next year with the whole family.

title: Amazing Location, Staff and Experience!!
text: I fully recommend this property! It is located in what I would consider the perfect spot! It is walking distance from a lot of the great spots (Radio City, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, Time Square and Broadway) but far enough away that it isn’t too crazy busy. The property itself is spectacular. They really decorated it nice for the holidays. Upon arrival we were greeted by Kyle who really made our night by giving us an upgrade from a Queen bed to a King! We did not specify that my fiancé (now wife) and I were in NY to elope so it really made our elopement experience special. The staff is super friendly and attentive! Heidi followed up after we checked in to make sure that we got all of our packages that we sent to the hotel and even followed up after our stay as one of our packages did not make it in time. She helped me sort out sending the package back which goes above and beyond in my opinion. The staff provided umbrellas when it was raining one day which was super convenient! Two other cool features about the property is that they have a complimentary Audi to take you anywhere in a 15 block radius. My wife and I took it to our ceremony in Central Park. 1 Hotel also has an app which is pretty cool. You can make special requests as well as order room service on the app. The bed was super comfortable too! Definitely will be staying here the next time I am in NY.

title: Hidden Flawless NYC Gem Central Park South
text: I have stayed many times at 1 Hotel Central Park in NYC, and each and every time it’s a flawless and delightful stay.  The hotel has a marvelous international feel, and the entire staff treats you like old friends that are very happy to make your stay the best it could possibly be.

title: Beautiful, nature-centric hotel with great service
text:
My fiancé and I visited 1 Hotel Central Park for the first time in November for my birthday. We couldn’t have dreamed up a better stay! First, the hotel is stunning. I’m a wildlife biologist and love spending time in nature, and 1 Hotel brings a natural sanctuary to the heart of NYC. The decor is absolutely beautiful and creates such a serene, welcoming space. Due to our arrival and departure times, we needed to store our luggage before and after our stay; this was accommodated with ease. Our room ended up being ready early, which we sincerely appreciated. We had a park view room, which was beautifully appointed. My fiancé had ordered a cake and flowers for me, and the staff expertly snuck it in for us while we were out. They even unpacked the cake and set it up with everything we needed for serving. We also enjoyed brunch at Jams. Food and cocktails were equally delicious! I was legitimately sad to leave. 

If you are looking for an elevated experience near Central Park, this is your place for excellent service, beautiful rooms, great food, and thoughtful natural touches. Doesn’t get any better!

title: Amazing experience!
text: Not only was the hotel itself absolutely gorgeous, but we were greeted by a truly amazing team of people who were nice, cheerful and helpful. Kyle at the front desk went above and beyond for us. We had the best trip to NYC as a family and we plan to always stay at 1 hotel Central Park when we visit again in the future!

title: You get what you pay for!
text: It’s our first time in 1 Hotel CP and they set the bar so high. Everyone is very welcoming from check in to check out. Frontdesk was very helpful Chris and Joshua was amazing and very very helpful. Great food at Jam for brekafast. Terrell and Patricia was very welcoming and take care of us during our stay. My room is always on point. Everytime I come back from a long day.

title: Unauthorized charges & NOT a luxury experience
text:
1) For starters, we had to pay for our entire booking up front because we were staying for Thanksgiving—& they seriously price gouge for holidays. They sent us an invoice reflecting a gotcha $32/day “destination fee,” which appeared to have been included in the invoice we’d just paid. However, we learned *after* our visit that the invoice was inaccurate & we weren’t charged the total $156 destination fee until *after* our stay, which was very confusing because we were under the impression it had already been paid. We also had to request the invoice, as they hadn’t sent one for 2 days after taking almost $7k of our money. 
2) My mother was handed 2 bakery items by concierge on Thanksgiving morning…she asked if they were complimentary, to which the employee replied, “yes, of course they are.” However, we ended up being charged $22 for these 2 bakery items—only discovered at checkout. 
3) We expected to only owe about $150 for the extremely overpriced & very small portion-sized green drinks & fish tacos we’d gotten, but instead we were looking at a $322 bill: the drinks, tacos, not-so-complimentary bakery items, & the destination fee we thought we’d already paid. Even worse: the front desk associate didn’t even bother to verify the charges with us or to even notify us that she was attempting to charge the card on file before doing so. She said she was “just checking everything over” & then suddenly declared that the card on file had been declined. This is the point at which we learned about the bakery items & the destination fee. 
4) My husband received a printout today showing that they attempted to charge us an additional $600 for god only knows what—hours before we’d even checked in! They then charged .01 shortly afterward, no doubt trying to test his bank & weasel any money out of us that they could. Then they attempted to charge his card 2x 6 hours before our scheduled checkout (2 hours before our actual checkout)—& when that didn’t work they tried to charge $100…again trying to weasel any money out of us that they could. We ended up corresponding via email regarding the final charges & I was told at 7:30am that we still owed the $322, however, 6 hours later, they attempted to charge my husband’s card $1,735.54!!! When my husband called to ask about it they told him it was the remaining balance for our room. He informed them that we’d been required to pay for our room in full prior to our stay due to the holiday & the man then said that “sometimes the system will just charge random amounts if the first attempt is declined.” …A random amount of over $1,700?!?! They then attempted to charge $302 2x while we were conversing via email; this was apparently after they so generously removed the $22 charge for the *complimentary* bakery items. 
5) Our tv wouldn’t work properly on our final night & they had to send in a tech to get it working. The problem seemed to be resolved but 5 minutes later we were having the exact same problem again. At that point we were too frustrated to bother calling the tech back in. 
6) The Thanksgiving breakfast basket had bland yogurt, stale bakery items (which is why my mom took the complimentary ones from the lobby), and 3 cups worth of coffee in a thermos—& they charged $80 for it! We used our room credit towards the basket but its still a ridiculously high price for a cold breakfast for 2. They also took our basket that still had several items left in it while we were out—so we didn’t even get to finish what we’d already paid for!
7) The entire hotel smells of patchouli or some equally offensive—very pungent—aroma that just smacks you in the face right when you walk in & the rooms are TINY. There is no bath tub & the open glass bathroom might *look* cool, but its extremely inconvenient when you’re rooming with family members. The bathrobes are horribly uncomfortable & the towels feel like floor mats. 
In conclusion: I absolutely do not recommend this hotel for anyone. It looks very cool & has a nice kitschy vibe—but that’s as far as the positives go. The whole place is cramped, smells bad, is overpriced, & they’ve had us stressed out since the moment we tried to check out, for 3 days now. They did end up finally overlooking our remaining $302 balance—but only after my husband confronted them about all the extremely erroneous charges that were attempted on his card. I hate to think how difficult it would’ve been to get our money back had his card been charged successfully…& I honestly wonder how many others have also received charges like these without noticing until it was too late.

title: Perfect Stay
text: Perfect location to access Central Park and Midtown, lovely homely feel to the hotel full of natural features and very friendly staff. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend although the convenience comes at a price!

title: Fun Trip to NY
text:
Beautiful hotel right by Central Park. We enjoyed our weekend trip to NYC. The hotel also has a restaurant and we had Sunday brunch there. Food was delicious.  The waitstaff was friendly and quick. We didn't have a reservation, but the manager, Guzel was nice and accommodating. She was able to get us seated. She made sure to come up to us to see how we were doing. 
Overall, we had a really good experience at the hotel. Everyone was very knowledgeable and helpful.

title: COBRANÇA ABUSIVA ...SEM MINHA AUTORIZAÇÃO...
text: Olá Fiquei hospedada no hotel do dia 28/10 até 04/11 de 2022 e tive uma decepção enorme com o HOTEL....meu primo fechou todos os detalhes do hotel pois era meu aniversário, e meu marido queria fazer uma surpresa..a minha maior decepção foi no final. que cobraram o quarto que eu estava ....porém eu não assinei NADA autorizando a troca de quarto....cobraram $ 100 dólares a mais por noite ...e não tive retorno do HOTEL sobre o ocorrido e não consigo cancelar esta cobrança ilegal e abusiva. a gerente estremamente grosseira no final....falando que iriam enviar um e-mail para averiguar o ocorrido e até agora NADA.

title: Great location, accommodations and staff
text: Our family went to watch the Thanksgiving day parade and had a wonderful time.  The hotel is beautiful and the staff was attentive and pleasant, even with the craziness of the holiday.  The location is fantastic and we had a wonderful stay

title: A cultivating experience
text:
Hotel 1 creates Cultural Experiences  and delivers memorable memories for guests. The environment was inviting and captured the holiday season perfectly.
The staff was attentive, and the food in Jim’s restaurant was delicious

title: Family Getaway
text: Booking was easy, go several follow ups welcoming us before our arrival. Every person we interact with made us feel welcomed and genuinely wanted to make sure we enjoyed our stay. We ate at the restaurant for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and cocktails and we could not have been happier. Rooms were clean and the entire hotel just had a very hip vibe. A special thanks to Maryam for assisting us throughout our stay, I am sure we will be back!

title: Terrible customer service
text: Terrible customer service. Booked a night at this hotel and received confirmation email etc. Days later I received an email that they made a pricing "mistake" and I either needed to pay almost an extra $1000 for the Tuesday night I booked or cancel the reservation. They made absolutely zero effort to make up for their "mistake" or scam is more like it, in any way shape or form. Would never book here again. So many more other hotel options nearby with much better customer service.

title: Stay and eat here!
text: Amazing experience. The hotel and location are spectacular. The restaurant was delicious and the staff so kind and welcoming. Highly recommend the black truffle gnocchi and the green house cocktail.

title: Thanksgiving 2022
text: The best hotel in NYC for the parade!! Staff was very accommodating and went above and beyond. Jams the restaurant was so good and convenient. We loved our stay and experience!! We would recommend this hotel to everyone!

title: THANKSGIVING HOLIDAY VISIT
text: This is a great small hotel in a great location with a great mission and staff that are kind, considerate, and helpful. We had the City View Lounge King room that is efficiently designed and had loads of space to unpack and live in for a couple of days for us, and definitely comfortable too for a week stay. The greenery is good - it enlivens the space and feels pleasant to be within that space. Bed comfortable, good pillows, great experience overall!

title: Amazing place
text: The hotel is beautiful and well maintained.  The bigger thing is that the staff was truly first rate.  Everyone was helpful,   respectful,  attentive and truly ready to help.  We loved our stay.   Highly recommend. The concierge,  door people,  cleaning,  check in, bar and restaurant all terrific people.

title: Consistently fabulous!!!
text: 1 Hotel Central Park is the perfect hotel for anytime of year but especially for watching the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade! Not only is the location prime, the rooms gorgeous and the service impeccable but if you’re lucky enough to snag a room overlooking 6th Ave (aka Ave of the Americas) you can enjoy prime viewing of the parade from the comfort of the most cozy window seat large enough for two or three! To top it off, JAMS restaurant in the hotel offers a Thanksgiving Day Parade Basket to be delivered to your room, filled with the most scrumptious pastries, coffee, OJ, yogurt, granola and fruit. It is beyond sublime! To top it off the staff at the hotel are amazing! Everyone we came into contact with — from Christopher in Guest Services, to Kyle at Check In, the lovely doorman known simply as Gee, to Anderson who escorted us (and our luggage) to the parking garage a few doors down after the parade ended so that we could avoid the crowds and the added time it would have taken for us to get our car (and thus expedited our departure) — was beyond reproach. The staff is simply the best of the best. I wish I could recall everyone’s name because they all deserve a shout out. But a special acknowledgment to Christopher who truly made our stay with the hotel extraordinary. This was our second, return visit. The first was 6-7 years ago when my child and I visited the hotel with my parents, also during Thanksgiving and had two rooms directly overlooking 6th Ave. With my father having passed away since then and my procrastinating having made reservations till the last minute, I worried that our return visit would pale in comparison to the first. But Christopher did everything in his power to ensure our stay was truly splendid, including getting us into a room near the corner of the hotel (at 6th Ave & 58th Street) on the 4th Floor that had a prime view of the parade, allowing us to watch it from our room rather than have to rise early to snag a spot of street. I also would be remiss not to mention JAMS’ staff who helped us navigate constantly changing, last-minute reservations at the restaurant. Mariela Estrada, Murat Erbil and MenSa Smith we’re all incredibly gracious and accommodating. This holiday at 1 Central Park was truly one to remember! I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough! Cheers!

title: NYC!!!
text: Hotel is fantastic. Great location near upper East side and Central Park. Theater district less than 1/2 mile away. Fantastic bed!!!! I have had multiple spine surgeries, the bed was great. Hotel is quiet bc of location and quality construction. Staff members are first class. Just a great hotel.

title: Amazing stay
text:
Amazing stay. Beautiful property located in the best area of Manhattan. 
I loved their atmosphere, and sustainanable approach and initiatives. Walking distance to everywhere we wanted to visit. Loved the house car service too.
We were celebrating our anniversary and we were kindly upgraded.
No doubt, staying at 1Hotel Central Park is the best choice!

title: Jams rocks!
text: We went to Jam’s for a family members 21st birthday and received the best experience thanks to our waiter Daniel C. He gave us a bottle of champagne  and a nice dessert for the table to help celebrate. He had such great energy and made our whole time there feel so welcoming and special!

title: Not bad not good
Unforgettable stay
text: The hotel location is perfect with immediate access to Central park. The staff is very accommodating and friendly, they very much so obviously care about the guests and strive to make it a pleasurable experience for everyone. Thank you especially Kyle and Luis for all arrangements and recommendations, you made my stay worthwhile. I can’t wait to come back!

title: Great Manhattan stay
text: We really enjoyed our 4 night stay at this hotel last week. After a great welcome from Chester at the front desk we were give a lovely room on floor 11. The hotel is comfortable and spotlessly clean and run on sustainable lines, lovely and warm against the sudden New York chill and there was always a warm welcome from the staff. It’s situation, one block from Central Park, is a huge bonus.  Chester on the front desk went out of his way to help us with his huge smile and easy can do manner. The only reason this review is 4 not 5 is that we feel that the restaurant Jams, doesn’t reflect the welcoming vibe of the hotel.

title: Fantastic Experience!
text: The hotel was stunning. It was kept clean. The staff was so friendly. The rooms were a nice size and designed very well. The showers had a great pressure, and the beds and pillows were comfortable. Jams was delicious. Every part of the experience was fantastic!

title: Fabulous service great location.
text: I’ve stayed at 1 Hotel CP several times - the staff are wonderful nothing is too much trouble. The restaurant is fantastic and reasonably priced. Well appointed rooms in a great location handy to all the mid town attractions inc Broadway and also we’ll set up if you need to work

title: Wonderful Hotel Staff
text: After getting off a red eye and being sleep-deprived the moment I stepped into the hotel i felt the warmth, kindness and professionalism of the hotel staff. They accommodated my questions, found solutions, and I felt like had a handle on the hotel like it was their own home. I was so impressed. I love this hotel and will always stay here when I travel to New York for work.

title: The perfect place to stay
text:
Always the perfect stay !
So lovely
I could live there …it feels like home !
All the staff are so nice and efficient
Room was very clean
And the sustainability program is the best !
Once again an amazing stay !!

title: Great hotel
text: This hotel is a gem in the Manhattan , I’ve stayed here here multiple times and it’s been nothing short of amazing , Shane at the door is always warm and welcoming aswell as the housekeeping staff throughout the day. Thank you for the great accommodation !

title: Fantastic place to stay!
