text: Found this hotel online while searching for a place to stay near Central Park.  Arrived to find a beautiful hotel with tons of greenery and wood and warm welcoming decor.  Another first impression was the wonderful fragrance of the hotel. Heavenly!  Friendly staff made check-in quick and efficient.  Our room was wonderful with great views of the city and a bit of Central Park (enough to see the fall colors in the trees).  Our room was clean and well-designed.  We love that there are water filters installed so water was free, plentiful and delicious.  We had brunch at Jams and it was delicious with great service and a relaxed vibe.  We had a great stay at ! Hotel Central Park and we will definitely be back!

title: Great rooms.  Great staff.  Great location
text: the rooms were clean and nice but the staff made it that much more enjoyable.  Would come back just to see Jackie and Carlyle again.  The location was a block away from Central Park.  The restaurant/bar was very comfortable and we ended up there every night

title: Incredible Hotel
text: Had an amazing time at the Central Park 1 Hotel, the staff was truly incredible. The concierge gave some great recommendations and booked us in for dinners. The whole process was seamless. beautiful property, I can't wait to visit again.

title: Expensive but average
text: It was too expensive for the somewhat average service. We were given water on first night but when I asked for more, was advised to buy from the minibar. Room was quiet but we were on high floor in back alcove. The eco/sustainable vibe was a bit contrived (egg timer in shower , request for clothing donation) but a good thought.

title: Impressed!!!
text: Happily writing this review because a job well done needs to be recognized! Everything in this place is done right from decor and the perfect location but what really sets its apart is the service hands down. From the doorman to the concierge to the agents that check you and even housekeeping  we were always met with warm regards and for that we will be back. And thank you to Andrew who gave us a recommendation to go see the enchanto experience at the camp store my daughter loved it thanks again

title: Memorable trip
text: I recently stayed at the 1hotel Central Park and it was a stay to remember. The entire staff was friendly and accommodating. They left a bottle of champagne and box of chocolates to celebrate our recent engagement. Anytime we needed an item or assistance an employee would immediately assist us. I highly recommend this hotel not just because of all the amenities and location but because of the friendly employees there. Thank you again for a great stay!

title: Home away from home
text: I travel frequently 1-2x per month to NYC for work and there is no where else that feels like home. The entire hotel is gorgeous, clean, and has everything you could want. The guest rooms are always immaculately clean and the best place to feel peaceful after a busy day in the city. I never have to worry about anything!  But what makes this hotel my go to is the staff. Everyone from the front desk check in team to Lauren Yanoff and Andrea Dabu, I always feel taken care of and know that I can trust the team. We always choose to host events in their gathering spaces because it feels warm and welcoming which makes it very special for us. Unlike traditional hotels, we feel like the staff pays attention to all the details - even the catering team makes it fee like a unique curated first class experience. We are always so grateful for the team and appreciative! Would recommend 1 hotel Central Park to anyone!

title: Look elsewhere, missed the mark with our last stay.
text:
Love the brand and have stayed a few times at this location and Brooklyn Bridge.  This time our stay was ruined by an incredibly rude hostess at Jams.  Other than this experience, the sink in the room would take forever to drain, which makes simple things like brushing your teeth a not so nice experience and the showers will spray water everywhere.  

Lovely location, but hostess at their restaurant needs to be trained on common courtesy. 

For the price there are now better options in the city.

title: Get away from the city in the city
text: General Manager Murat Erbil helped my boyfriend and I with picking the perfect room at 1 Hotel Central Park. Even though we already live in New York, our stay felt like a vacation. The room was filled with eco-friendly amenities and the aesthetic was a combination of rustic and modern. We went to the bar at night for bites and drinks, and the food was on point. The drinks tasted fresh as well. In the morning we ordered room service and received some lovely pastries with wonderful staff service. I only wish we had more time to check out the spa. Upon check out we walked through the lobby, which was very inviting and filled with plants. The front desk staff were kind and accommodating. We didn’t want to leave by the end of our stay, but we will definitely be back again!

title: Honeymoon in the Big Apple
text:
When we first arrived, we were greeted by GK. He carried our bags inside for us. We had a lot of bags so it was greatly appreciated.

Chester handled our checkin, he was kind, informative and engaging. He told us everything we needed to know about the building and sights to check out nearby. We told him we were celebrating our honeymoon and he congratulated us. The rest of the staff congratulated us as well. For the rest of the week we felt so special walking through the lobby. Everyone was so nice and accommodating.

When we arrived in our room, the view was breathtaking. The room spotless and it smelled amazing. We loved our room, bed and especially the window nook. On our last night, we were left with a note from the team congratulating us along with a bottle of Prosecco. That was the cherry on top of a perfect week/honeymoon in NYC.

We LOVED our stay at the 1Hotel Central Park and we'll definitely be back soon!

title: So homey
text: Me and my husband loved staying at this hotel. The service, food, and rooms are perfect. The room is spacious and comfortable compared to most nyc hotels. The entire staff was extremely accommodating throughout the entire stay.

title: Cool hotel. Great location. Very cramped quarters.
text: All-in-all a nice place in a great area with good service; though over-priced given size of bedroom. Efforts at sustainability quite impressive and wish more places made the effort. If it were not for the tiny room size, I would be happy to give a better review.

title: City Experience
text: The hotel staff was attentive and courteous.  The hotel was clean and comfortable and had everything you might possibly need!  We ate breakfast in the hotel restaurant, they provided umbrellas for our rainy walk in the city and offered to arrange transportation to the airport.  Could not be more delighted.

title: Fabulous location; top-notch hotel
text: We stayed here for a long weekend of visiting family in New York City. The location is great; The staff incredibly responsive. Linens, towels and shower are first rate. The touches of many recycled objects, wall coverings, keys etc. is very nice. The plants in the lobby and bar area give it a wonderful organic feeling. When we come back, we will definitely stay here.

title: Warm, personal service
text:
1 Hotel Central Park is a beautiful, modern property in an ideal location- close to the theater district, Central Park, Columbus Circle and Madison avenue. The best part of my week-long stay, however, was the warm personal service. Even before I arrived, Lorenzo, the concierge, was efficiently making travel arrangements for me and providing restaurant information. When I arrived, I was greeted warmly at the front desk by Brian, who made me feel immediately at home, as if he were personally invested in my having a good experience while visiting NYC. 

I've been traveling to Manhattan for the past 20 years and have stayed in numerous 5-star hotels, but none has been as warm and welcoming as 1 Hotel Central Park.

title: Eco Excellence!
text: This is a return visit to an outstanding property - their dedication to sustainability in highly creative ways is inspiring. From the moment you walk in, you are surrounded by lush plants and exposed wood - even the room key is made of wood. The staff is incredibly welcoming and the food is fresh, healthy and delish! As a biz traveler, I am grateful for 1 Hotel Central Park - an oasis in the heart of NYC.

title: no loyalty program
text: i stayed at the property over 30 nights within my travels to new york. inwas offered a low floored room.. with a bathtub while inrequested a shower. did not feel appreciated for comming back. not worth comming back again

title: A tight but comfortable stay :)
text:
We knew to expect that the room would be a tight fit but we managed to squeeze the four of us in.  :). Jokes aside, the room is designed so smart that we could fit all our belongings easy in the cuboard space. But the bathroom did have a glass wall so I'd suggest sharing only with those you are comfortable with. 

The beds were surprisingly comfortable and that little window nook was our preteens preferred spot. 

Finally a shoutout to Rose from housekeeping who went above and beyond making sure we were comfortable. Thank you. And the kind bartender working on the 5th of Nov. Clearly had a long day and still was super friendly. 

Next time I'd book connecting rooms or a suite, now we were too late and it was marathon weekend so everything was full.

title: Couldn’t ask for better
text: 1 Hotel Central Park is perfectly located for a trip to NYC.   Close to Central Park, Broadway and great shopping.   The hotel has a super cool vibe with great decor.   The staff is incredibly welcoming, friendly and attentive.   We were greeted  by Christopher and Andrew and they went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay.   Every time we ran into a staff person they seemed happy to see us and eager to ensure that we were having a good visit.  Rooms are super clean and super comfortable.   1 Hotel is my first choice to stay in NYC.

title: I want to live here!
text:
1Hotel Central Park is our go-to hotel every time we make a trip to the city! Every morning we wake up with a hot cup of coffee and look out the window to breathtaking views of Central Park. The rooms are always extremely well kept and housekeeping does an amazing job tidying up your room while you're out enjoying the city. The hotel is within walking distance to all your favorite shops and restaurants and a quick uber or subway away to midtown and downtown.

Prior to arriving, Mary was super helpful in making our reservation and made the process so effortless! When we arrived Anderson was quick to give us a warm welcome and help us with our luggage and Floresca was so kind when checking us in. The hotel's concierge, Brayam, is extremely helpful and secured so many reservations for us! We highly recommend staying at the 1hotel and make sure you pick up a candle on the way out!

title: Great Stay
text:
I recently stayed at this hotel for the NYC marathon.  If you want to stay near Central Park,
theaters and upscale stores, this is the place.  The rooms were clean and quiet.  The staff
was friendly and helpful.  I did not eat at their restaurant so I cannot review it.  Highly recommend.

title: dumpy hotel
text: no value here just another second rate worn out hotel with poor, small rundown rooms.  i have stayed at this hotel several times in the past and it has gone down hill in a big way.  for the price you can find a much better hotel with nicer room. this hotel has not been maintained and is not a good functional base for a leisure trip to NYC

title: Fantastic stay in friendly well managed hotel
text: Convenient location; responsive and efficient service; loved the green messaging. Hotel and room well kept. Friendly and helpful staff. Nice view of the park. Room well designed. Without a doubt the best hotel i experienced in New York City.

title: Great
text: The hotel is cozy and the staff is nice. I got a better shower the first time  was there, but this didn't spoil the experience. I would like to give a special thanks to GK Anderson who was very sweet and helped me get a nice cab with a fair price to the airport.

title: Absolutely loved my stay at the 1 Hotel! Super helpful front desk staff and amazing location!
text: I loved my stay at the 1 Hotel! It was in the perfect location (close to all the places I wanted to check out)...literally walking distance to central park! The staff was super accommodating and attentive, I felt really taken care of throughout my stay! The concierge was super helpful with making me a last minute dinner reservation. The room was perfect, clean, nice view, and I liked the daybed! Looking forward to my next visit. THANK YOU, 1 HOTEL!

title: Amazing time
text: I absolutely love it here! The rooms are amazing and Murat, who hosted us in the restaurant was absolutely incredible. He always went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed! I will definitely be back!

title: Definitely coming back
text: I was looking forward to my stay at 1Hotel, but was more impressed than expected. The food was great, really good drinks, and felt really taken care of by Murat. Will be recommending to friends and family!

title: Fascinating hotel- great location!
text: Very cool-Sustainability oriented hotel at a great location. Ask for a floor with a view if you can- I moved from the 4 th floor which was a bit darker and noisy.loved the donation clothing idea and tap water which tasted great! Free local apples that would have been otherwise thrown out were tasty and a nice touch!

title: OUTSTANDING !!!
text: Booked this for a girls birthday getaway without knowing anything about 1 Hotels.  I prefer smaller, boutique hotels and this fit the bill.  Lorenzo, the concierge,  was my first interaction with the hotel.  I wanted flowers delivered for the birthday girl in our group.  He quickly responded and had a magnificent arrangement delivered while we were at dinner.  The hotel also delivered a bottle of Prosecco and a lovely note for the birthday girl.  Check-in was delightful.  Christopher and Brian took extra good care of us and offered us an upgrade to the Penthouse Suite from 2 rooms for a small fee.  Of course we said YES Please.  We were able to move to the Penthouse on the 2nd of our 3 night stay and GK moved all our luggage, flowers, prosecco and our shopping bags while we were away for the day.  We dined at Jams and Daniel took extra time to go over the menu and help us make the best choices - the JW Chicken & Fries and Kale Salad were both delicious.  He went the extra mile and brought dessert for our birthday girl.  Now about the Penthouse Suite 1710.  It is a 2 bedroom/2.5 bath corner suite with views of Central Park.  There are two living rooms and a small kitchenette and an 8 person dining area. It was extremely clean.  The only complaint was the lighting in the bathrooms.  It was very fitting for the aesthetic but not great for women getting ready.  The master had a beautiful copper soaking tub, river rock floors, dual rain & wall showers.  The beds were a tad firm but the bedding and pillows were very comfortable.  If small hotels with attention to detail are your vibe this is the place for you.  Thanks for a wonderful stay 1 Hotel.  Can't wait to try your other locations.

title: wem
text: The room did not meet my expectations. Small rooms that are noisy that had a beam in the middle of the room. If you're into that rustic look this might be the place for you.  On a positive note,  everyone that works there is very nice.

title: Everything great but Concierge promises
text: I loved this hotel and location, but they’d had a kitchen fire, so all the room service and leisurely meals we came for were not available. Just buffets with very limited hours. I empathize, but it would have been kind to notify us.

title: Gran gran decepción no es un hotel 5 estrellas.
text:
NOOOO lo recomiendo!! NO are un hotel 5 estrellas. Una lastima. Sobrevaludo. El lobby muy lindo y el rest. Pero las habitaciones dejan mucho que desear. NO están 100 limpias. No ofrecen buenos amenities. Los baños no son privados. Nos querian cobrar comidas que no eran nuestras. Estábamos en una suite. Muy muy chica. Y muy ruidosa y oscura! 
Jamas volvería ni dejaría que alguna Ps conocida venga.

title: Very unpleasant check in experience
text: Great location and very good restaurant and bar downstairs. Even the room was relatively good, clean and  comfortable. BUT - and this is a very big issue for me - my room wasn’t ready until 6:45pm!!  When I tried to check in at 6:00 pm they said housekeeping had just finished cleaning it and it was waiting for inspection.  “Should be just a few minutes” I was told. First of all, what happened to 4pm check in? And Second of all, when I checked back at the front desk at 6:40 they said it still wasn’t ready. Only after I asked to see the manager did the manager go and inspect the room so I could finally get a key.  A very bad way to start my stay.

title: 1 hotel
text: Details and decor of each room well thought out, finishes nice and shower pressure phenomenal. For the price this hotel goes for nightly- you are told to drink tap water as part of their sustainable effort. Horrible horrible horrible. Could hear footsteps in the room upstairs as well which was very disrupting while trying to get ready for bed. Overall stay was pleasant and staff were very attentive but those are major inconveniences in the stay.

title: Perfect Stay
text: There may not be a property that combines location, product, service, and overall vibe better than 1 Hotel Central Park. I will absolutely be coming to stay at this property again! I was able to get everywhere I needed to easily, yet well welcome and comforted every time I arrived back to the hotel.

title: Mini Moon Getaway
text: My husband and I wanted a couple night stay for right after our wedding. We found 1 Hotel Central Park and the pictures made us fall in love. We love sustainability and from the moment we walked in, the service was incredible. We will be back!

title: About as good as it gets
text:
In town for a busy few days and I wanted no surprises. Sometimes you just need to be able to switch off and know someone is going to take care of everything. These folks absolutely delivered, no stress, great service all round.

I really liked the design. It was tastefully restrained but still warm and welcoming. Whoever is in charge of the plants is doing a fantastic job! They've made a building off billionaire's row feel somewhat like a luxury eco resort.

The top feature of my room was probably the window nook with a view to Central Park. Chilling at the end of a day, being able to escape from the bustle of Manhattan but still watch the world go by was lovely.

Highly recommended! I'll be back next time I'm in midtown.

title: October 2022
text: The service was great . We arrived late and they upgraded us to a bigger toom The rooms were super clean and the location is amazing . We wanted a late check out and they were very cooperative.Love this hotel

title: Always a great stay!
text: My family and I are frequent guests at the 1 Hotel Central Park.  We have stayed in many hotels over the years and keep coming back to the 1.  The staff takes the time and effort to make sure you have a great stay and to get to know you personally.  We always feel very welcome and appreciated, which is rare to find these days.  The hotel is also clean and comfortable.  Outstanding staff include Chris M at the front desk who always does his best to get us a comfortable room, Shane at the front door who is super helpful with parking our car and getting rides, as well as Anderson, Chester, Josea and Benny.  Looking forward to our next stay!  Drew

title: very comfortable Hotel in mid-Manhattan
text: we loved to stay in 1 Hotel Central Park, a perfect location and such cosy and comfortable rooms, very friendly staff, all in all we had a great time and there is nothing to complain about! We'd love to be back!

title: Wonderful stay and excellent hotel
text:
Everything was perfect,
kindness and professional , all do their best to offer an amazing stay and to take care of everythong to enjoy your stay in New York and in the hotel
the hotel is in a perfect location, all was so great
The best hotel in New York!

Mireille October 2022

title: Fab hotel in Central Park
text: Had a great stay, the staff are very friendly and helpful. They want to ensure you have an amazing time in the city. The concierge is one fo the best in the city and made all of our reservations at some incredible restaurahts and spas.

title: EXCELLENT EXPERIENCE
text: Very well situated Hotel, just a minute walking from central park south, very easy going, cosy and friendly lobby and concierge, clean rooms ,comfortable beds. Sure a good choice for NY either for leisure or business trip.

title: Simply Amazing!
text: From the moment we arrived we were greeted with a smile from entire team. Everyone is so helpful and kind. We came to New York to celebrate our anniversary and we were surprised to find a beautiful note and bottle of champagne waiting for us in our room! The room was cute and the nook was a perfect spot for us to look out at the park and drink our champagne and coffee in the mornings. I want to give a huge shoutout to Shane, Joshua, Maryam and Luis. They ensured our stay was extra special! Definitely recommend the 1Hotel Central Park we can’t wait to come back!

title: Loyal to the 1
text: This was my 3rd stay at 1 Hotel Central Park and they have won my heart. The property is beautiful and well appointed, the rooms are on what I will say is on the "cozier" side but understandable for NYC. However, I am writing this review for the service! Chester and Josie at reception are Champions! but honestly everyone I have encountered are amazing. In these times, almost everything can be found online but it is always a pleasure to interact with someone, to get their opinion and hear their experience, this makes you feel more like family than a customer. To 1 Hotel Central Park's management, you have an amazing staff and a beautiful hotel, keep up the great work, you have won me over, I am loyal to the 1.

title: Best Anniversary Hotel!
text: We had the best time celebrating our anniversary at 1 Hotel Central Park. Chester was so kind, welcomed us in and even upgraded our room to a view of Central Park. The hotel is so beautiful, the plants and all the measures of sustainability are like nothing I've seen before. Would definitely recommend a stay - for the cute reading nook in our room alone!

title: A magnificent stay while in town for Comic Con!
text:
Each year, my family looks forward to attending NYC comic con. This year, we decided to give 1 Hotel a shot at being our home base. Thank goodness we did because the experience was exceptional. From the moment we arrived, the staff went out of their way to make us feel welcome. And once they learned why we were staying at the hotel, they demonstrated a genuine enthusiasm that made my 7yr old feel like he was a celebrity. Even the other guests seemed to enjoy seeing us in our costumes. 

The hotel restaurant, Jams, was delicious. Murat and Mensa (the hotel executives in charge of the dining accommodations) made every effort to welcome my group. The cocktails served by the bartender were outstanding.

The room was clean and modern, and the shower was luxurious. 

Needless to say, I know where we will be staying from now on during our NYC trips!

title: Family reunion
text: The team at the 1 Central Park is at the top of their game.  They went above and beyond to help me after my mother had booked a hotel for our weekend that had gone completely down hill. I ran in the 1 at 9 p.m. hoping they could receive us for the weekend as I stay there often on my own.  The team made sure they could accommodate us and continued to take care of us throughout the weekend. I am forever grateful for their sensitivity to our yearly gathering.

title: Beautiful and Calming Hotel
text: My good friend and I traveled to New York together for a girls trip. From the moment we checked in we we felt so welcomed! Everything ran smoothly, all were friendly, the room beautiful! Great location

title: Oasis of Serenity
text: 1 Hotel Central Park is a fabulous hotel with very attentive staff. The rooms were comfortable, modern and clean, with luxurious showers. The location is perfect, right beside a good subway line and of course very handy to the park! We would love to stay again.

title: Great property
text: Friendly & accommodating from the get go,  the team at 1 Hotel Central Park are fantastic. Mid-Town location is hard to beat for Manhattan and the Park. Enjoyed the cocktails at the bar, great knowledge from the Concierge on the area. Cannot recommend highly enough.

title: Amazing place, amazing stay - highly recommend
text: Beautiful, natural accommodations.  Super friendly and helpful staff. Always a smile on their faces and over willing to make your stay as perfect and comfortable as ever.  Jams is delicious for drinks and meals throughout the day.

title: Murat and his team!!!
text: I would like to thank you for a special time at the one hotel Central Park! Murat and the crew were awesome. Took great care of myself and the family. I will for sure be visiting them many more times.

title: Best hotel in New York
text:
The hotel is not pretentious at all, but full of quality with a Scandinavian vibe.  The staff absolutely made the entire week I was there for work -  The food was exceptional, and my bedroom was first rate. 

I'm already booking to come back for Christmas shopping

title: Last minute road trip to NY
text:
I had a trip booked to Florida which was cancelled a few hours before due to the hurricane. So last minute we decided to drive down to NY and stay at the 1 Hotel Central Park. 

The location is amazing, and the customer service in every department was excellent. Will definitely stay there on my next visit! :)

title: Great environment in the heart of NYC
text: Great location, beautiful space, great food.  What more could you ask for?  Ambience very unique/bespoke too--not 'standard' hotel room.  I stayed for both work and pleasure, and the business facilities were also excellent, especially the catering.  I will definitely be returning.

title: 1 Hotel
text: This is a great hotel, and I loved the live plants everywhere and the repurposed wood decor.  The only negative thing I have to say is that there needs to be more kid-friendly food on the menu at Jams.  Other than that, everything was perfect.

title: What a view & smells good
text: I had a reservation on City side but upgraded to a suite on Central Park & also saw the city. What a nice, quiet room. It smelled great. Very relaxing. Probably needed a tutorial on the lights. The staff were very nice & helpful. Jam’s restaurant is attached to the hotel but suggest make reservations. It was central to stores & shows

title: Nice surprise.
text:
Unusual place.  Lots of wood in rooms. Greenery everywhere.  Did not expect all that but found it soothing.  
Proximity to the park is great.  Also Starbucks across the street.  Hotel coffee is standard Nespresso type taste.  Good to be able to get a great coffee accords the street.  

Rita at front desk very good.  Lobby staff very good.

Rooms small though.  Might not work for a couple?  

Good for a single biz traveler.

title: Great hotel for business
text: Stayed for two nights on business.  Welcoming, cool use of natural woods / grasses / etc to create a unique feel.  Great gym, great location, friendly staff, have everything you need to be productive.  Didn’t get a chance to visit the restaurant but heard it was very good.  Highly recommend.

title: Interesting and lovely hotel
text:
This is a very well located, slightly different, hotel.

The message throughout is one of sustainability and there are plants wherever you look in the communal areas.

The hotel is located a few hundred metres from Central Park and various other prime locations are a short walk away, including Times Square and the Rockefeller Center.

The room was very attractively decorated and the shower was excellent. There were also other standard amenities, including a coffee machine, steamer, mini bar and well sized TV.

The staff were excellent and the stay was thoroughly enjoyable.

title: Excelente atendimento
text: Foi uma estadia muito prazerosa, a equipe super solicita e os produtos nos quartos são simplesmente incríveis! Adorei também a decoração do hotel, super cool. A localização é incrível, do lado do Central Park.

title: Sustainability and luxury!
text: I traveled to 1 Hotel for a business conference that was held in the property. My 25 year old daughter who joined me is very much into sustainability and loved the decor and the theming. It is really unique and nice. Service is great. Rooms are really cool but on the small side which is pretty normal in NYC. One block from Central Park overall wonderful location.

title: Average hotel in a good loation but overpriced.
text:
I stayed for one week at 1 hotel Central Park. The experience was good/average but totally overpriced to pay 750$ per night during fashion week. The location and breakfast are great but also overpriced.
Overall I would rather add a lmittle biit on top and stay at a 5 star hotel for this price.

title: Todos muy amables y con buena disposición Merat el gerente del Jams es muy atento y amable es excelente persona le agrad
text: Murat es gerente de restaurante Jams y es muy amable le agradezco muchísimo su atención fue un gusto conocer y resuelve todo y con excelente servicio y calidad regresamos y muchas gracias por compartir con el equipo excelente y excelente ubicación

title: Family tour
text: Location, Rooms, staffs everything is perfect. Central Park is 1 block away from hotel, so close to everything. Rooms are big and eco friendly, clean. Staffs are so generous and kind. Specially my stays are more convenient with attentive staffs like tashi Dundup, he take care of all needs and helpful.

title: Best hotel in NYC!!!
text: One of the best hotels I’ve been to. Staffs are friendly and especially Dorjee, he helped me a lot and made my stay comfortable I appreciate everyone working at 1 hotel for helping me in anyway they can. I will definitely go back and recommend this hotel to everyone I know.

title: Fantastic stay
text: We were in NY for my son’s wedding and stayed at the 1 Hotel. Perfect location for us, and our friends who also stayed there. The hotel was very busy (it was Fashion Week) but the staff managed it extremely well. In particular Chris at reception, nothing was too much to ask, he always went the extra mile. Thanks! We will be back.

title: Highly recommended!!!
text: I stayed at one hotel Central Park for one of my friend’s bachelorette party that I was attending in New York City. I loved the ambience of this hotel, the location and the excellent services, esp. to my server T Dorjee who made my stay very comfortable and pleasant. I’ll highly recommend this place for anyone visiting the city during the summer!!

title: Best hospitality and accomodation in the whole city!!!
text: This hotel hands down was absolutely amazing! My gf and I visited for Thanksgiving week, and from the minute we checked in until the minute we checked out - our experience was nothing short of perfect. The entire staff was very helpful and very kind special thanks to Mr T dorjee who provided us with the best service with professionalism and sincerity. We had connecting king and queen rooms, which were very clean and well kept. If you are visiting NYC, we highly recommend this cute and friendly hotel. We will definitely be back!!

title: An Oasis with Park Ave Address
text:
My husband and I celebrated our 30th anniversary at this hotel. With its cozy homey feel and it’s sustainability theme, this boutique hotel is an  oasis in an urban jungle . It has class without being overstated and with an almost Park  Ave address, it is for the most discerning of travelers looking for luxury delivered organically. From the minute you walk in to the time you check out, you are surrounded by class and youthful edgy energy that mimics the city itself.
Kyle at front desk and Michael and Lorenzo at concierge are the best!
Michael managed to excel at his job by getting us all the bookings  we wanted,  including the very sought after Comedy Cellar. Will be coming  back here again for sure….

title: Weekend Stay
text: We rented two rooms for two nights.  The rooms were clean and the eco friendly vibe of the hotel is nice.  Lorenzo the concierge was excellent.   We drove a Tesla and requested that it be charged before our departure several times.  This did not happen so we had just enough charge to get to a charger and waste time on our trip home.  We would have taken the train had we have known the charge and getting our car from the garage was a hassle.

title: Great service
text: What a great hotel. It’s central location  next to Central Park. The breakfast was so delicious and the service was  A plus . My only complaint is the room was small but it’s New York City. Just loved the decor.

title: Kuwait Alrawda area Block4 Street41 House6
text: Everything was beautiful in this wonderful and beautiful hotel. I thank you very much for your nice hospitality and accept all my love🌸🌺 I will come back to you every time because I really enjoyed staying with you..I love you all❤️

title: Best Hotel in Central Park
text:
Easy, organic, smooth, beautiful, clean, creative, super well located, amazing staff and food.
Love the simplicity with the rooms and the little bed/sofa by the windows overlooking the city.
Walk distance to Central Park makes all more special.
Used gym this time, small but complete.

title: Service Is Unmatched!!
text: Me and my partner stayed the weekend of the US Open and our first time at a 1 hotel was definitely one to remember. The hotel was beautiful and smelled amazing!  The concept of the hotel brought us here but the service is why we will be coming back, big thank you to Andrew, Anderson, and Benito who never lacked enthusiasm or a genuine conversation! Til next time

title: Restful and inspirational
text: Great stay, room was so pretty. Comfy bed. Very relaxing after a long day of meetings. Lovely way to start the day at the restaurant. Emda was so sweet and attentive. Perfect location. Will return very soon!

title: The One hotel masters hospitality !
text:
We love the One Hotel Central Park!  We have been staying there for years and every stay gets better and better.  The staff at the One have hospitality mastered. The moment we pull up, we are welcomed back as family.  The rooms are great - clean, beautiful and comfy- and great accommodations for families.  

We often are there to celebrate birthdays and this trip was no exception -  a great surprise of cupcakes and a personal
Card signed by the staff was waiting for us.  

The staff is exceptional- Shane, Anderson and Gc at the front, Lorenzo, the house car driver and Maryam in management.   There is no better team! 

We can’t wait to
Return.

title: LaRochelle girls trip
text: We stayed at 1 Hotel for three nights. The room was comfortable, clean and functional. Valet service arranged through the hotel was very convenient. The location was great, we walked to central Park and shopped along Madison Ave with ease. The in room food service through Jams was delicious. My daughter (17) liked the gnocchi so much that she ordered it downstairs in the main restaurant on our last day. Overall lovely hotel.

title: Sorpresa en Nueva York
text: Excelente concepto de hotel sustentable en plena ciudad de Nueva York. Las habitaciones son chicas pero similares a las encontradas en la ciudad. El servicio es excelente especialmente el desayuno (Rowan hace un trabajo espléndido, felicidades).

title: Almost!
text:
Excellent location, beautiful hotel, nice room (we booked a Park King on 15th floor). Room was well appointed. Very quiet. Everything worked. Shower/water pressure was outstanding! Love the scent of the products and the aroma around the hotel. 

Did not appreciate the bullocks around check in - which is at 4pm. Have the room ready. They kept saying it’s ready but needed to be “inspected”. Read other reviews - same complaint. Staff your housekeeping accordingly. Didn’t get our room until close to 5. This ruined our dinner plans - had to cancel those. Then had to wait for our luggage to be brought up, which was being stored on another floor. 

Staff is very pleasant, but don’t really have answers. Car service is seen, but that’s about it. Just walk! For almost $1000 cad/night, it’s nice, but not quite 5 star. The location is what sells this place most.

title: Just steps away to Central Park
text: I had a business training in NYC last week.  It’s been three years since I am back to this beautiful city. My company does all the booking and this time I am so impressed. 1 Hotel is so clean and has a really nice niche by the window for you to read or sight see below. It’s just steps from Central Park where you can take a nice morning run or evening stroll. There’s lots of restaurants across the street or nearby within walking distance and Fiftth Ave. is just 5 min walk away. I told my company to always book me at this hotel when there’s meetings or training. Best part which I don’t see often with other boutique hotel is a steamer in your room instead or iron. I usually pack one but now I know I don’t  need to. The staff is very friendly and helpful from checkin to checkout and at their restaurant where I had breakfast. You can tell they strive on providing the best customer service to stand out! Love how they care about local community and have this beautiful sign asking if you over pack or did lots of shopping, you can leave some old items behind and they will help donate.

title: Amazing First Stay at 1
text: We were so excited to visit 1 Central Park and it was truly worth the value. Rita welcomed us warmly and accommodated an early-check in for us. The room had a great natural light coming through and a good size for a couple. Thank you for a lovely stay and we can't wait to come back!

title: A peaceful retreat in a perfect location
text: I stayed at 1 Hotel Central Park for a business trip. I am from Denver and love access to all things fresh and natural. When you walk into the hotel, the lobby is filled with real, fresh plants and a beautiful aesthetic. The service was beyond excellent. My room was comfortable and clean. Nothing will ever compare to my experience at this hotel. Right across from Central Park!

title: Overrated
text: I don't even have the energy to explain how overrated this hotel is. Although it is beautiful, it is well overpriced. There was so much construction and it was very loud which woke us up from 7-8am. Also, the walls are paper thin and we heard kids literally jumping off the walls next door. Most of all, the experience we had at the hotel restaurant (Jams) was absolutely terrible... Our server only came to our table to take our order and then we never saw her again. We had to ask approach a hostess for our bill. There is lots more that happened that we were not impressed with. Next time we return to NYC, we will most likely stay at the Arlo Midtown again. It is much cheaper and the staff members are extremely helpful and provided us with an outstanding experience.

title: Excellent stay, will be back
text: Rooms are very clean, love the eco-friendly / nature focused design. Location is great, right by Central Park and close to 5th Ave. The house car is a nice touch and goes as far as south as 42nd. Wish the property had a pool / rooftop but the Brooklyn location does if that's something you're looking into. Would say here again!

title: Good balance
text: As a former, NYer I try to avoid staying in highly tourist dominated areas — typically I would include 58th and 6th in that tourist area category but I was pleasantly surprised by the neighborhood. The hotel is not terribly large nor is the restaurant and in this case the smaller size makes the hotel feel intimate. The ability to text requests for in room dining and any other needs was very helpful and efficient. Rooms are feel like a stylish/industrial loft (although minus high ceilings). Also, a phone-enabled room key is a nice feature.

title: Bom, mas cobrou estadia em duplicidade.
text: Ficamos um fim de semana em agosto de 2022 no 1 Hotel Central Park. O atendimento foi muito amigável, o quarto, apesar de pequeno era funcional, apesar do chuveiro não ter pressão, o que compromete a qualidade do banho. A cama, muito confortável. Ao chegar, nos foi enviado um lanche que não foi solicitado. o Café da manhã se encerra, 9 a.m. Cedo demais. E a atendente do restaurante anexo aonde era servido o café se fez de desentendida quando falamos quer éramos hospedes do hotel.No check-in me foi solicitado o cartão de crédito. Até aí ok. No check out saímos na pressa e nem pedi recibo, pois pagamos a estadia adiantado pelo Booking.com. E surpresa: ao chegar ao Brasil, descobri que o hotel havia cobrado em duplicidade a estadia. Enviei e-mail polido solicitado providências. Não obtive respostas. Como a propriedade tem bom nível, ótima localização e parece ser um negócio sólido, atributo ocorrido a falha operacional e impessoalidade no trato ao cliente. Péssimo para uma empresa que vende a idéia de prestar um serviço de hospitalidade amigável, pessoal e sustentável. Este tipo de descaso faz tudo parecer artificial.

title: Great stay, great location
text: second time staying at a 1Hotel (first time was Brooklyn).  Great experience and stay. Comfortable and nice vibe.  Love the environemntal friendly nature of the property.  Staff was welcoming.  Loved teh bay window to sit and just watch the world go by.  Will be back and will check out other properties in the chain.

title: Beautiful hotel
text: We loved our stay here.  Stylish hotel and perfect location.  The service was excellent and staff friendly.  Breakfast at the Jams restaurant is a must!  It was sooo good.  We will definitely stay here again.

title: NYC
text: NYC with nature. Hotel very well decorated, with excellent atmosphere, very central and with a phenomenal service. The only issue is the finbal and high price of the rooms as the fees and taxes make the cost too high for a multi day stay.

title: 1 Hotel NYY Game
text: The hotel is beautiful and so close to Central Park. It is super quiet for a NYC hotel. The suites are wonderful! The staff bends over backwards to ensure your stay is special. The texting option is awesome too! Very responsive.

title: Best Hotel Ever
text: This is our second time at this hotel. This hotel truly curated an experience that is unmatched from other hotels we have stayed at. From the signature scent of the hotel, to the incredible design of the rooms, to the great customer service-everything is curated to perfection. Special thanks to concierge Carlos, he went out of his way to make our stay incredible.

title: Nice stay, but mediocre quality of service.
text: When I arrived, the TV was not working properly when I had tried to use the casting service. The TV remote batteries were dead when I arrived. Everything was fixed in due time, but still frustrating and could have been prevented. The Jams restaurant had extremely mediocre food and a breakfast menu that I feel ended too early. Overpriced for a mediocre experience. The best part of my experience was the casting service, when it worked properly in my room, the shower rain head, and the location of the hotel.

title: Nice stay
text: Great place to stay. Wonderful location right next to Central Park. G is very welcoming and Lerenzo was very friendly. Both of them went the extra mile to please the guests, very happy with their service. They both made it a memorable stay. Staff in general is very friendly and accommodating. They allow pets and provide vet bowls and a bed. Room itself was very cool with a nice window seating and modern shower.

title: August in Midtown
text:
Everything was perfect.
Welcome and availability reception and concierge, extreme cleanliness of the rooms. The restaurant is excellent both for the particularity of the dishes offered and for the quality of the products used. A heartfelt thanks to Mr. Rowan for the professionalism and kindness with which he followed us.

title: Something different
text: A great location for this unique hotel. A block from Central Park, minutes from Rockefeller and Times Square. It's unusual decor give it an almost outdoor feel. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The restaurant not so much. Many other better places to eat in the vicinity.

title: room was not what we expected
text: We paid for a more expensive room (Jr suite with connecting king room) but the view was an interior view overlooking huge exhaust fans inside an interior building courtyard and looking directly into windows on all sides of the interior courtyard of the buildings. When you pay up for a nicer room, you expect to have a view better than a prison cell.Totally misrepresented on the website photos. We asked to be moved but they were not able to accommodate us. Said they would check again the next day for options, but never heard back from them. Steamer had mold in it. One TV didn't work properly. AC in king room didn't work properly.

title: Welcome home!
text: Welcome home is their slogan and every member of the staff lived up to that experience. My trip to NYC was very leisurely and every time I came back at the hotel I felt welcomed but any member of the staff I saw. It added joy to my NYC solo weekend. Thanks to all!

title: Best hotel in NYC
text:
The 1 Hotel Central Park is an absolute dream.  

Every time I travel to the city, I make sure to stay here.

Everything is clean, the food at Jams is excellent, the amenities are great, and the staff is truly the highest caliber collective of people I've ever seen in hospitality.

Special shout-out to Josue who has consistently gone above and beyond to ensure my stay is always spectacular.

title: BEAUTIFUL HOTEL
text: The hotel was absolutely beautiful! The staff was amazing when checking in and assisted with my bags up to my room. Room was beautiful- tad small for a King room; however, it's NYC. Very clean, fresh linens, and plants all around.

title: Best waitress ever!
text:
We just have to say Saydimar went above and beyond throughout our entire meal. 

My mom remembered JAMS from 35 years ago and was dying to go back for her birthday and have the chicken. Well tonight we went back and it lived up to the hype. And so much of that is thanks to the incredible service of Saydimar. She had excellent recommendations, brought us a round of champagne and also brought dessert with a candle. 

The whole meal was thoughtful, delicious and wonderful. Can’t wait to come back!

title: Perfect spot in NYC
text: This hotel is just perfect for a trip in New York. It’s location, the service and the sustainability engagement fitted all my expectations. The only thing I didn’t line so much was the breakfast. Like in many places the air conditioning was too cold and the food was ok but not as I expected.

title: An NYC Gem
text:
Where else in New York City can one find an urban oasis that is so organically conscious of its impact on our planet? I Hotel Central Park doesn't only offer an excellent service from the time one step into its lobby to the time you leave its doors, but the feeling of well-being connected to nature just envelopes you throughout your stay. Smiling staff, clean and well thought room design and amenities just make one's stay relaxing. It's location is perfect - close to Central Park and shopping! 

Thank you for making our stay a memorable one!

title: NYC Central Park
text: Overall, loved the decor, service, and location of this hotel. It is in the center of the shopping district and steps from Central Park. We always felt safe there and the hotel itself is beautiful. We will definitely be back!

title: Great place to stay in NYC
text: Great place to stay in midtown NY. Clean, no fuss, great location, friendly staff. Everything you need from steamer to espresso machine in the room. Breakfast good, wish they had simple oatmeal on the menu as a gf and dairy free option.

title: Loved it!
text: Beautiful oasis in a perfect location of the city!! Such an amazing space, clean rooms and incredible service. The restaurant is also delicious. Thoughtful sustainable touches and attentive room service.

title: GREAT LOCATION
text: Locations is great, very close to Central Park. The Hotel design is really nice and color. Rooms very comfortable and well organized. The restaurant is not too bad. But breakfast is extremely poor, with little choice and of very average quality.

title: Wonderful hotel in the heart of NYC
text: The 1 Hotel Central Park is an amazing sustainable design focused hotel. Rooms are very clean, spacious (rare for NYC), and layout is well thought out. Staff are incredibly warm and attentive. Location is top notch. Highly recommend!!!

title: Nice hotel, great location vc, amazing staff
text: It’s the third time I stay at 1 Hotel Central Park. This is a cozy hotel in the heart of Manhattan. Super modern but cozy decor and the best staff ever. GK is the door men, he help us every moment we need. I really recommend this hotel.

title: first stay at One hotel in NYC
text:
we had a wonderful stay and staff was friendly and accomodating --
the location right off central park is superb for uptown activities and access to the park!
We usually stay at St Regis and Claridges but One hotel was a pleasant change and reasonably priced. 
We would definitely return---

title: Oasis in the heart of the city
text: Wonderful sojurn in the city at 1Hotel. The room, while compact, was thoughtfully laid out and extremely comfortable. Loved the soothing, natural decor. My daughter loved the window seat overlooking Central Park. Appreciated the turn down service. The toiletries were top notch and the shower excellent. Fantastic location with quick access to the park, Columbus Circle, 5th Avenue shopping and so much more. Most importantly, the staff were incredibly warm and welcoming. Christopher at the front desk accomodated us with an early check in (much appreciated after coming in on the red eye). The stay felt very personal as compared to larger hotels. Concierge was helpful with dining recommendations. I would definitely stay here again.

title: HOSPITALITY AND SUSTAINABILITY AT ITS BEST IN NYC
text: Everyone was so welcoming and warm; from the moment you arrive until you check-out. The room was well-appointed and very thoughtful. Love all the touches of sustainability from the note cards, hangers and room key.

title: Other 1 locations much better
text: Nice presentation as always with 1 hotels - good vibes and ambience ; however this was my first time staying at the Central Park location and didn’t have a good experience. Curtains and lighting were off in the room causing a room wakeup when I worked late and needed sleep; and room cleaning entered at 9am for lack of attention  (fixable items of course ). Room was small for the price . AC wasn’t functioning properly enough and room was too warm to sleep .. leading to a bad sleep as well. Staff could’ve been a bit more knowledgeable and attentive to detail . Other 1 locations haven’t had these issues so I’m suprised

title: Noise Noise Noise
text: The hotel is quite cool and I love the purpose of sustainability. Unlikely I'had a very bas stay because in my room the sink was in the hallway and for all 4 night I suffered incredible noise from wht works made on the road on 6th avenue. I rateher prefer to be informed about such noise and be addressed by the staff in another kind of room

title: Outstanding Service and Value
text: This was my second stay at One Hotel Central Park and this time I brought my extended family. I love the look and feel of the hotel, and the nature based surroundings makes you feel like you are staying in Central Park! I love the location, I love the decor, I love Jams. But most of all the service is outstanding! Everyone but particularly the front desk and the concierge go out of their way to make sure you have everything you need and they are so welcoming and friendly, but professional and providing us with awesome reservations at Sarabeth's and the perfect transportation options.

title: Excellent location with superb staff and services
text: Spent 3 days, 2 nights in July 2022 with the family.  Had a room that slept 4 folks and there was plenty of room for three of us (teen and two adults).  Excellent staff, amenities and location to Central Park, great dining and other sites.  Wife bought candles from the lobby to bring the ambience home with us.  The best feature of the room was the sitting space on the window: it was used continuously.

title: Oasis in the City
text: Since the Pandemic, I have not experienced such warmand empathetic guest services at a hotel that coupled with the thoughtful details in our rooms made our stay pure bliss. We cannot wait to return for another stay.

title: A homerun!
text: We was looking for a new place to stay in NYC and really wanted a change from all the old luxury hotels so we did some research and decided on 1 Hotel Central Park, and am SO glad we did. From beginning to end it exceeded our expectations, and the fact that it is carbon neutral only made it better. The minute you walk in you feel like you are not in a big city anymore. The entire staff was so welcoming, friendly and accommodating for our entire stay. Our room was lovely and had the best view of Central Park, very comfortable bed, nice linens, luxurious bath products and the best robes I have ever had in a hotel. We were on the 17th floor and literally did not hear a sound all night including the famous NYC car horn. We had everything we needed in our room and when we called down for one thing that we did not have they were knocking at the door in less than ten minutes with our request. Another thing we loved so much was that all the water in the hotel is filtered which I have only seen in one other hotel outside of the United States. We had dinner in Jams one night and were blown away by the service and our dinners I had the Wild Striped Bass which was DELICIOUS and will get it again as soon as I can get back there and my daughter had the Gnocchi which was also very tasty. Our servers were so attentive and friendly and dining room was warm and inviting. It was surprisingly quiet for a busy place. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and can not wait to return and also try other 1 Hotels.

title: Verdant tranquility in the heart of it all
text: My family spent three glorious nights at the hotel this July. It is a true oasis amid the hustle and bustle of the city. This property is gorgeous; surrounding you with nature at every turn. We stayed in the 2 bedroom alcove suite which suited us perfectly. The rooms are spacious and beautifully decorated. I had quite possibly the best sleeps of my life here. We loved everything about this stay including the exceptional service. Love love love the little chalkboards and the ability to leave notes to the people tidying the room, we had so much fun with that. I sincerely hope to return some day, and will seek out this brand in other locations. Thank you for an unforgettable stay.

title: Excellent stay
text: I had the most wonderful stay at the 1 Hotel central park. The lobby has the best smell I have ever smelled. Everything was clean and beautiful. The location is amazing. The hotel is ssssooo cute and comfortable and beautiful.  But, most importantly I was greeting and well taken care of by both the front desk woman Rita and the bell hop G.  Their service alone is reason for me to return.

title: Just Great
text: ロケーション、サービスともに素晴らしい。　セントラルポークの目の前でどこにいくにも便利すぎるほど便利。環境も良いし何より空調がデリケートに設定できるのが助かった。スタッフの対応が大変洗練されておりフレンドリーだった。「邪魔しないでください」というサインはタグじゃなくてボタンを押すんだけど、それを間違えて押していただらわざわざクリーンチームからメッセージが入って、何かあったら言ってくれと。素晴らしい１チームだと思った。

title: Getaway weekend!
text: Perfect location!  One block from Central Park and located within walking distance to all of the upscale stores.  Kind and friendly staff and the rooms are so unique and cozy!  The bed was so comfy.  My stay was perfect!

title: My stay at 1 Hotel Central Park.
text: The hotel staff, from receptionist to bellmen, was exceptional. The service was professional, friendly and very accommodating. But for the problem with AC not working in my room, my stay would have been a perfect 10,

title: Impressive
text:
New York has so many hotels to choose from but this hotel was right up there with the big ones.
Clean friendly with a great caring for the planet consept through out and in a perfect location which my our visit.

title: Very Beautiful Hotel but with Critical Flaws
text: The hotel is very beautiful and comfortable, and very well located for many Midtown activities. Our major issue was with the completely non-functioning WIFI in our room. It made it very difficult to plan our days or even send emails without resorting to using our cellular service (very expensive coming from Canada). This is our 4th visit to this hotel and the menu in the restaurant hasn't changed at all over our visits. An updated menu or at least seasonal specials would also go a long way to make the restaurant (Jams) feel more notable as an actual culinary experience, as opposed to simply a source of convenience. The staff were friendly and the furnishings were comfortable.

title: Amazing Stay at 1 Hotel Central Park
text: Beautiful scenery, staff that goes out of their way to help you have an amzing stay, fresh scents all throughout the hotel, environmentally friendly, and super cozy rooms. I recomend you stay here to experience a nature inspired stay near the beautiful Central Park that gives you such a unique and satisfying stay.

title: Best nights sleep
text: From the triple filtered water to the cozy bed and well appointed bathroom this hotel was beyond my expectations. I drive in and had my car valeted. I was beyond excited to find a Nespresso maker in room - lately I can’t find coffee in room anywhere! I felt like the staff went above and beyond and would 100% stay again.

title: Wonderful Hotel Experience
text: We chose this hotel simply because it was within our budget and in the area we wanted to stay. I loved the sustainability approach, and our toddler enjoyed the apples and pears by the elevators. The staff was extremely welcoming by holding our luggage before and after our stay, and they placed a roll away crib in our room as well. The overall atmosphere is stunning and a breath of fresh air after spending the day walking the streets of NYC. We would love to come back to this hotel in the future.

title: We had a fabulous stay, loved everything but most of all the sustainability theme
text:
We loved this hotel and its commitment to sustainability.  This was evident throughout the property with careful attention to all the little details as well as the bigger things.  None of that compromised the comfort of our stay, but actually added to it, the greenery was beautiful and made a welcome retreat from the heat of the summer. Even the smell when you entered the lobby was fabulous.  The staff were also friendly, cheerful and helpful. Food was delicious.
We would stay here again and happy to recommend it.

title: Great experience working from the bar!
text: Had a lovely cauliflower soup and fantastic bread (from Sullivan Street Bakery - the butter that was with it was incredible!) and a coffee at the hotel restaurant Jams. I worked a bit at the bar counter while I enjoyed lunch. Wasn’t loud or terribly crowded - but lots of people - they just use the space well and you don’t feel rushed or too close to others. The environment is fresh and chic - with loads of plants. A great serving/bar staff - friendly and attentive!

title: Amazing !!!!
text: The staff welcomed us with open arms and attentive to our needs. The lobby was filled of amazing plants and a great aroma. The room was extremely clean and large for a NYC Hotel. I will be back soon to NYC and will definitely stay here again.

title: Wonderful intimate hotel in the heart of the city!
text:
My husband and I stumbled upon 1 Hotel while looking for holiday options in NYC, and, we couldn't have been happier! 

We are regulars are the Taj, Ritz, Mandarin and Four Seasons globally and even with those experiences we LOVED staying at the 1 Hotel. Excellent facilities, personalized care, and wonderful staff are on our list of things we love about the 1. 

Chris, Lorenzo and GK made us feel at home. Chris in particular was super thoughtful about so many things that would make us comfortable over a 10 day stay. 

In short, we highly recommend 1 Hotel; you can't go wrong with this option.

title: Excellent dining experience at JAMS
text:
My wife and I are staying at 1 Hotel Central Park and ate an early dinner at JAMS.  We shared with the hostess that we were nervous about indoor dining with COVID, but were not necessarily excited about eating outside on the curb during rush hour when it was 80 degrees. The hostess replied without judgement, "I understand" and respectfully offered a few indoor seating options that provided some distance from other diners.
Our waiter, Tarell, was excellent and the service was efficient, friendly, and professional.  The food was great as well.

title: Amazing place, steps from Central Park!
text: I stayed here for a couple days of meetings around NYC, it's a perfect central location to easily visit various places around Manhattan and Brooklyn, and in between meetings enjoy the amazing surroundings of Central Park, 5th Ave etc. The hotel has a stunning design, like a little green oasis in the heart of the city. Loved having filtered tab water (so no need for plastic bottles here), all upscale hotels should offer this. We had some cocktails in the bar / restaurant which were excellent and staff super friendly with good cocktail recommendations. Fantastic morning run in Central Park, literally steps away from the park entrance.

title: Friendly service!
text: Very friendly and helpful staff. Love the sustainability mission. Quiet rooms, got an excellent night sleep. Highly recommend to anyone staying in NYC. Why do these reviews have to be 200 characters..

title: We will return, again and again
text: We live near Albany and visit the city for leisure regularly, experiencing many area hotels.  1 Hotel Central Park carved it's way into our favorite spot.  1.  The location is perfect.  2. The staff was (by far) the most endearing we have ever encountered.  We felt our business was appreciated - that goes a long way, especially in the current climate.  Everyone from door service to front desk was impeccable, professional, helpful and kind.  I especially appreciate the assistance coordinating a birthday surprise for my husband.  3.  The room was phenomenal.  My husband's career is in renewable energy so it goes without saying that we appreciated the values here but, it MUST be said that the hotel & room were drop dead gorgeous.  Aesthetically stunning, clean and thoughtful to include the chalkboard welcome note from the staff.  By far, the QUIETEST hotel we have ever stayed in NYC.  1 Hotel Central Park is our new go to.  We are already looking forward to our next visit.

title: Excellent stay!
text: Beautiful hotel and incredibly accommodating staff.  The courtesy car is a fantastic perk.  G in particular was super helpful and a pleasure to talk with.  It was also incredibly easy to arrange for a late check out.  Cannot wait to come back.

title: Delightful Retreat in the Heart of the City
text:
My husband and I recently enjoyed a delightful few days at 1 Hotel Central Park. The staff was attentive and friendly, greeting us both at every opportunity.
The hotel itself is a perfect boutique environment, the decor is quirky, eclectic yet charming (and I loved the thoughtful offering of assorted apples in the lobby). 
The room itself is a calm and restful space with every consideration for a cozy stay. The towels are generously proportioned, the bath robes are divine and the pony tail holder included with the shower cap was a welcome and useful surprise! The bed and linens were very comfortable and my favorite feature was the upholstered window seat where I spent most of my time in the room.
So many thoughtful details, with the exception of just two items … the walls are paper thin, we could hear the very vocal kids in the next room much to clearly and the lower quality toilet paper, definitely expected a top tier hotel like this to step up their TP game.

title: My number 1 Hotel in NYC
text: Even prior walking in this amazing hotel I could feel and see something unique about it, strategically located on a corner in front of Central Park, the vertical garden on the first 3 floors of the building and the beautiful plants around the main entrance left me stunned. Once entered I was warmly welcomed by the staff who helped me with my bags and walked me to the front desk, check in process was smooth and efficient. My stunning king room with Central Park views left me short of breath, I decided to extend one night because I didn’t want this amazing feeling to come to an end. I was in need of organizing some activities around town and Michael from the Concierge team did an amazing job trying to fully satisfy my requests. I can’t thank enough all the team of the 1 Hotel Central Park for making my stay a number 1 of a kind, but especially Rita who looked after me with an outstanding 5 stars customer service expertise during my stay.

title: 5 Star Service
text: 1 Hotel Central Park is a must stay when visiting New York. From the moment you walk in, you're immersed in live plants, and modern wood accents. The vibe is top notch. Restaurant and bar are awesome. Location right across from Central Park is unbeatable. The gym is well above average as far as hotel gyms go. But what really sets this hotel apart is the staff. They went above and beyond from the second we arrived, until our departure and ensured our stay was stress free and enjoyable. Our departing flight wasn't until 8pm and they provided us with late check out and kept our bags while we explored the city. Anderson and G were rockstars. Thank you again for an incredible experience! We'll be back very soon.

title: Perfect Stay
text: I took my son to NYC for his 16th birthday.  1 Hotel Central Park was excellent.  The staff were wonderful to deal with.  Very helpful, fun and all staff have a great positivity.  Location is great.  Gym is great.  Food is great. I've stayed there before so I knew the accommodations/room would be great.  But the reason why I'll keep returning to this hotel is the staff.

title: Amazing hotel
text: The location of hotel is superb 200 to central park . Between 5th&6th Avenue which consider as the moste famous fashion street.. staff are super friendly. Room are decent size and clean. I enjoy the stay and definitely will come back again

title: Great green hotel
text:
Loved staying here. The staff are very nice and the location is great. Food and drinks in the restaurant were good too. Free apples and pears at the elevator.
The only things I missed was a bar for my towel to dry on. I like to reuse my towel and they only had a hook.

title: Beautiful property and gorgeous location
text: Please call the hotel directly to book! My only complaint is that when I made my reservation, I inadvertently was connected to a third party agency who charged an extravagant booking fee! That said, One Hotel worked very hard to help us try to cancel that, and took amazing care of me during my stay. The property is spectacularly beautiful, the rooms are lovely and the drinks and food were amazing - as were the customer service.

title: Just ok
text: We stayed her overnight on our way to Milan. The whole stay was unimpressive. We arrived at 11pm to find the bar was closed as well as room service. For a city known for being up late this was dissapointing. Staff was ok nothing really negative nor outstanding with the exception of Gi, who helped us put our bags in our Lyft.  He was a real gem. He suggested we try the hotel in Brooklyn. The room was clean and nice.

title: Amazing!
text: This hotel is a total gem in the best location in NYC. Total luxury experience and you feel like you are in a wellness oasis in the middle of a bustling city. The minute you walk into the hotel you just feel calm - as others noted the smell of the lobby is amazing and the dim lighting and decor are just what you need after a busy day on the streets of NYC. The rooms are gorgeous and the staff is so attentive, kind  and want to make sure you have everything you possibly need. I stayed for 4 nights with my 2 young daughters for a summer vacation. It was perfect. Will definitely stay here again the next time I visit NYC.

title: Excellent Service
text: Hotel Was awesome. People were very friendly and helpful. Room had ample space and was nicely appointed. They had fruit in the lobby for snacks which I really appreciated. Beds were very comfy. Shower was amazing with water coming right out of the ceiling. Location was great. Close enough to times square without being in that tourist trap.

title: Joanne L
text: My friend’s and I took a weekend trip to NYC and stayed at the 1 hotel Central Park. Not only was the hotel beautiful and breath taking, the service was amazing. Our experience was phenomenal from the moment we arrived to the moment we left. We were checked in by Chester who was great! He was super accommodating and very helpful, exceeding our expectations. We can’t forget about GK and Anderson, they too we’re amazing and very helpful! Needless to say, we’ll definitely be back!

title: Garden of Eden
text: We love this hotel. 2nd time staying and equally as good as the first. It’s like walking into a magical other world. It looks and smells amazing. And they have two adjoining rooms for our family, one with a queen for our kids and a king for us with a great window seat with a peak view of Central Park. We love all the sustainable details throughout the hotel and the rooms.

title: A Fan!
text: I am a fan of 1Hotel properties. I stayed at the Miami resort and fell in love. I knew what to expect when staying at the Central Park location. Rooms are tight, but space is laid out well. When visiting you should purchase a candle the signature scent is divine.

title: Outstanding Eco Luxury - On All Levels!
text:
1 Hotel Central Park has become my go-to when in NYC - truly my home away from home!  The attention to detail is impressive - from the organic delish food to the natural atmosphere (plants aplenty) and the well-appointed fitness center to the sustainable & comfy room flourishes. Best of all is the amazing staff - friendly, professional & willing to go the extra mile. 
As a former business traveler who has pretty much experienced the range of accommodations, I give 1 Hotel Central Park my highest recommendation!

title: Lovely place, great concept but over-priced
text: Great location and great concept but significantly over priced. Note that if you want a Park View, unless on one of the top 3-4 floors the view is limited to the trees between 2 buildings. Closest building had scaffolding too so restricted view. Aircon not working in gym. Aircon not working properly in the room and not fixed during last 2 days of stay. Service was generally friendly and attentive but a little superficial in places.  Jams is good but menu very limited. Overall for the cost I would look elsewhere.

title: Family visit to NYC
text: We had a wonderful stay at 1 Hotel as it is close to everything.  What made the stay particularly special was the support of concierge RICHARD BRANCH - he helped coordinate babysitting, family-friendly restaurant reservations, surprise sundaes for the kids, and also the hotel car during a particularly hectic (and rainy!) evening.  If you stay, be sure to ask for his help as it certainly enhanced our stay.

title: Weekend NYC Getaway
text: Hotel is charming and very ideally located!  Friendly and helpful staff! Great location by Central Park, 5th Ave Shops and Broadway.  Love the atmosphere of the hotel and the use of natural products.  Amazing room with great rain shower and comfortable bedding.

title: Hotel feels like home
text: The ambience, attention to detail, the quality of the products and mattresses made it feel like we were living in a cozy New York apartment. The service was excellent. One minor repair got taken care of in the fist 10 minutes of our stay.

title: Very good place to stay
text: It is a good hotel with excellent location very close central park. With friendly stuff and nice and spacefull rooms. A little bit overpriced and they should definitely work on the serving speed in the restaurant. The rooms are clean and the fitness center is perfect. The lobby is full of live, with nice atmosphere.

title: Fabulous Hotel
text:
1 Hotel was the perfect choice for our family trip to NYC!!
The location is great, the restaurant Jams is impressive, and the hotel smells amazing😃😃 The staff were uber friendly and accomodating, we absolutely loved it!

title: Great hotel & fantastic service
text: We stayed at 1 Hotel for 4 days on a family trip to NYC.  We had 3 rooms in the hotel.  The hotel itself was amazing.  The rooms were clean, well-appointed, super comfortable.  The location was perfect - close to Central Park & within walking distance of Broadway, subway stations, restaurants, pretty much everything you would want.  However, what set this hotel apart from every other hotel we have ever staying in was the concierge, Lorenzo Gutierrez.  Lorenzo worked with me for weeks before our trip with advice on places to go and things to do.  He secured reservations for us and transportation to and from the airport.  He contact me immediately when he found our that our flight had been cancelled to see if we needed additional help getting to NYC.  While we were in NYC, he responded to every question we had (and there were many) quickly and thoroughly.  Could we have navigated a family trip to NYC without him - yes.  Would I ever want to do so again - no.  He patient, prompt and thorough assistance made out trip so much less stressful and more enjoyable.  I would stay in this hotel again just work have access to him and everyone else working the front desk.  1 Hotel NYC's greatest resource is the people working at the hotel.

title: Amazing Experience.
text: It was an amazing experience from the moment I arrived. Checking in was quick and easy. The staff was very friendly and Extremely accommodating. I’ll recommend this Hotel to everyone I meet. It’s truly an amazing experience.

title: Beautiful!
text: This hotel is a lush oasis in the heart of the city. We looked forward to walking into our lobby (it smells amazing) at the end of each busy day. Our room was very comfortable and extremely clean. We enjoyed chatting with Carlisle, the bartender inside the hotel restaurant, Jams. The location is perfect for exploring the city, and the hotel is so beautiful that you look forward to returning to your home base each night. We’ll be back!

title: A beautiful treat for the senses
text: 1 Hotel Central Park was great! It’s a lovely experience for the senses as soon as you walk in . From the beautiful decor to the lovely sandalwood fragrance in the lobby to all of detail and thought that went into designing the room! They didn’t miss a thing and it really shows. The staff is very friendly and helpful and we didn’t want to leave our gorgeous, comfortable room! We’ll definitely be back!

title: Boutique Gem
text: Well staffed with friendly and knowledgeable people. In these tim s that alone is a wonderful experience. Convenient restaurant with fresh and varied choices. Walkable location to Central Park.. Very current and clean.

title: My Favorite Hotel!
text: Had a great stay at my favorite hotel. This is my second time staying and I had a wonderful time. The room was beautiful and my favorite part was the window nook where I got to relax after a long day of exploring.  Joshua at the desk was so charming and made me feel comfortable as soon as I checked in. He also never missed a chance to greet me every morning and gave some good coffee recommendations nearby. The location of the hotel is perfect right in the center of the hustle and bustle of the city.  I can’t wait to come back and make this a yearly visit!

title: Great location, concept and value
text: Location cannot be beat. Short walk to Central Park, shopping, etc. Great luxury eco-friendly concept. One of the better values among 5 star hotels in the area. Room was consistent in size with other NYC hotels. Dining program was solid. Service was underwhelming, felt more 4 star than 5 star — but it was a busy weekend and it seemed as though they may have been understaffed. Long waits for elevators so prepare accordingly. Would stay here again, though seemed to be a better choice for adults than families with young kids.

title: Amazing stay
text: We had a block of rooms for my daughters wedding and could not have had a better experience.  Everyone from the group sales team to the front desk to the service staff was incredibly helpful, warm and eager to please.  We loved our stay here and highly recommend!

title: Eco-Friendly & Sexy Hotel!!!
text:
I absolutely LOVED LOVED LOVED this hotel!!! It felt like it was personally curated for me and well, that is always a magical feeling. 

My partner and I arrived on our bikes and upon arrival, they offered to store our bicycles and to help with dinner reservations. The people at the front desk, Luis and Rita quickly became fast friend with us and the manager, Joseph over seeing the place, made us feel extra special with his genuine interest in our lives. You can tell he has been in this industry for a while with his white glove treatment. Lastly, Michael, the concierge was very helpful with last minute dinner reservations.  

The professionalism, the coolness and the overall vibe of the place was exceptional. I personally admire how this hotel is eco- friendly and actively doing their part to help with climate change and the less fortunate. 

The hotel has a triple filtering system which left me skin feeling like silk smooth, they offer free apples everyday, and if you want to leave some clothing behind, they will donate the used clothing to a near by shelter. 

If every hotel did more like this hotel is doing, the world would be a better place for all. 

Thank you to the 1 Hotel and their staff for such an incredible evening. We will be back and hopefully for a longer stay :)

title: Great Property with Great Location and Environmental Responsible
text: When you want to feel good about your contribution (or lack thereoff) to our environment, but still experience luxury --- This is the place.  Fantastic rooms, fantastic service, and great location. In addition to 'standard decision criteria' for a place to stay, 1 Hotel has an environmental angle --- and its not just an angle. Everything including Live Plants in the room are environmentally oriented. Hats off to the entire team and concept here!

title: Beautiful eco-friendly hotel
