text: We recently stayed here to celebrate my birthday and parents anniversary. The hotel is much what you would expect from 1hotels but on a smaller scale. I loved the aesthetic and the staff was very friendly, not to mention the location situated close to Central Park. My only complaint is that there seems to be zero sound proofing in the rooms. We could literally here the people next to us having a conversation. I know it’s not probably great for the environment but sound machines are provided in most nyc hotel rooms, seems like that could help eliminate that problem. Other than that, we loved the hotel and would recommend to anyone!

title: First Class Experience!
text: Excellent location.  Super helpful and courteous members of staff.  Excellent food for a hotel restaurant.  Spotlessly clean.  Sumptuous bathroom products.  Very comfortable bed.  Well thought out room lighting.   Requests taken care of immediately ... new hair dryer (turned out to be operator error) and a kettle (I am English and like my tea) .. both delivered within minutes of request.

title: Wonderful
text: This place was like an oasis in the middle of a bustling city. I enjoyed every second of my stay. From the bed, to the shower, to the room service, to the lovely window seat where I spent most evenings. it was the perfect place to unwind after busy days at work.

title: Business trip
text: Room was clean and comfortable. Size was alittle small. Interesting glass walls within the bathroom. Thanks for letting me hook up my Amazon Firestick for optional entertainment from my home state on my native time zone. As far as suggestions,  offer distilled water for the customers who experience sleep apnea and require a CPAP machines. Thanks for a wonderful comfortable experience.

title: Downfall in standards
text:
I was asked to reserve this Hotel for business travel of a couple, who had been there before on at least two occasions. 
Night duty staff, unfortunately due to typos replied poorly to my email for a request.
Concierge kept me on hold, even though I was calling NYC from Italy/Europe, while having to verify a rather simple request for a n afternoon booking at the hotel Café… Jams.
Very bad experience reported one morning when a mouse ran through the breakfast room.
Very disappointing reply from the Hotel upon a complaint 
We shall no longer suggest this hotel for future stays, have informed out business travel agency

title: Most fantastic hotel!
text: Loved our stay.  Wonderful staff.  Beautiful accommodations.  Ecofriendly and sustainable practices.  Super service.  Beautiful, convenient location near Central Park.  Courtesy car service greatly appreciated on a rainy day.  Can't say enough good things!

title: Beautiful hotel
text: The hotel was beautiful and everyone was very friendly. Luis at front desk was extremely considerate of my stay. The room was clean and in working order. The best part of the hotel was my room. It made me feel like I was home with all the bells and whistles.

title: Okay
text: Overall the experience was okay. I loved the wood and general furnishing. Rooms ought to be cleaned daily and check out time can be made faster. The deposit for incidentals though to be returned needs to be reduced or an alternative found.

title: A beautiful oasis
text: I will definitely be back and want to go to other locations as well. I planned a staycation here to celebrate an anniversary and Memorial Day and I’m so glad I did. The hotel is beautiful and smells divine and I love the sustainability aspects. Rita who helped check me in was lovely and accommodating and even had a bottle of Prosecco sent up for us to celebrate when she found out it was our anniversary. Also when I arrived Gi stood in the street for me to save me a parking spot so I could park for free during our stay! He went above and beyond and I was very appreciative. I highly recommend staying at this hotel!

title: The Front Desk Staff Is Amazing
text: We stayed in a double room, it was well kept, clean, the linens were bright white and soft. The hotel has a phenomenal scent, I'll come back just for the wonderful smell.I knocked off a star because the hotel seems to be understaffed and the overnight manager is clueless. The daytime front desk staff is wonderful, the tall guy, Chester made our stay! We spent 2 nights at the hotel for our daughters Fordham graduation, and he remembered our names each time we walked in with a big smile and a hearty laugh, what a gem of a guy!

title: Truly AMAZING
text:
I can't say enough about 1Hotel.  Not only was it beautiful, relaxing, SUPER CLEAN and convenient to Central Park, 5th Avenue, Park Avenue, Broadway & Times Square, the service was TOP SHELF.  My husband and I  had our flight canceled so we arrived a day later.  We arrived super early in the morning (way before check in time) and we were exhausted from the airline fiasco.  When I asked if they could hold our items behind the desk since we could not check into our room yet, they actually looked to see if there was a room available so we could check in, get cleaned up and catch a quick cat nap before the show we had tickets for.
The only thing they had available was an upgraded room but they were kind enough to give us that room at no additional charge.  How nice was that?  Lorenzo the Concierge was also incredible.  He set us up with transportation, restaurants and more.  We will DEFINITELY be back and based off of our experience, we will be staying at their other properties as well.  Thank you 1Hotel.  YOU ROCK!!

title: Perfect Spot in NYC
text: We chose the 1Hotel after staying in other wonderful NYC hotels such as The Plaza, The Refinery and Mondrian.  We loved it.  From Chester making the check in seamless even though we had a complicated reservation to the immediate room service and wonderful shower.  You won't be disappointed.

title: Wonderful stay in a great location
text:
Love the eco friendliness of this hotel without plastic and lots of greenery and wood throughout. Staff are incredibly friendly  and GK and Rita were especially wonderful in Lobby 
It is pricey but it so well fitted out and the service was excellent. Housekeeping came very late for us one day when we forgot to turn off Do Not Disturb. They were so gracious about it - Luda and Jiang.

title: Couples Trip
text: 1 Hotel is a great location especially if you want to enjoy the park. We were there for 3 nights and really enjoyed our stay. Very clean and accommodating, especially all the staff. You can easily get to Broadway or the upper west side. Highly recommend.

title: Oasis of nature and calm just south of Central Park
text: An unobtrusive and nature-inspired design in this modern bulding 1 block from the park. A busy location on 58th st. and 6th Avenue, but the windows do a good job of muting the street noise, evenm from our room on the 4th floor. Interconnecting rooms a plus for families. The window 'nooks' some with pillows are a great feature for city-gazing. Nice small gyum with 2 peleton bikes and good equipment -but when it's nice out - go to the park for a run!

title: Ivy covered retreat
text: Looking for the perfectly located respite in the middle of New York ? This is it. plenty of action downstairs, upstairs a break with quiet hallways leading to tranquil sustainable rooms with views ! The rooms are fabulous for one person. No bathtubs. If lovely open shower is your choice, this is a perfect alternative. Younger vibe. Nothing stuffy here. All you need is available.

title: Große Klasse!
text: Aussergewöhnliches Hotel, Hingucker, mit ausgesprochen nettem Personal.Tolle Lage, sauberes Zimmer, einladendes Bad mit allem Notwendigen, gemütliches Bett mit idealer Matratze, Schreibtisch, sehr schöne Atmosphäre.

title: My worst 1 hotel experience thus far
text: Took 1.5 hrs to get bags brought up.  Call for engineering help for the room was unanswered.  2 hours later I had been moved to a new room but after 45 minutes of waiting for help with bags, I moved everything myself.   My personal worst 1 hotel experience to date.

title: Be prepared for the daily "Destination Fee"
text: I loved the hotel, it's eco-friendly vibe, it's location, and the staff.  I however was surprised to see a  "destination fee" tacked on to my itemized bill everyday. It is presently an additional $40.00 each day.  This is a significant additional hidden fee that you should factor this into the cost of the hotel.

title: A dream
text: Best hotel  in all my trips in New York. Well situated  and at a walking distance from central park, time square and all stores on 5th ave. I recommend to any one who  is looking for something special at a acceptable price for New York .

title: Dark, smelly small room for $750 a night
text: Very unpleasant dark small room with a view of the air shaft - though in this case possibly better than hearing the street construction all night. AC has a dank smell. Far too expensive for what you get. No duvet, just a thin blanket - I was freezing all night.

title: Wow
text:
From my guy Tommy and AJ in the lobby, to the views and energy around the hotel, you can’t go wrong. They gave me recs, the smell in the lobby is perfect, and the bed (!). Hate to say it, but they just made me a 1 Hotel hypebeast. 

Thanks for the stay!

title: Fantastic hotel.
text: I stayed at this hotel for 4 nights & was so impressed by the location, the staff, room comfort and so much more!  This is a highly recommended place & I’d def go back there again!  This is a must see hotel!   5  stars !!!

title: FIVE STARS!!
text: Service is everything and the 1 Hotel in Central Park provides that and much much more. Special thanks to the team, in particular G who was always there to greet us when we were coming and going from the property. All stems from great leadership, thanks Bernd!

title: Mrs
text:
Always an amazing experience at the 1Hotel in NYC.

Thank you so much to all the wonderful staff that made my visit so pleasant and enjoyable.
Everyone single person is wonderful in this hotel specially G the doorman that always goes out of his way to accommodate l, support and create a seamless experience for you!

title: Thank you GK & team
text: I came and visited the 1 Hotel with my family. I’m disabled and the whole team was very kind with me. Especially GK who helped me a lot with my scooter. Thank you 🙏 you made my stay easier and pleasant

title: Fabulous Hotel Near Central Park
text: Highly recommend this property, quality furnishings, spacious rooms, fun vibe in the restaurant/lobby areas.  The staff were friendly and super helpful, check in team were genuinely pleased to welcome guests and couldn't do enough to accommodate special requests - big shoutout to Anderson.

title: Perfect location, gorgeous hotel
text:
My daughter and I have been wanting to stay at this hotel
location for years. Finally for her 17th birthday we were able to make it happen!  The hotel is amazing and the location is fabulous!  We were a block from central
Park and close enough to walk to the theater district and felt completely safe. The hotel is even better in person. The staff was very friendly at check in, however, the restaurant staff did seem slightly bothered each time we asked for a table, although there were plenty of tables available. Food in Jams was delicious! We ate in the restaurant multiple times. We had a king room with the cutest little window seat that made the trip for my daughter. I arranged ahead of time to have balloons in the room for her birthday. Concierge was extremely helpful to help me arrange this. They also left cookies and a personal note for her. Our entire stay was amazing, my only complaint is that out AC did not work properly the entire time we were there. I asked the front desk for help the first night and they got it to cool off slightly, but the remainder of our stay was quite warm. I continued to ask for service but it was never received again. Kind of bummer because the cost of the room I would expect to have a functioning AC system. I would absolutely stay here again, as long as I could have a room with AC. Side note, the bathroom is not very private so keep that in mind with who you are traveling with.

title: New York
text: The staff is amazing and two great examples of this are GK and Anderson. Also the hotel is really nice and the service was very very good it was representative of vc w  a 5 star hotel service should be.

title: fabulous location
text: A+++ location. Room was small as NYC hotel rooms tend to be but well put together. LOVED the window seat. nice vibe to the property. We came from a performance at Carnegie Hall, at 10:30 the restaurant, bar  AND room service were closed. That was ponderous on a Friday night, however, plenty of other places nearby. and SO CLOSE to the park! Enjoyed our stay.

title: Hotel bien situado pero servicio deficiente
text:
Estuvimos 5 días en el hotel, le doy 3 estrellas porque aunque está muy bien situado, para el precio de las habitaciones son muy pequeñas. Tampoco te explican bien como funciona el hotel, como se avisa para que te limpien la habitación (el primer día no nos hicieron la habitación), etc. 

Además, en cuanto llegas te hacen dejar un depósito de 750 dólares, de los cuales no te avisan antes para ir preparados.

Tuvimos bastante mala experiencia con el restaurante para el desayuno, en el cual al ser público, se llena de gente de fuera del hotel y aunque estuvimos esperando más de 10 minutos para que nos sentaran a desayunar, no nos atendieron, por lo que no volvimos. 

Lo que destaco es la ayuda  de Anderson y GK, también fueron amables con la búsqueda de un paquete que recibimos al hotel. 

En conclusión, aunque el hotel no está mal, no creo que el servicio esté a la altura de un hotel de 5 estrellas.

title: Came for a conference, stayed for the hospitality
text:
My wife and I lumped a conference in with a family vacation. IT WAS THE BEST IDEA. We are a family of 5 with kids ages 13, 11, and 4. 

We are so glad that we picked 1 Hotel Central Park for our stay. It did mean that mama had to walk to her conference in Times Square, but she didn’t mind one bit, and it added to the daily step count—yes, we are into that stuff :) 

The decor is super modern and green. We appreciated the well appointed rooms. Speaking of which, we went for the connecting alcove 2-bedroom to accommodate our family and it was the perfect choice. 

We are just a block away from CP and it was the perfect location. Again, for our family, being able to just work a few minutes to the playground or just run around the park was perfect. We racked up the steps because we chose to walk around as much as possible. The location made everything we wanted to visit accessible. Our little guy did great, racking up 20k steps a day! He slept great!

The housekeeping crew were great and we appreciated how tidy they left our room day after day. We “live hard” in our hotel rooms and the staff kept the room clean and restocked daily and very quickly. 

Our hats our to all staff. Luis at the front desk was very helpful and kind, helping us get acclimated our first few nights. Always patient and helpful. 

We felt lucky to visit while G and Benny were working. They always sent us off each morning and welcomed us back with smiles. It’s not easy traveling with kids, so having such friendly staff was very much appreciated. 

Shout out to our concierge, Richard. Give him some data points, and he will wow you with his spot on recommendations. One that I want to share here was his recommendation for me to visit the whiskey trader, a local bar with world class whiskey. 

The bartenders are super at JAMS restaurant in the hotel. Led by Jack, we enjoyed cocktails with the crew each night. We tried pretty much all of the drinks, plus some they whipped up for our curious taste buds. 

We had the pleasure of meeting Joe Torres, from 1 Hotel SF, who was on assignment. He made our time even more special.  WE can’t wait to visit the property in SF when it opens. 

Our only delta for the trip was with the menu. We asked for a grilled cheese for our little guy—an off menu item and they declined our request. So if you have younger kids with limited tastes, you may find it difficult to eat at the restaurant.

title: They are always #1
text: I stay at this hotel often, may 10 times a year. This trip was especially great. Josh at the front desk was always on point, with a smile, never missed saying good morning to me……just a delight. He even sent cookies and wine with a hand written note. A lovely touch to a great stay. They were all helpful and friendly. GK the valet was also wonderful. Taking care of my bags, ushering me into my Uber. I couldn’t have asked for a better stay. The rooms are also always perfect, from the crispy sheets to the pristinely clean bathrooms. I always know what to expect when the door opens and it not only smells great but looks great too! See you again in a few weeks 1 Hotel xoxo

title: Truly phenomenal experience - best staff in NYC hospitality
text:
The staff here is what makes the biggest difference in my experience staying in NYC. While you can find luxury hotels all over the city, there are always (in my experience) status/class judgements made by the staff and you are treated accordingly. 

At the 1 Hotel, this couldn't be farther from the case. From check in to check out, the staff was SO kind, flexible, understanding, and hospitable. In many cases, they went out of their way to make sure I had everything I needed. Not just on check in and check out days. 

Safety is always my top priority when I'm traveling for business solo. I felt safe everywhere in the building and the location is optimal for walking/arriving at night if you have late events. 

Not only did I feel safe and taken care of by the staff, but they went out of their way to ensure that I had a room when my flight was canceled last minute (7pm that night).  When I asked about availability for that night, they could have laughed or let me figure it out myself. Even with pretty much full commitments, they were able to help me arrange accommodations for that night. AND they kept my previous rate. Truly best in class. 

While I wasn't able to catch the names of every staff member who made my experience so wonderful, I have a few saved that I'd like to thank: 
- Christopher, Nirio, Joshua, and G. THANK YOU! Hope to see you all again soon. 

Cool vibe. Beautiful community spaces. Natural elements. Extremely clean, but doesn't give the over-sanitized vibe. Friendly, welcoming, and accommodating staff. Unique events (yoga/work out classes, matcha hour, meditations).

title: New Fav Hotel in NYC!
text:
As soon as we arrived on April 15 (3 nights) we felt a very cool vibe about the place. Great mix of natural elements throughout the building. On top of that the reception we received was very friendly and the staff knowledgeable. They were so kind to offer and provide an upgrade although I think all their rooms are probably great. Loved our room (1402)…corner room with lots of light. High quality linens and the bed was super comfortable. Great mix of function and sustainability. Great lighting system in room! 
Every staff member we ran across was always welcoming and asking how our stay was.
We can’t wait to go back. Perfect location just south of Central Park and close by great shopping, walking and restaurants.

title: Best stay ever
text:
We stayed for a weekend Friday - Sunday we booked the neighboring king and queen rooms . 
We mainly booked this hotel for the proximity to Central Park . It was my wedding weekend and we had our ceremony in Central Park .
 Ok let’s begin. My stay was wonderful from the moment we walked in to the hotel we were greeted by friendly faces and warm welcomes. 
The room was beautiful a little on the small side but what can you really expect in the heart of NYC. We had everything we needed it in the room from robes , sleepers and even a yoga mat. 
I had no issues at all when my makeup artist came in the hotel staff was super accommodating I had family members waiting in the lobby and they had no issues at all but the cherie on top was this specific moment as I was walking out the hotel in a wedding dress feeling a little overwhelmed and nervous. The wonderful staff line up at the front desks and clapped and cheered for me as I was leaving and wished me luck and it just made my heart so warm and happy . I wanted to hug them all. Special thanks to Andrew, Shane and Anderson you guys are wonderful people . I will recommend this hotel 100%

title: ALWAYS PERFECT - our happy NYC place!
text:
This is the absolutely the best hotel in NYC. We have stayed at the very top five star hotels in Manhattan - uptown and downtown - over the past 10 years. Nothing compares to 1 Hotel Central Park. The staff is incredibly kind and always welcoming. Thank you Michael B and Maryam! The location is wonderful and a short walk to Central Park. Lincoln Center, MOMA, wonderful shopping and amazing restaurants are all right there. The food in the restaurant is very healthy, delicious and the servers are fantastic. It is now our NYC home away from home! 

And during the two years of the height of the pandemic, my son stayed there on his visits to NYC. It was an impeccable experience for him always. That speaks volumes about the excellence of 1 Hotel!

title: Phenomenal!
text:
1 Hotel Central Park is the perfect place to stay in the city. The hotel is not only beautiful, but extremely clean and in a fantastic location. 

My sincere thanks to Janessa, Christopher & waitstaff for setting up a room block and meeting for my team. They went above and beyond to provide us with a fantastic experience. Extremely prompt in their responses as well. 

We will be back!! Thank you!!!

title: Fabulous Customer Service!
text:
We had the best experience at 1 Hotel Central Park. We felt welcome from the moment we walked in and were greeted by the nicest front door personnel. The genuinely happy and outgoing front desk staff were also a pleasure to deal with at check in. 1 Hotel is an oasis away from all the hustle and bustle of the city. I would highly recommend 1 Hotel to anyone wanting to be treated to a top tier hotel experience. I would also like to highlight Christopher at the front desk. He was very sincere and went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. On my next visit to NYC, I will certainly be returning to 1 Hotel. 
-Bronson Duran

title: The only hotel for the discerning traveler!
text: I have traveled to NYC many times through the years and 1Hotel Central Park is the only hotel I will stay in! This is my 6th time staying at this hotel! I choose it over and over again because it has the absolute best service and it serves as a much needed relaxing sanctuary after a full day of sightseeing or business meetings! The rooms are modern yet cozy and give you the feeling of complete tranquility in the city that never sleeps. It is in the heart of midtown and 1 block from the 57 street subway station, which is only 1 stop from Rockefeller Center, and 1 block from Central Park. The staff and concierge team have never failed to surpass my expectations or requests. I have stayed at many other hotels in Manhattan in various locations but this hotel is the BEST! 10/10 would recommend! Can’t wait to go back!

title: Nice hotel, great staff and somewhere between 3-4 stars.
text:
I get it  - NY is expensive but when I book 5 star I expect 5 star and this wasn’t it!

Some great features on the green side which is why I choose the hotel.   All of the hotel staff were fantastic throughout my trip. So I am flipping between 3-4 star but cannot rate it as such.

The room was small (standard in NY I understand)  and facing on to the back with noisy vent system. Would have happily paid a little more for something more scenic and less noisy.

 Double bed, comfortable well appointed room  with great toiletries, cool bathrobe,  extra decaf coffee was left as they noticed i used it. However I did leave at 12 one day and my room wasn’t cleaned that day.

Breakfast wasn’t included in price and very average, even more given the cost and  with not what I would call friendly service.   Therefore I only went the first day. every five star hotel needs an amazing breakfast place - for me this is one of the most important things about choosing a hotel.

title: Amzing Customer Service!
text: I can't rave enough about the customer service at the 1 Hotel Central Park! My partner and I were extremely satisfied. There was a fire at our apartment in the middle of the night and we were in desperate need of refuge.  We called countless competing hotels that couldn't accommodate our immediate needs.  However, Chester was extremely kind and sympathetic and moved mountains to get us a room at 5:00 a.m.  From there, he made it his priority to make sure we were comfortable.  When his shift ended, Michael B. moved in seamlessly to continue the top-notch service.  We realized we needed a little bit more space and Michael easily helped us move into a bigger room.  I'd highly recommend this hotel and can confidently say that you're in good hands with Chester and Michael B.

title: Great location and superior service
text: Very convenient location, 10 minutes walk from theater district and times square and right next to central park. Comfy rooms, not too big, not too small, bed and shower are great.  Very nice staff, specially Michael. B and Gy! Recommended!!

title: Every visit made an AMAZING experience and memory
text: I've started to visit NY frequently from Seattle since last October, and I only stay at the 1Hotel  -  its such a unique and luxurious environment, and just steps away from Central Park South. 1Hotel is known for its  eco-friendliness but is both lux and creative with their rooms.  But hands down the reason I stay there every visit is the service and caring staff.  I've come to know Richard, one of the concierges, and he handcrafts a different itinerary on every visit. Many times I've given him short notice to get a rez at the most popular restaurants, events, he delivers.  And the effort he makes to work with his other great concierge colleagues is seamless.   I can't say enough about Richard and the staff at 1Hotel Central Park. From the bellman, to the front desk to the restaurant to room service and housekeeping too, they'll all get to know you on the first visit and you'll want to come back for another memorable stay!

title: Amazing all around
text: This was my first time staying at the 1 hotel and it’s now my new go to place to stay anytime I’m here in New York. the streets were closed because of the marathon but shane went above and beyond to get us to our transportation thank you!! . Room service was great and the decor is amazing , will be back soon!

title: High end, amazing location, Service, and design.   Perfection.
text:
Location Location Location.  This hotel combines an amazing location. East access to all parts of the city from Central Park, 5th avenue shopping, Columbus circle and the upper west side and an in house car to take you to that special place. 

The rooms are gorgeous.   Have amazing build outs   The bathroom had a gorgeous marble and bronze theme mixed with a clean nature vibe.  

The service is top notch.  Thank you Andrew, GK, & Shane.   And our driver Enzo.  
A++.  Can’t wait to go back

title: Outstanding Service and Facilities
text: Superb hospitality from 1 Hotel Central Park staff particularly the concierges - Richard and Lorenzo - they went beyond the call of duty to ensure that my trip preferences were fulfilled. The hotel is beautifully appointed and very comfortable. Awesome location as well.

title: Rowan at their Jams Lounge/Restaurant is fantastic!
text:
Shouting out Rowan on the team for taking care of me. I come to Jams often for lunch/brunch and take a couple of work Zoom calls because it's quiet enough and their internet is great! 

I'm always greeted with a smile. I'm simple and low maintenance... black coffee, water, and something for lunch. Typically I'm someone easy to ignore because I put my headphones on and am working but Rowan and the other staff members will still make eye contact with me from a distance so I can signal them I'd like a refill of something or the check, etc etc. 

I know the above sounds insignifigant but I think it's that invisible attentiveness that makes me feel like Jams is a "home like" environment for me to come in and be productive but in a lounge environment.

Thanks Rowan for taking care of me and also for remembering me. It's really nice to be remembered in place in the city, that see so many different people daily.

Jams is also a spot that is SO comfortable to come into the afternoon, knock out that last bit of work, close the laptop, and shift effortlessly into a glass of wine at happy hour too.

I'll always be coming back because of the service, quality of the food/drink, and overall relaxed modern vibe of the design in there. 

Cheers!

title: Lot of pomp but little substance. Go elsewhere
text:
This hotel stay was in part to celebrate our wedding. The hotel did not pick up on it despite our message sent a week earlier. 

Check-in was bad- their Apple Pay machine did not work well. Check-in was late at close to 5pm; and no delivery of baggage to the room while we were out, despite what they had promised. When we got back, we were not informed at the reception when collecting our keys that our luggage was not yet in the room- we had to go back down and request for it.  Room had the smallest of closets with not much hanging space- we had to resort to hanging our clothes off the bars that were there for aesthetic purposes. Miserable excuse of a filmsy wooden sliding door for the bathroom that hardly did the job of providing aesthetics nor full functionality. 

Cherry on the cake- we got a miserable plate of 3 stale cookies put out cold on the table, with a scribbled note, as a wedding celebration 'gift'. Certainly screams 'luxury from a 5-star hotel' doesn't it? It felt insulting, akin to a real slap in the face. Even Holiday Inn could deliver a more sincere touch than this cheap gesture that sought to deliver at its lowest. 

There are plenty of hotels in this neighborhood that can provide a better level of service and attention to details. This is not one of them.

Breakfast menu was mediocre at best with only of handful of choices.

title: The perfect hotel. Perfectly located.
text: We had a wonderful stay at 1 Hotel Central Park thanks largely to Concierge, Richard  Branch. The hotel is lovely with a super location right off Central Park. Our room was a very comfortable junior suite. There are lots of really nice eco touches throughout. The restaurant was great every morning. The food was good and the staff efficient and friendly. We had a very tasty lunch and weekend brunch there as well. But Richard was the glue. He helped us with some terrific restaurant recs and reservations to work around shows we were seeing and arranged for the hotel's car to transport us several nights to our destination so we didn't have to deal with a car service or cabs. He is a warm, welcoming presence in the lobby and obviously works very hard to help people have a wonderful stay at 1 Hotel Central Park and a fantastic visit to the city. We highly recommend the hotel.

title: Tasteful and friendly home away from home near Central Park
text: After receiving recommendations from two colleagues about the 1Hotel, I booked a three night stay for my daughter and I last week. We both loved the plants which were displayed all throughout the hotel and our room. The mild but musky eucalyptus  smell in the lobby reminded me of the Marin Headlands, always a wonderful memory. Obviously, the location is wonderful at 6th and 58th, but the best part was really the employees. Specifically, Richard who booked us a couple of wonderful dinners, two of the doormen whose names I didn't get but they always cracked a joke with my daughter and handed us umbrellas when it was sleeting outside. Everyone was friendly and approachable which isn't always how I experience NYC and I appreciated it, especially with this being my daughter's first experience there. Thank you for a lovely stay. We'll be back!

title: An exceptional experience
text:
Our experience was flawless. Prior to our arrival Lorenzo helped plan a birthday surprise. He had great suggestions and flawlessly executed. We arrived 30 minutes earlier than expected and everything (balloons, cupcakes, champagne) was ready to go. 
When we arrived we were greeted by Karen (I think), she was extremely personable and also discretely confirmed the birthday without ruining the details of the surprise waiting for us- expertly handled. The room was clean and inviting, the surprises nicely set out, including champagne on ice with glasses ready. The accommodations were exactly as pictured online. I appreciated the small details like the suggestion to leave clothes to donate and drink the tap water. Every time we left or returned the doormen were all exceedingly friendly. Checkout was simple and quick. 
The ONLY negative I can say is that the toilet paper was practically unusable it was so thin. I am not sure if this is intentional to stick with the environmentally friendly initiatives, but it was an uncomfortable nuisance in our otherwise perfect stay.

title: Excellent / unbelievable hospitality
text:
My go to in midtown. I have really enjoyed staying here over the years. It’s close proximity to my appts, and meetings make this a great choice. Eco friendly environment. GK is the homie! Always looking out for me when I need help. Hats off to the 1 hotel Central Park crew!!!! See y’all soon 

- Josh , Charleston SC

title: Great hotel!
text:
First of all, the hotel reception was so nice especially Karen. She tried to give us a best service and we were so pleased to meet her here at 1 hotel. 
The room was so clean, and the city view was good.

title: MY STAY WAS TREMENDOUS!
text:
Everyone was very helpful. People always available to help. Rooms were cleaned in a timely manner. Checkout was a breeze. They even sent one of the drivers for the hotel to take us to Penn Station for our departure. 

Oh, don’t let me forget the food. Excellent. 

Very close to Times Square and 5th Avenue. Stores to die for.

title: Above & beyond
text:
I was here for a client in March—- GK walked me and my luggage 3 blocks in the freezing cold to find my Uber when multiple streets were closed off. 
He was kind & helpful! I’ve never seen that kind of extra help and I’ve stayed all over NYC! 10/10 would recommend staying here

title: Amazing service and restaurant
text: I come here all the time.  It is the best place in NYC for coffee meetings, work, or lunch.  Server Rowan is fantastic!  The whole staff here is excellent and the service is high quality.  The space is beautiful as well!

title: Great service and food
text: Emda was very kind, helpful, and quick. Great food and coffee. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to enjoy a coffee, lunch with family, or to simply sit alone and do work. Good vibes

title: Jam’s is perfect
text: Went to lunch at Jam’s and it was absolutely lovely. The decor was aesthetic af. Whoever designed it deserves all the praise. The food was phenomenal. Emda (spell check) was an amazing waiter. Overall great experience. Will come back!!!!!

title: Night of peace
text: An exquisite night,  food  was on point. Every bite was masterfully delightful .  Service by Rowan Was professional and his recommendations made ordering and the experience all the better. The atmosphere and ambiance was perfect for a quick bite and drink and quick book reading.

title: Server Rowan
text: Rowan was so kind and helpful.  I had a business meeting that went over, and he was so patient. He did not rush us off the table. I appreciate the stellar service. I love one hotel and this experience is another great one!

title: A wonderfully sustainable visit!!
text: This hotel is lovely!  The location is amazing, we had a beautiful room with a sofa bed window seat that overlooked Central Park.  You cannot beat that!  The rooms are very well appointed with beautiful furnishings and a very comfortable bed.  The brand uses sustainability in every effort that they make, so the guest rooms themselves hold some lovely sustainable touches.  For example, they have PATH water which are reusable, refillable branded water bottles, and the shower has the cutest little hourglass timer in it to help you realize when you may need to wrap it up!  The lobby is busy but clean and comfortable and the restaurant, Jams, is fabulous.  Service, start to finish, was exceptional!  The doormen were so charming and the front office staff was superb.  We loved every bit of our stay and will definitely be back!

title: Awesome Ambience!
text:
We stayed at the 1 Hotel Central Park last week, it’s one of the coolest spaces we ever seen. Their ambience is quite green and unique, they’ve incorporated sustainable practices and recycled art across the hotel, for example they have these awesome recycled wood swipe cards for the hotel rooms.

The location is fantastic and perfect walkable distance to Central Park and the shops at Fifth Avenue.

They have 24 hour front desk service, very attentive staff. Our room had a fully stocked mini bar, Nespresso machine, steamer and hair dryer which were all very important as we were in NYC that week for a private Dior event.

The design and quality of the rooms are quite impressive, they have managed to maintain a level of New York high-quality class while employing sustainable practices, which I thought was very good effort.

Definitely coming back here the next time we are in New York City!

title: Fabulous Brunch
text: We stopped in spontaneously for brunch at the hotel restaurant Jams, and really enjoyed our experience. I'm not one to write reviews... ever, really... but this was too good not to rate.  Service was attentive and friendly. The food was delicious and fresh.  Even our tween daughter enjoyed her meal (she had the brioche apple French toast) and a mixed berry smoothie.  I highly recommend the crab cake benedict.  We plan on staying here the next time we're in town (great location near the park) and look forward to dining here again as well.

title: Amazing Hotel & Staff
text:
This is the fourth time me and my family have stayed at The One Hotel and each time the service has been above and beyond. My first stay there I was moving to the city and the staff went out of their way to make me feel at home and special. Especially Richard Branch. He helped me to navigate the city, find the best neighborhoods and restaurants to explore until I found my home base.

Not only does the hotel make you feel like family, it’s in the best location. Right by Central Park and steps from the best shopping. They also have an amazing bar and restaurant which is perfect for a quick drink or impressive dinner. 

I highly recommend staying here if you’re looking for and iconic NY experience.

title: A perfect romantic getaway
text:
I just wanted to take the time out to say thank you for our amazing stay this past weekend.  The hotel is absolutely beautiful with all of the plants and greenery.  We were greeted so nicely by the front desk attendant and the person who helped us with valet parking was also very friendly.  

The romantic setup in our room was gorgeous and brought tears to my eyes.  My husband was also very impressed with how easy it was to arrange it.

title: Best Hotel Experience!!!
text: The esthetics of the hotel were very impressive, but the concierge service provided by Richard Branch wowed even the most toughest critic…my toddler daughter. Richard made sure to it we not only had the best dining experience in the in-house restaurant, but also had my daughter’s favorite cookie waiting in the room for dessert.

title: Tranquil Home Away from Home
text: 1Hotel Central Park has been our go to hotel since our first visit in 2018. Since then we have stayed over 7 times and each time the staff have been so kind and welcoming. The concierge service is superb and they were able to get us accommodations at the hottest dinner spots in NYC. After a busy day in the city, we looked forward to walking through the hotel doors and be greeted with the friendly staff and sultry cedar wood scents. The views of central park are amazing, close proximity to great shopping, restaurants, and entertainment. The rooms are extremely clean, the shower is great and room comes with free coffee! Highly recommend to anyone going to NYC!

title: Welcome Home! Superb Staff & Prime Location
text:
This is the best hotel in all of Manhattan! For years we have come to the city and have stayed at other 5 star properties but only 1 Hotel Central Park has ever exceeded our expectations and they do it every time we stay there! 

This hotel has everything and the location is prime!  There is a plethora of cafes, restaurants and shopping just steps outside the hotel,  even if you don't want to spend your entire time in midtown the subway is around the corner with a short ride to downtown. 

I love this hotel because they are consistent in their service standards; the rooms are clean and on trend never looking outdated, the linens are top quality and the room amenities are plentiful!  

But it is the staff that sets them apart from the other 5 star properties and they are what really make this property special. It's becoming rare now of days to find kind, happy people who enjoy their jobs, who actually stop for a moment to engage with their customers/guests. The staff at this hotel genuinely make you feel like they are welcoming you into their own personal home!

Everyone we came into contact with made us feel special and took a personal interest in how our stay was without being invasive or coming across robotic like they had to ask. I wish I could remember the names of everyone who we encountered, especially the doorman and bellman because they should know even their small gestures of anticipatory service impacted our experience in a big positive way.  

From our lovely housekeeper who offered to bring us up water after learning we ran out and then doubled up on the next night just to ensure we would not go without again, to the brilliant Richard at concierge who has now assisted us on two trips, he has a pulse on everything that is trending in the city and has without fail recommended the best places no matter what kind of experience or vibe we are looking for. His communication is efficient starting with pre arrival and follows through on requests and confirmations. I never worried I wasn't booked for a request I asked for. He is even willing to step outside his immediate role to assist us by going above and beyond when we were running late getting back to the airport and could not find a cab, Richard not only had the front drive staff on the corner trying to hail a cab but he went out himself almost down the entire block trying to help hail one! I feel like any other hotel would have just pointed to the front door and said good luck. I also can not forget to mention the wonderful Chester, the overnight front desk agent who without hesitation at 2 a.m. accommodated a later check out due to canceled flights we just learned about. His cheerfulness and willing spirit to help us that late and not pass along the request to the morning staff was the kind of reaction we needed under a stressful situation to make us feel at ease and that everything was going to be okay. 

I can not say enough about this property, sure you can spend the same amount per night at surrounding hotels but what is priceless at this hotel is the staff, I will never stay at another property  because we know our friends at 1 Hotel Central Park will always take care of their guests!

title: Amazing Experience
text:
It’s hard to find the right words to express how wonderful the hotel and its staff are. We have stayed here multiple times and each time we fall more in love with it. The location is amazing , located a few steps from Central Park. The ambience is very relaxing and the rooms are gorgeous. I have to say, the best part of the hotel is the staff. They always make you feel welcome and will accommodate any need.
The concierge, Richard Branch, is a true gem. I have stayed at many high end hotels, but never have had the experience that Richard Branch has provided, He’s made all of our stays more amazing than the next. From booking dinners, shows,  and massages. His suggestions are always the best and it’s seamless to book anything with him. I can’t rave enough about this hotel, the staff,  and most of all Richard Branch.

title: Best Staycation ever!
text: My experience at the 1 hotel in central park could not have been any better. Starting with the thoughtful and unique service that I received from concierge, Richard Branch to the beautifully designed rooms. The entire staff were all so friendly and the food at the restaurant was simply delicious! I highly recommend staying at this hotel, especially in the king room facing Central Park. I can’t wait to come back for another staycation at the 1 Hotel.

title: Perfectly clean and comfortable. Smells good!
text:
Perfectly clean and comfortable Room - Fitness Center designed for  a CrossFit athlete.. really nice!
‘G’ the Bellman was superb! Karen at the Desk was exceptional! We’re coming back and will be bring family

title: Beyond our expectations
text: My dear friend and I stayed here before Valentine’s Day as part of a getaway and from the moment we arrived to the moment we left we were treated very kindly. The staff bent over backwards to accommodate our needs and from the complimentary fresh fruit to the concierge’s knowledge of the city and everything in between this hotel made the stay in the city easy.  We are also neat freaks - this hotel was incredibly clean, the beds were comfortable, and there was a cool retro-environmental vibe.  Finally, the hotel restaurant was great too, a farm to table with a California theme.  A shout out to Anderson who was more concerned about the hotel and team getting kudos than himself.  These folks really want to make a go of it and the staff are “all in.”

title: Loved our stay
text: We loved Chris E. our doorman! Such a nice hotel! We will return eventually. The staff was so nice and so was the room service. Everyone was very friendly. The shower was our favorite and our view was beautiful.

title: Hands down best stay I’ve had since the pandemic
text: I recently stayed at the 1Hotel in Central Park for a friend’s birthday. I haven’t traveled much since the pandemic and I was happily pleased with the level of service and cleanliness here. The entire staff was so welcoming, attentive and friendly. They made my friend feel special for her birthday. The concierge made sure all of our reservations were made and they were able to get us into all the hot spots under short notice. The rooms were beyond clean and throughout the visit we could see the staff constantly cleaning. I was mainly impressed by the attention the staff provided. We entered into the hotel the doors were opened for us, our bags were already in a room as we walked up from checkin, the check in process was a breeze. I could tell the entire staff had a huge smile on their faces underneath their masks. I work in customer service so I have higher standards and the staff at the 1Hotel provided exceptional customer service. I can’t wait until I come back in May. This has become my go to home away from home in the city! Thank you 1Hotel for a unforgettable weekend!

title: quick overnight
text: the 1hotel never disappoints. This was our first time staying in the central park location. Everyone was amazing. Anderson, especially, was very welcoming and remembered me by name and by my car. Love the attention to detail. Thank you Anderson and 1hotel CP staff!

title: An Oasis in NYC!
text:
I stayed at the 1Hotel Central Park over the winter, and I had a such a great experience! All the staff were friendly and attentive, the hotel was clean and inviting, and the rooms are well appointed!

I also love how close it is to 5th Ave and the Park for an easy morning/evening stroll. 

This will be my first choice whenever I get the chance to visit my old stomping grounds.

title: This is New York City at its Finest...Home away from home!
text: We love 1Hotel Central Park.  We have been visiting NYC twice a year since 2015. We discovered this hotel and have never been tempted to stay anywhere else.  The location is ideal, the concierge staff keeps topping itself finding us great, unique and delicious restaurants, the front desk staff is spot on, accommodating and just plain nice and the bell staff is incredibly energetic and helpful.  The rooms are really comfortable, we love the window seat and view of the park and the accommodations are great. We feel so welcomed every time we return.

title: Great hotel in a great location in a great city!
text: Beautiful hotel. Our second stay in the past 3 months. Staff was welcoming and attentive. Rooms clean and cozy. Really love the location. Convenient to 5th avenue and Columbus circle. A short walk to the theatre district. And access to train stations a few steps away. This is the best hotel we have stayed at in Midtown Manhattan. By far.

title: A real find
text: This hotel is in a perfect location, with great service all the way around.  The rooms are well appointed and everything is in tip top shape.  The climate control works perfectly, which is a rare find anywhere, and even though the rooms may not be large, every detail is thought out so you have everything you need at your fingertips without tripping over furniture.  The location is fantastic.  I was there in the deep freeze last week, (I am a New Yorker, so I can attest that it was probably the coldest 2-3 days in my long lifetime) and I could find everything I needed within a 1.5 block radius.  Even friends and relatives.  I will definitely stay there again.  The hotel sent a car to pick me up at the airport, and I can tell you that it was well worth it. The food in the restaurant was better than good, with a little bit of a limited menu, but they are adding items, with specials of the day according to Covid and/or customer demand.  Minibar in the room (they emptied it out for me because I needed it) and a coffee/tea maker in the room.  Beautiful functional room decor.  As the tourists and business travelers return it is going to get very busy.  Hope to visit again in either the spring or fall.

title: Perfect in every way!
text: Perfect in every way. I have stayed at this hotel several times now, both on business and with my family. Not only is it appointed with high style finishes and wonderful natural elements, 1 Hotel Central Park is extremely comfortable (especially the beds and room temp). Equally as important is the level of service — the staff is beyond sophisticated, gracious and kind. They made every effort to ensure we had an excellent stay and offered great flexibility when our travel arrangements changed due to a storm. All this and in a perfect NYC location. This is our new NY go to for hotels!!

title: Very comfortable and relaxing hotel. Great location.
text:
This is our go-to hotel in NYC. 
Only criticism - the restaurant service has REALLY declined. Not sure if this is the hotel's fault - but they should consider licensing a different restaurant. 
Rooms are well appointed and relaxing. 
NOT all guests follow COVID protocols. But this may not be the fault of the hotel. But a bit of shock to Canadians. 
Otherwise, a great hotel. Not a fancy as the Miami location but perfect for NYC.

title: Nice stay
text: We stayed for a long weekend in December 2021. We really liked the location and found the staff helpful. We had two rooms and housekeeping did a wonderful job. The decor is a bit more unique and it doesn’t feel as sterile as a typical hotel. The restaurant was nice but it is definitely short staffed as are most places. I’m sure that will improve over time. All in all, we would definitely stay here again.

title: 5Star Service
text: I can’t say enough about the service, attention to detail, warmth, and accommodations. We were warmly greeted at the door by Christopher who checked us in. He was welcoming without being insincere and very helpful. We met Anderson as we got off the elevator to our room. He was such a joy, very genuine, and helpful as well. The aesthetics of the entire hotel is relaxing and comfortable. I was told that Robert maintains all the flora and it is amazing!!! This will be our go-to spot when we travel.

title: Excellent Experience
text: 1 Hotel Central Park's location is terrific. Environmentally conscious, great decor, fun, California vibe. Terrific service and welcoming. The room had everything you could possibly want and the (partial) park view was great. Highly recommend and will definitely be going back.

title: fantastic central park digs!
text:
Such an awesome hotel! The ethic, the decor/facilities, THE STAFF! We came to 1 Hotel refugees from a disastrous VRBO rental and totally stressed and from the minute we met Shane who helped us and our gear inside we felt welcomed and safe.  All the folks who manned the ever-busy front door were kind and helpful and so warm.  Truly the engaging face of the institution.  Thank you!!
Also the people who worked the front desk, also so kind and helpful, made it feel like home.  Circumstances made it necessary to stay 9 days...not so easy even in this beautiful, calm abode.  But the staff did everything to give us a comfortable place to hang our hats and get our agenda accomplished. This included housing our daughter in her own room at the last minute, and they were so caring and sweet to her.  Thank you!! Means the world to us.
And, to top off the experience, the concierge desk helped my husband pull off a surprise of flowers for my birthday, AND they donated a bottle of champagne on the house with a card!  Totally sweet!! THANK YOU!!
Sorry this is so long.  Cannot say enough about the location, the services, the people.  Amazing!

title: Hotel 1 New York central park
text:
The best hotel I ever stay, everything clean,
The The room was amazing excellent view, The restaurant delicious and the people who work in the hotel are very kind and very attentive they give you anything you need for you perfect start 
The only bad  thing  I can said that the roomservice  close to early

title: Excellent Hotel!!
text:
I'm Brazilian and stayed in the 1 Hotel for a week. It's was a awesome experience, considering that the hotel it's very well located near to the best points of NYC and has very good and new installations.
The concierge service it's outstanding. Colleen it's one of the concierge that achieve all the expectations of the customer, giving the best tips for restaurants and such, and being well succeed in the reservations in the places very disputed.

title: GREAT SUSTAINABLE OPTION TO STAY IN NYC
text: I’ve always been a fan of these hotels. Since you enter the lobby you can fall in love with the smell. Rooms are not the biggest, they’re super well design and comfortable. The location couldn’t be better, you are one street away from central park and the same of 5th avenue. Many restaurants, museums and shopping are walking distance.

title: AMAZING!
text: I can't say enough great things about this hotel. It's an experience! From the moment you walk in you can see, smell, and feel the luxury. The rooms are gorgeous. They're sexy and sophisticated for a romantic getaway. But also comfortable and spacious for families with children. The staff takes the cake. They're all amazing people. So kind and accommodating. And extremely helpful.

title: Trendy Hotel, Average Service
text:
Super trendy hotel, love all the plants and love their commitment to the environment. Great location in very close proximity to Central Park, lots of restaurants, easy accessibility to the subway. The gym has everything you could need.

Why I gave it a 4: For the price, the staff was not as attentive as you would expect - Don't expect to compare your experience to other 5-star hotels (no spa, pool, restaurant). Additionally - while super cool, the glass shower in the middle of the room, + exposed bathroom/toilet, in a room with two queen beds doesn't make for the most comfortable bathroom situation while staying with a group

title: Amazing stay!
text: I absolutely love this hotel! From the smell when you first walk into the door, to the help bellmen and staff, to the food, to the rooms. This hotel is one of my favorites I've ever been too. The location is amazing as well. When I return to NY this will be my top choice to stay!

title: Extra-ordinary.
text: First time staying at a 1 hotel… and I loved it.  For a NYC hotel its really a getaway and breath of fresh air, literally. The natural elements and decor really come together. The sustainability aspect is refreshing but doesn’t feel recycled.  The room was average size for NYC (small but cozy) the details inside the room make it feel spacious, glass, metals, wood.  We splurged a bit for the Central Park view, I’d say its more of peek a boo view than anything, (the only disappointment).  I’d recommend this hotel to anyone looking for something different and a relaxing ambiance.

title: This guy Christopher E
text: I was working with a bunch of gear in one of the hotel rooms at 1 Hotel Central park. Before and after the interview I needed to get in and out of an Uber and load the gear onto a hotel cart and put it in the room and yada yada. This guy Christopher E was incredibly helpful on both ends. He helped me carry the gear, get it in and out of the uber, he actually helped flag down my uber. He was so nice and so helpful that I needed to write this review to properly show my gratitude. Also I thought the hotel smelled very good.

title: Thanksgiving stay
text: Amazing service from everyone on staff and amazing experience overall. Great vibes,  very clean and service at your fingertips - literally, you can text them for anything you may need and they are extremely responsive.

title: Everything we Hoped and More!
text:
My husband, son and I stayed in this hotel for one night over Memorial Day weekend 2021. We are former New Yorkers, and wanted to stay as close to our old neighborhood as possible. We’ve always wanted to stay in this hotel too, so we were excited when it all worked out. 

When we arrived, we were greeted by a wonderful staff member who was super helpful. Check-in was quick and painless. When we got up to our room, we realized we weren’t in the room category we had paid for. A quick call to front desk and someone was already upstairs to help us move. 

The room was a decent size for New York, and it fit the three of us well. We loved the aesthetics of the room, and found the bed to be very comfortable. We also really appreciated the cleanliness of the room too. 

Early the next morning, we took a 5 minute walk to Central Park, for a morning stroll. We loved being so close to the park, and really loved the location of the hotel. 

We can’t wait to come back to this hotel. It felt like a hidden gem, full of luxury and ambiance that we haven’t found in anywhere else.

title: It's official - I'm obsessed!
text:
I live in NYC, but needed to book a hotel for my mother's one night stay. She hadn't been anywhere since Covid, so I wanted to make her visit special. After scouring  various hotel websites, I finally picked 1 Hotel -- and I must say that it lived up to my expectations and then some!! 

As others have remarked, 1 Hotel exudes a perfect, chill vibe without attitude -- and that combo is rare, especially in NY. 

Staff: Totally remarkable. EVERY single person we interacted with went out of their way to be helpful, gracious and kind. From the first instance of booking with Leona to checking in (and out) with Floresca at the front desk, 1 Hotel employees (including restaurant peeps) were caring and personable, EVEN when busy dealing with multiple requests from different guests.

Food at JAMS: YUM!! Everything was on point....I'm still thinking about the egg sandwich with fried potatoes and also the apple fritter.

Lobby: So welcoming with all the plants, relaxing but not annoying music, PERFECT lighting, and little nature displays everywhere. I seriously wanted to sink into that couch and never leave.

The room: Loved the reclaimed wooden ceiling, window seat/alcove and bunker like feel. 

The mattress and bedding: Amazing, I want to buy for my apartment.

OVERALL: A PERFECT stay  in the best location at a reasonable price, especially when you consider some of the higher priced NYC  hotels, and how impersonal they can feel.

There's clearly a huge market for the eco-conscious thing, but this hotel is different in that it feels authentic...which, again, ultimately comes down to the staff...for example, a few years ago, I was at a similar, much smaller place like this in Tulum, and it was terrible in comparison. (Proof that a "larger" and expanding brand can still feel home-y and intimate.)

To summarize: in the morning my mom told me she had woken up in the middle of the night and thought..."I'm in love....with a hotel:)

Thanks again, 1 Hotel - can't wait to come back for a staycation in my own city, and to visit 1 Hotels in Brooklyn, Miami, and elsewhere!!

title: Outstanding service!
text: Highly recommend staying here! Lorenzo and all the other staff I dealt with were helpful, kind and incredibly accommodating from start to finish! I wanted to send a bottle to my newly married friends and it could not have been easier.

title: Exemplary Service for my Daughters 13th Birthday!
text: I was blown away by the staff and team at 1 Hotel Central Park. From the moment I placed my reservation, we had 5-star service. The concierge personally contacted me asking what they could do to make my stay better. When I told them it was my daughter's 13th birthday present, they got balloons, treats in the room, and even an upgrade! We live in Brooklyn but decided to have a special night away in Manhattan and it was a night we will never forget!

title: 1 Hotel is Hotel #1 Near Central Park
text: Decided to try 1 Hotel just south of Central Park and was very pleasantly surprised. Super location, convenient walk to Columbus Circle and subways. More importantly, boutique feel but pretty full service (considering Covid constraints). Staff responsiveness is A+. The environmental-friendly attention to detail is a big winner! Have now had two stays, my new default go-to in Manhattan.

title: Couples
text: Had the opportunity to stay here over the weekend and hotel was amazing. But an amazing hotel is nothing with out the staff. They definitely made the stay and hotel above a 5 star rating. Keep up the great work and look forward to our next visit. Located across from central park Recommended.

title: Great location but where’s the closet?
text: Best part of this hotel is the location, water pressure, and the staff, especially MICHAEL B who greeted us every day with a smile and gave us excellent restaurant suggestions! He is the shining star of the 1 hotel!  This hotel is very clean and prides itself on its eco-friendly amenities which I appreciate, but the biggest complaint I have is the room we stayed in. We chose a Central Park king room on a high floor. Great view of Central Park, but the room lacked in necessities for a room of its size and honestly for what we paid. We have stayed all over the city, from the Carlyle to The Dream hotel. I expect a full length closet and drawers. This room had what I called a “murphy closet” which could hold about 4 men’s dress shirts and 2 drawers which was hardly enough to unpack 2 suitcases of stuff. I had no place to hang my dresses, no place to put my shoes snd boots, one hook next to the toilet in the bathroom. I would expect a room like this in Europe but not in NYC. We may not be the demographic to attract for the 1. We like luxury in the city, turn down service, I don’t want a yoga matt or feel like I’m in a dorm room trying to find space for my stuff. I’m sure we could have paid for a larger room but would never think to ask if the room had a closet or double sinks? As much as we loved the location and the staff, we like to unpack our stuff in a room that allows us to have space. I like bright lighting in a bathroom and hooks to hang things. This is just our preference when we travel to the city. If you are a light packer and live out if your suitcase then the 1 is for you!

title: Hotel Stay
text: Great customer service from check in to check out. The king room with city view was modern, spacious and clean! Great location~ far enough from the noise and busyness~ but within walking distance to many  things we wanted to experience. I love  the fact they are environmentally conscious. I would definitely stay again! Thanks for making our visit to NYC so memorable!!!

title: Respect for the Enviornment
text: We spent a long weekend with our teens at this hotel with a connecting room.  Location is amazing across from Central Park, 24 Apple Store great for the teens, 5th Avenue shopping and restaurants.  The decor is truly impressive with plants seeming to ooze out of the hotel.  The decor is maintained in the guest rooms with little surprises of plants in the bathrooms etc. We all loved the lounging area by the window. This place is an oasis in the middle of NYC and truly can appreciated by those that love nature. It is a boutique hotel so the lobby is small but decor is beautiful and inviting.  I give this a 4 out of 5 stars because the service is not on par with a 5 star hotel it is just average at best. Checkin was a bit rough, nothing really explained, no mention of what is included in the destination fee, no explanation of the restaurant, breakfast etc. Major delay in getting our bags to our room.  With all this being said it’s easy to overlook because your staying in the best city in the world and the uniqueness of the hotel makes up for in lack of service. Was surprised by Quality Italian restaurant around the corner food and service was excellent.

title: Love my stay
text:
Out of so many hotels we searched, finally narrow down to this eco-friendly LEED hotel. 
The first time having this feeling of a hotel that I really want to return and recommend to alll of my friends who traveling NYC! Courteous, friendly, attentive, super cozy and clean rooms. It was a fabulous stay (park king and studio king).

title: A creative haven
text: This hotel provides a creative haven that embraces you. Here, in one of the largest cities in the world, you are given a role in respecting the environment. The warm of wood and branches in the decor provide a comforting aspect in a city of concrete and steel. The staff is exceptionally warm and helpful. It is definitely the one where you wish to return.

title: So glad we chose this hotel!
text:
This hotel is very centrally located.
It’s steps from Central Park, 5th Ave, Rockefeller Center, etc.
For those that take the subway, there are several stations nearby.

The hotel is very clean and has this special scent when you walk in. The decor is earthy and has a very relaxed vibe.

The room was a great size and the decor was earthy modern.

The staff is very welcoming and pride themselves on true service.

I cannot say enough about this hotel !!!

title: GREAT hotel
text:
We are a family of five who stayed two adjoining rooms at this hotel for a short summer break in New York.
The hotel is obviously well-located for Central Park, mid-town and the rest of the city. The general eco-vibe of this hotel is very fun, the staff were super-helpful and we loved the free apples!
On the negative side, the cleaning staff operate slightly odd hours (one of our rooms was not ready on our arrival day well after 3pm) and the breakfast options are very limited (we went to Sip & Co opposite the hotel door, which was far superior).

title: Friendly Staff but Awful Hotel Operations
text: I'm from NYC, and always stay at another property near Central Park when I go "home" to visit.  Based on the positive reviews we read here on Trip Advisor, we decided to take a chance and book the 1 Hotel Central Park for the first time.  We regret our decision and cannot recommend this property.  Before I begin, I need to call out the staff- who were, without exception, professional and polite.  However, they are fighting a losing battle and seem to be overwhelmed (if the hotel isn't staffed properly- which is common during this difficult times- they should book fewer rooms).  After a very smooth check-in process, we proceeded up to our room- which smelled like a gym locker room.  The front desk couldn't have been more apologetic and quickly switched us to another room (and re-routed our baggage).  All good so far.  However, problems persisted.  Due to our personal health concerns, we asked the front desk to instruct Housekeeping to just drop off towels each day- and not clean the room.  Instead, they did a full cleaning of the room and touched everything.  Next, our themostat  didn't work.  The only way to adjust the temperature was to call the front desk and have maintenance do so remotely.  This required multiple calls each day since we like the temperature cooler at night than during the day.  The temperature was never quite right- and the whole thing was ridiculous.  We tried to call room service, but no one picked up.  We called again 10 minutes later; again, no one picked up.  We tried to call DoorDash/UberEats for delivery, but the internet was so weak in the room that we couldn't get a signal for any website throughout our stay.  So I put on my shoes and went down to the hotel's restaurant to ask if I could order food I could take back to the room.  The greeter couldn't have been nicer and said I didn't have to come down, but I could just call down my order.  When I mentioned that no one was answering the phone (the restaurant was only 1/3 full), he was clearly embarrassed, quickly took our order and actually came upstairs to help deliver the food and apologize again for the inconvenience.  When we finished eating at 8pm, I called the front desk to ask for the tray (which we left outside the door) be picked up.  While the front desk promised to take care of it, the tray was still outside when we left for breakfast at 8am the next morning.  I was able to speak with Manager Ani- who listened intently to my concerns and said she would follow-up.  We didn't ask for anything to be taken off our bill- and she didn't offer.  While we had booked for 3 nights, we checked out after only 2.  It just wasn't worth the hassle- and we won't be returning.

title: Excelente ubicación y calidad de las instalaciones
text: Hotel boutique. La ubicación es inmejorable justo en el acceso a Central Park. Una super vista desde la habitación. Camas super cómodas. Todo de diseño sustentable y de excelente gusto por dentro y por fuera. El olor del lobby es espectacular.  Ló único único que no me encantó es que las habitaciones son muy pequeñas y no cuentan con suficientes cajones para ropa. En el baño practicamente no hay espacio para poner tus artículos personales. Buen concierge y servicio. Precio algo alto pero acorde a los estándares para un hotel de este tipo y por lo que ofrece. No recomiendo el desayuno en el restaurante del hotel, muy escasas opciones calientes. Vale la pena conocer también el 1 Hotel de Brooklyn, es espacioso y tiene un diseño impresionante.

title: Amazing staff and beautiful accommodations!!
text:
From the moment I checked in, the service at 1 Hotel was amazing. The staff (Michael B., Lorenzo, and Lex) all went above and beyond to make sure check was smooth and my room met my expectations. They made a hectic morning easier and were so patient with questions and details. 

The room is stunning and extremely comfortable with beautiful touches. 

Even during check out, the staff when above and beyond to help. Gilberto is sincerely the best. He personally found and delivered my lost headphones to me just in time for a last minute meeting!! 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

So grateful for their kindness and wonderful service! They made a special event even more memorable! ♥️🤗

title: Chic hotel next to Central Park
text: Great design; Modern clean rooms with mini fridge (hard to find these days), fun "plant" vibe, very polite staff, concierge recommendations were hit or miss but they were very well intentioned. Loved the nook next to the window in our room. Service at the restaurant wasn't great but the little food we had was tasty. Liked the location of the hotel as we didn't want to stay in Times Square for safety reasons and Central Park being a block away meant we spent a good deal of time there which was awesome and good respite form the heat. You can also walk to MOMA from the hotel. Not the most family-friendly vibe, but great for couples, singles or families with older kids.

title: Well oiled machine!
text:
Pristine room, eco friendly and luxurious toiletries. Accommodating, welcoming staff anticipated my wishes. Nature inspired decor that was light, modern and comforting.
Coordination of my reservation, a last minute change to my reservation, check in and check out were seamless. Cafe and bar also stellar. Everyone seemed happy to be working there and eager to facilitate. To coin a phrase, "I'll be back!"

title: great experience
text: We were very happy with our stay.  The first room we had had a very high toilet (I think that's true for all rooms ending in 16), but the hotel promptly found us another room that was equally beautiful with a lower toilet.  I loved the decor, the smell, and the toiletries.  I will definitely stay here again.

title: Amazing upscale and hip hotel
text: We instantly fell in love with this hotel.  It was exactly as seen in the pictures.  We had the pleasure of staying for several weeks and started in a Jr Suite with an interior view.  This served our purpose, as we weren't there much and weren't sure we needed the view.  For the second week we upgraded to a Suite w/View.  Wish we had done that earlier.  It was worth waking up to the amazing picture window/bench seat framing Central Park and the extra dining area helped when we just couldn't eat out one more time.  Both rooms were nicely decorated, comfortable and the addition of the greenery was certainly a plus.  The hotel is central to everything and provides a very relaxing, but upscale feel. The staff were over the top amazing, attentive and detailed!  I have had the pleasure of staying as some amazing 5-star hotels around the world and I must say that the staff at this particular location from Christopher (front) to Lorenzo & Richard (concierge), among many others, were on it without fail.  Not a day went by that we weren't met by a warm (and authentic) greeting from EVERY level of staff member.  Service with a smile!  Even my teen son noted how on-the-ball everyone was.  Can't recommend enough! We will be back.

title: Unique NYC Hotel - Great Experience
text: LOVED this hotel! It is unique and full of charm. We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite and it was very spacious and comfortable. The hotel is kept very clean. Checkin and out was seamless. Staff was very helpful with any requests and went as far as renting a wheelchair or us for my daughter (she had a torn meniscus) so we could explore the city a little easier. Great location with views of Central Park. Definitely one of our favorites in Manhattan.

title: Ms. N
text: It was my second visit to 1 hotel Central Park and this time I was particularly impressed by the service provided. The most outstanding concierges I’ve ever met - Lorenzo and Richard and additional thanks to the most patient and devoted receiving agent Heidi. This is the kind of 5* luxury service you pay for, they set a standard that other hotels should look up to and try to reach.

title: Wonderful visit
text: Reserved a park view room for a short visit to NYC with wife. Service was exemplary, room was great and amenities were wonderful. Very quiet, no street or other noises.  Room was a nice size with full amenities  including work desk all well designed.

title: Sanctuary in the City
text: oh my gosh! If you haven't had the opportunity to stay at 1 Central Park, make it a must on your list. From the moment you walk in, it feels like an organic sanctuary. Live plants and organic fabrics and wood accents everywhere. It smells delicious in this lobby! Staff was outstanding and very attentive. Details were very apparent here. We absolutely loved how close to Central Park we were, location is excellent! Thanks for a great stay in the City!

title: Excellent Stay
text: What a great location! Came here for a just a couple nights but hoping we can stay here again for a longer period of time on our next trip to NYC. Everyone was very friendly, especially Gilberto. He helped us on check in and check out and during our stay. Was very attentive and helpful. It was an overall great experience. We hope to be back soon!

title: LOVE IT
text:
This hotel was the perfect NYC home for my 8 days in the city. It was the calm at the end of the say running through the high energy city.  The place is beautiful, the beds are comfortable and the staff members are beyond friendly and helpful. 

Bonus points for it being so close to Central Park. And the Jams restaurant is a great breakfast spot to start your day. 

I absolutely recommend this hotel and I look forward to visiting again.

title: Central Park and a room with a view…
text:
The hotel had every detail accounted for.  The location is perfect, close to everything.  The amenities were all available but too much to do in the city to stay inside.  The food at the restaurant was very good and the service was courteous and fast.

If you can’t find it here, you need to evaluate whether you really need it.

title: 1 hotel experience
text: The best hotel in NYC ! Professional stuff and cozy place that make my  stay soooo amazing and memorable! Was also complementary bottle of Rose !Thank you again for everything ! Wonderful place, great location!

title: Details, Details, Details... Bravo!
text:
I truly enjoyed this property.  In a time where service is struggling due to the lack of a strong labor pool and varying COVID protocols this property hit it out of the park.  I’ve traveled a lot pre and post COVID where unfortunately post COVID has always been worse when it comes to amenities and overall customer service. 
 
However this property was not the post COVID norm.  Every employee at this property was happy, courteous, attentive and welcoming.  From the front desk personnel to the door guys… It was a breath of fresh air!  The rooms were great and I enjoyed all the little details like the Bluetooth speaker I could move around the room and the extra water pressure from the shower.  The cleaning staff did an impeccable job straightening up my room every afternoon too.  

I will definitely be coming back and I truly appreciate the extra effort this hotel has put into their property.  The staff training and attention to detail has really paid off and it didn’t go unnoticed by me.

title: Amazing Stay!
text:
I'd like to start off my review buy saying we travel to the city often. Each time we come we stay in a different hotel, in different areas. We always pick a boutique style hotel instead of giant brands like Hyatt or Hilton. I like the personalization of smaller hotels such as this one.
