Every evening after either a long day in the freezing cold office or a day in the sweltering heat, coming back to my room was absolute bliss. The natural interior (stone, wood, plants) was so calming and relaxing, I truly enjoyed spending my evenings here. 
My room (as well as the bathroom) were quite spacious, very clean and quiet. In terms of amenities, the bed was super comfy, the shower had great water pressure and there was plenty shampoo, shower gel and moisturiser (unlike the mini portions you get in some other hotels).
I ordered room service a couple of nights which was very good and the staff were extremely friendly. In addition, I was able to connect my Netflix to the TV as well which made me even happier.

There was an incident on one of the nights when the hotel seemed to be struggling with their fire alarm as it went off every 30-ish minutes which was the only negative I can report and pretty annoying at 3am in the morning.

Aside from that I would always stay here again. Such a beautiful hotel!

title: Amazing New York
text: I loved this hotel...its design, ethos and people. It is like being at home. you can tell from the minute you get there that they care about you and the community...plants, green design, fresh fruit and a team that seems to make even difficult requests easy...stay here if you can!

title: An extraordinary hotel experience
text: Located just a block from the famed Central Park in New York City this hotel takes it to a whole new level of visitor experience.  The décor is comprised of reused and recycled materials with a tremendous I to detail and comfort period from the moment you set foot in the lobby and smell the delicious fragrance And the warm and inviting décor you know that this is gonna be an amazing experience. The food is all locally sourced and very well prepared. I found the Room comfortable though small which I guess is typical of New York City hotels. The service was just right, there when you need them but not hovering or obsequious.

title: Another Incredible Stay at 1 Hotel Central Park!
text: Just finished another phenomenal stay at 1 Hotel Central Park!  This was my 4th stay at this magnificent property, and each time it just keeps getting better.  I won't stay anywhere else in NYC.  The location is perfect for exploring Central Park, as you are a 1/2 block away.  The location is also great as it is so central, allowing you to explore a lot of the city in just one weekend.  The staff at 1 Hotel Central Park is just as wonderful and special as the property, itself; I've never encountered a more friendly or helpful staff at any hotel.  The property is gorgeous; like a green oasis in the middle of the busy city.  Love the eco-friendly touches, the comfortable bedding & linens, and the thoughtful amenities in each of the rooms.  This was another great stay, with many more to come.

title: Superb hotel in great location
text: My wife and I stayed at the 1 Hotel Central Park for 9 nights as part of her birthday celebrations. The staff were all excellent from the moment we checked in to the moment we left. We both enjoyed the great room, excellent bar and great restaurant on offer and the informative and knowledgable staff across the whole hotel. The hotel is ideally located for Central Park and 5th Avenue shopping as well as Columbus Circle and Metro lines. We would both highly recommend the hotel to anyone visiting New York for both pleasure and business and you can rest assured that you will be superbly looked after by all of the staff.

title: Another great experience
text: We spent 7 nights in two bedrooms (a junior suite and a king room). We’ve been there a few times already and we really appreciate everything in this hotel. The AC was not working very well and we talked with Joshua who immediately found a solution to accomodate us.

title: Great location for a quick trip!
text: My wife and I stayed two nights while in the city visiting family and attending the US Open.  We really enjoyed our stay at 1 Hotel Central Park.  While cozy, our room had a nice view of the park, great bed and cool features like a window nook, and open bath. As a very “green” hotel, the materials/decor were reclaimed/recycled, and had nice technology. The staff was very attentive, and we were able to text special requests.  We’ll definitely be back!  Thanks.

title: A very Zen Hotel experience
text:
A great hotel with a very warm organic feel very close to Central Park 

A very nice restaurant by Johnathan Waxman and terrific staff that have mainly come from some of the best hotels around. 

The feel is relaxed. Many of the rooms have window banquets from which you can see Central Park. 

And if you are lucky, the hotel will whisk you on short trips in a nice Tesla.

title: Delightful
text: I booked a queeen alcove room this past weekend in order to stay in NYC to help my daughter move into her dorm room since we live out of state.  Per my request, we were placed in the perfect location - quiet room, quiet location on our floor. The staff at the hotel was incredibly welcoming, nonpretentious, extremely professional, and positive.  Every staff member employed wonderful eye contact and smiled (yes, smiled!) when interacting with me.  Sadly, in this busy world, true connection is cast aside.  This was not the case at 1 HCP.  Our room was immaculate, the shower phenomenol, and the halls and elevators were spotless. We love the restaurant Jams downstairs, but ordered breakfast each morning.  It arrived hot, fresh (great coffee), and was delicious.  Thank you for the welcomed and unexpected surprise from the "1 Team" we received in our room commmerorating the personal celebrations we had shared with the staff - such a lovely touch that made both my daughter and me smile.  Thank you, also, to Luis, Tracy, and Michael for the extra ice I needed to help heal an injury I am still nursing post bicyle accident.  Keep up the great work and don't change a thing!  You all are wonderful!

title: Incredible service
text: Even though we had several glitches with our itinerary the concierge and management were swift in reparations and extremely generous.  What a welcome oasis in the middle of the this crazy concrete jungle!  We absolutely unequivocally will stay here again and recommend to all.

title: Perfect Ambience and service
text: The rooms are clean, the service perfect, and the bed we slept on very comfortable. The manager on duty,Maryam,welcomed  us upon check in and ensured our stay was perfect. Chris M. also provided great service on the phone. We will return anytime we are in the city.

title: 1hotel always does it right
text: 1Hotel is my favorite midtown stay. it the combo of cool & hip lobby, that EVERY one there is so nice (like really nice), that the rooms are organic and comfy.. the beds are great, the linens great, the bath products great. Then there is Jams the lobby restaurant with great food and the worlds best roast chicken.

title: Best Hotel in NYC!
text: Our family stayed here over the recent Labor Day weekend and we had a wonderful time! The service was fantastic and the hotel is beautifully maintained! We plan on staying here for our annual NYC trips!

title: Wohlfühloase!
text: Schöne große Zimmer ( selten in NY) , geschmackvoll eingerichtet .Wenn man nach der Hektik der Stadt das Hotel betritt, fühlt man nur noch Ruhe und Entspannung. Tolles Konzept, junges Team , super Service. Eines der schönsten Hotels in dem ich je übernachtet habe!

title: Cathy
text: I can’t say enough good things about 1Hotel Central Park! From the moment we arrived, everything was perfect. The hotel has an organic, green vibe. Rooms are clean, soundproof and relaxing. Lots of room for storage. Concierge and staff were professional, welcoming and upbeat. A special thank you to Kevin who was the first staff person we met upon our arrival. He was so helpful and cheerful and really sets the tone for the hotel!❤️❤️❤️

title: COCOONING ET PROFESSIONNALISME
text:
Une des très bonnes adresses de Manhattan dans cette catégorie.

Déco très sympa, on se sent bien tout de suite. Un peu "protégés", "entourés". Une sorte de havre de paix qui contraste avec l'agitation de la ville. J'avais, je pense, une City King Room, et s'asseoir le matin sur les coussins installés devant la fenêtre pour voir le réveil de la ville (qui dort quand même un peu !) est un ravissement. 

Les chambres ne sont pas immenses mais de bonne taille pour Manhattan, et l'équipement est intelligent. Ce qui fait qu'on ne se sent pas à l'étroit. Super salle d'eau, très agréable, bien sûr literie au top et emplacement génial.

Derrière ce côté "cocooning", le personnel est très, très pro. Je vais généralement à NYC pour mon boulot, et avec le 1 Hotel Central Park, le taxi est là au bon moment, il y a toujours quelqu'un de disponible pour donner un conseil, l'adresse d'un restaurant, suggérer une sortie. Vous rendre le séjour agréable de façon générale, et performant quand on bosse.

Carte de petit déjeuner très variée, avec plein de produits frais ou cuisinés à la demande. Service rapide et efficace. La salle de restaurant est un peu bruyante, mais elles le sont toutes à NYC.

Je retourne à NYC début novembre, et je retourne (évidemment) au 1Hotel Central Park.

title: Long weekend
text: US Open long weekend from Florida. Hotel is lovely. We unfortunately did not get room requested but   Concierge  made up for it.  Would recommend. Also restaurant is excellent.   I would suggest bottled water in the rooms. As we had to go find water at the local store.

title: Nice Hotel in the middle of Manhattan.
text: This Hotel is strategically located in the middle of Manhattan, which is very convenient for the visitors to walk around. Columbus circle and 5th ave are walking distance, and 57th train station is just a few step away from the Hotel. The room is also nice and well appointed. The only drawback is the wrong combination of goose neck tap design with a shallow sink in the bathroom, which is very difficult for washing hands.

title: Best Concierge EVER!!
text: Spencer Howard and the team at the One Hotel killed it at our stay at One Hotel in NYC. Spencer was very sincere in his recommendations and went up and beyond for us and even booked my hair appointment at his personal favorite salon! Not only did I feel welcome, I enjoyed NYC like a local! Thanks for everything Spencer Howard and The One team!

title: Eccezionale!
text: Alla fine del nostro tour negli stati uniti siamo stati 5 notti in questo hotel stupendo! Ambiente moderno ,ecofriendly tutto ma curato, camere e bagni nuovi, ristorante al pian terreno ottimo . Vista dalla camera su central park dunque posizione stupenda!! Pulizia perfetta!!! Sicuro torneremo !!!!

title: Very Customer Focused
text:
Modern room, well maintained, very clean. A plus for NYC, very quite. Great location for walking to Central Park and/or Broadway theaters. Also easy access to subway system. Outstanding benefit an available free of cost car service with a driver.   
My negative is the "resort fee". They like so many NYC hotels charge a daily "resort fee" for internet access and gym. Seriously, it's not a fee that the customer can opt out of so just up the nightly room rate. There are active law suites against Hilton & Marriott corporation in certain states against this practice because it's clearly a deception when compare rates. Eventually the practice will be eliminated by the courts so just stop it now. I'd still stay at 1 Hotel Central if the $25 resort fee was rolled into the daily rate.

title: Lovely hotel
text:
It’s my 1st time staying in this hotel , it was very good experience also with friendly staffs, the room is comfortable and well organized,  the 1st floor restaurant is also a great place to meet up with friends. 
I will definitely come back.

title: Wonderful service, unique setting, great location
text: Loved the sustainable, green-oriented theme of the hotel, just a block from Central Park. Concierge service was exceptional and able to quickly book excellent restaurants that we could never have found on our own. Close to subway and walking distance from world class shopping. Excellent hotel!

title: great stay in NYC
text: Great stay in NYC. Modern hotel very close to Central Park. Warm welcome. Quiet rooms . I really liked the bathroom . Bed : excellent . View : good. Temperature : very good you can " for real " adjust the temperature :-)

title: Best hotel EVER!!!
text: Loved everything about this hotel and our stay. Rooms were very clean and modern, and the staff went above and beyond. They have a wonderful mission statement and implement nature and recycled materials into their designs. The restaurant downstairs (Jams) was phenomenal! Will definitely be back! 11/10 would recommend :)

title: Excellent and Beautiful
text:
Very good staff
Very green hotel
Just go there if you are looking for a hotel that take car for the planet earth and also you can have a beautiful vacations.

Very good location and the best is the food wonderful

title: Fantastic location!
text:
Having never stayed here in Midtown  (usually SOHO or Greenwich) we were excited to be so close to  the Park. 
I had sent a couple of messages via their cumbersome website but received no response. 
When I raised this with the concierge he was polite but didn’t seem to follow up why. 
The room we booked was small, very small but being outside so much it wasn’t a problem. 
Proximity to the park is amazing! Literally 1 street away. 
A really touristy area but the restaurant downstairs (Jams) was excellent to eat. 
The hotel is quite lovely in every way. Our view was a brick wall but on the plus side-there was no street noise. 
I would recommend this hotel, it was a lovely stay.

title: Unique Hotel for NYC
text: Really great hotel in the heart of Manhattan.  Very “earthy” decor and a great restaurant and bar!  Staff was excellent!  Always friendly and helpful in any questions or concerns.  Very clean and a great “musk” smell in the lobby.  Would definitely record for work or couples.

title: Conferma
text:
Avevo già soggiornato nella stessa catena a Miami ed ero rimasta incantata, innamorata, entusiasta dell esperienza ed ho voluto ripetermi a New York. Una conferma...posizione strategica, di fronte a Central park è vicino alle principali attrazioni, facilmente raggiungibile con ogni mezzo. L albergo è sempre curatissimo nei minimi dettagli, attento alle necessità dei suoi ospiti, con camere ed arredi spettacolari. Il
Personale, al pari di Miami, giovane e cordiale, sempre allegro e disponibile. Cibo top x L annesso ristorante, tappa anche per i locali...nessun dubbio 1hotel for ever

title: Great place the moment to get to the door
text: This is my second time staying here and we were not disappointed the second time. Every time I walk into the lobby the wonderful smell is the start of a calm and wonderful experience (especially nice after the NYC streets). Loved the prompt service in person or by text!  Top notch!

title: La habitacion es muy pequena y no hay lugar para guardar ropa,el bano es muy pequeno e incomodo tambien a pesar de haber
text:
a pesar de haber contratado una habitacion que no era la standard,no habia  lugar para guardar ropa ,el bano tambien es muy chico !
En el desayuno me cobraron usd 27,00 por dos tostadas y un cafe 
El restaurant del Hotel es caro y no se come bien 
El personal de todo el Hotel es excelente ,tanto del lugar donde se desayuna como en el front desk

title: Almost a 5 star hotel...
text:
Great location for 20 somethings in the middle of uptown on 57th and 6th. Very hectic environment inside and outside. Not very comfortable; the jr. suite was small, constant noise from backyard fan (was on the 10th floor but still terrible noise) bed and bath was comfortable.

Cool and chiqe Hotel, but cool and comfortable doesent always go hand in hand. Extremely overprised (25 USD for an avocado on toast) 

In General, nice on the eye,..but lacks the 5 star feeling complet. not at all suited for families; will not go back. At this price i would go upper East side and walk the 10 minutes to 5th avenue and shopping. I had the feeling i was staying in a disco without the music, or in a cool ad. agency office, but i never experienced the 5 star-/ exclusivety feeling, and I have stayed at many over the years.

title: #1 Hotel in NYC
text:
It was our first time staying there. Having been to NYC many times, we've always had our favourite hotel. However, it was time for a change! 

1 Hotel Central Park is located walking distance to anything and everything you could need or desire. Great restaurants, shopping, walking, subway, broadway, and the park.

Check-in was quick and easy. Front desk staff were pleasant and very professional. The same can be said of everyone that works in the property! Our room was clean and well stocked. Turn-down service was appreciated. The hotel is very well designed and maintained. Jams is great for meals and afternoon drinks at the bar.

title: 4 night family vacation
text:
My family and I spent 4 nights in the Alcove Jr suite 8/1-8/5. We enjoyed every moment at this hotel. We arrived before check in and our room was ready. Staff was courteous at all times and the concierge was very helpful giving us great dining recommendations. The hotel has a wonderful location right by Central Park as the name states and that was a huge plus when traveling with children. As for our room we stayed in the alcove jr suite. The bed was very comfortable and while some people may not be fans of bathrooms w glass walls. It was not an issue for us there is a curtain you can close if it’s an issue. The jr. suite is still not a large room but it does have a small living room for NYC standards I’d say it’s about right. House keeping did a wonderful job. My only two critiques is that the room is very dimly lit and even if you open the curtains it doesn’t change much since our room had no views. My next critique is simply that someone has to clean the window ledges on the outside ours was covered in bird poop and feathers and was a pretty gross sight.
All in all we had a wonderful vacation and a lot of that has to do with our stay at the 1 hotel. Thank you for a great experience.

title: Wonderful anniversary weekend visit
text: My husband and I loved everything about our stay. The service from the staff was impeccable- from the astute and and welcoming front desk staff at check in, to the friendly and available con siege, and finally to the room service delivery person who was sensitive and efficient. We loved the room which was beautiful with special features like a window seat overlooking 6th Ave and glass shower. It’s our first trip to a 1 Hotel- but it won’t be our last!

title: Midtown Dream
text: One night in this little Keebler treehouse hotel was fantastic. A quiet getaway off the busy midtown streets offering the essence of the forrest and nature. You'll find a staff that is incedibly polite, attractive, knowledgeable and accommodating and rooms that are quiet , clean and comfortable. It's perfectly situated near the subway , Central park, shops and restaurants. A big shout out to Spncer and Michael !!

title: Super interior, nice staff, great location
text:
We enjoyed our stay, the hotel is really nicely decorated and the room was spacious. However, our Alcove room was quite dark because the window was facing at a wall.
The fitness is good. The staff was friendly and helpful.

title: AMAZING
text:
I don’t normally write reviews, but I had such a wonderful experience at this hotel that I feel like I need to spread the good news! This hotel has an amazing location just one block south of Central Park. It is such a welcome respite from the hustle and bustle of the city. Every day when we would come back to the hotel and walk into the lobby I would take a deep breath and smell the calming scents. 

The service  was outstanding. Anything we could have ever needed they were quick to respond with a positive remark. The room was gorgeous. It was on the smaller side, but it was all we needed. It had a gorgeous window seat that I spent much of my time and just overlooking the city. We paid for an elevated view, and I’m sure it helped with the noise, however we still couldn’t see much just given the location of the hotel. I would advise that if you are looking for a view, you request a Park view instead of a City view.  The room was gorgeous. It was on the smaller side, but it was all we needed. It had a gorgeous window seat that I spent much of my time and just overlooking the city. I cannot say enough good things about this hotel! Don’t even hesitate if you were thinking about talking, you will be so happy with your decision!

title: strongly suggested for a perfect NYC experience
text: this hotel is perfectly located in Midtown just two blocks from Central Park . it is eco friendly and it has a vibrant bar. front desk and concierge staff are very helpful and always available. rooms are not big for sure but the way they are organised is very efficient and there is plenty of room for clothes. breakfast has plenty of healthy options and the food is properly served and of high quality. it is neither Peninsula nor Four Seasons. it is a millennial hotel which makes also the non millennials happy to stay there a(nd be back again). ps. the wooden electronic key card is cool and very millennial

title: Our window seat was the size of a twin bed and my daughter ended up sleeping in it 16 stories up, overlooking the street
text: This hotel is by far my favorite hotel of all time! We travel a lot as a family and have stayed in numerous hotels around the world and this hotel stands out among all others. We appreciated the overall vibe of the hotel and the fact that they reuse, re-purpose and recycle everything. The staff went above and beyond for us and was gracious and friendly with every encounter, from the minute we walked through the doors, to checking in at the front desk, to ordering room service. We felt very comfortable and welcome at all times. A highlight, however was the rain shower! The water pressure was superb and each shower felt as if it were a trip to the spa. Even the restaurant, Jams, was phenomenal. My husband and I had one of the best dinners there. We were in New York for 10 days, with great food everywhere we went, but I would return to Jams any day. Amazing place to stay.

title: 1 Hotel LOVE
text: The 1 Hotel in Central Park is a very special place with truly caring individuals who work there and gorgeous and clean rooms, showers and beds!  Everything was fantastic and I can't wait til I can stay there again.  The bath products were also wonderful!  Jams is a delicious place to get breakfast as well.  The staff including Michael B were superior and really care about everything they do.  thank you 1 Hotel!!

title: great view to the Central park and extremely cosy rooms, friendly staff
text: This time, due to some work things, I stayed in 2 districts of NY, and the Central Park area was well-located for the second part of my stay. I booked a simplier room, but was shown a better category on location and agreed to pay the extra charge for it immediately, as the view is really different and is worth it. The staff was helpful, but I would like to say a special thank you to the concierge named Spencer. He helped me out to book a good Broadway show (it was Pretty Woman and suited those who are not fluent in English, and there were such people among us) last minute, his recommendaions for restaurants were also great. I loved the hotel, the view, and the ecological content in particular ! I will be back for sure

title: Service is 5 stars
text:
Great boutique hotel. One block from Central Park. The staff is 5 stars!! They were kind enough to store our bicycles that we brought with us. 

Decor was outstanding. 

Only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars was the size of the room. Not uncomfortably small, but little tight if you staying longer than a weekend.

title: Great modern hotel, convenient location
text: The room is very clean and comfortable, love the scent of the room. It’s around 3-5 minutes walk from Central Park and the Plaza Hotel, and literally one minute to the nearest subway station. Great to just walk around the neighborhood or travel around New York.  The twin bed room is enough for us with young children.

title: Great beds and pillows! Great location too.
text: We just stayed here. There were three of us in a room- my son, my sister and me. The positives- the hotel staff, particularly the doormen, were so attentive and welcoming. The  beds and pillows were amazing. I am picky and dont often sleep well in hotels but I slept like a baby here. The location is perfect. Right near the park. They have a car available to drive you anywhere within 15 blocks. We used it a lot. The driver, Lornezo, was amazing!! The gym is ok. The negatives- the room was small. The design of the bathroom is not good. It is tight. The shower and bathroom are all glass and exposed to the room area. You have to pull a curtain in the bedroom for privacy. Just a bad idea. The shower also had some bulky piece of wood thing that was supposed to hold the shampoo etc but it was unstable. The cleaning was spotty. Two ports in our room did not work and werent repaired after notice. The lobby is tiny. Would have preferred something bigger to chill in. Breakfast is in the restaurant which was $$$.

title: Desapontamento geral com o hotel
text: Fiquei muito decepcionada com o hotel pois a suite na foto do site é uma coisa, in loco eh totalmente diferente. Começando pela suite oferecida, em um canto, ao lado de uma das portas da escada onde fica uma lixeira usada pela limpeza. O carpete sujo do andar fica imundo no caminho da suite e na porta da escada, ao lado da suite, eh algo nojento e contrangedor. Tentei mudar de suite, alegando que ficaria 5 noites e nao iria ficar em um lugar assim, sem vista inclusive, apenas com uma vista interna. Me disseram que nao daria nessa primeira noite, apenas na noite seguinte, No dia seguinte ofereceram um downgrade, um quarto mais barato que nao era suite, com 2 a ambientes. Disse que ok se devolvessem a diferença. Nessa noite me disseram que se eu quisesse poderia ir para outro hotel que cancelariam a reserva mas no dia seguinte não permitiram mais. O gerente da noite deu ok (Paul) , disse que se eu  mudar de hotel ok, mas no dia seguinte a gerente do dia disse que não, que nao devolveriam o dinhero ja pago. Na terceira noite o alarme de incendio tocou 3 vezes, devido a um incidente na cozinha, As 3 da manha eu e minha filha descemos e exigi um quarto no primeiro andar pois nao conseguia mais dormir devido ao medo da suspeita de incendio, ofereceram no 4 andar por uma noite. No dia seguinte descobri que realmente ouve um problema ou principio de  curto na cozinha, apesar de dizeram aos hospedes assutados que nao era nada. A cozinha do café da manha nao tinha pratos quentes e quando pergunteo por que me disseram que estavam remodelando. Estranhei.  Almocei no hotel por acaso e a cozinha estava a pleno vapor, com o restaurante lotado. Mentiram sobre o problema técnico. Minha agencia de viagem tentou de tudo para que cancelassem minha estadia mas não deixaram. Não recomenda a ninguem esse hotel, apenas o de Dumbo que eh muito bom,

title: Great views, clean room
text: Checked in and Spencer at the Front desk was happy to accommodate us on a room we had requested. The hotel offered free shuttle within 15 blocks which was very useful, and the room itself was beautiful and spotless. I would absolutely stay here again and recommend to anyone spending time in NYC to consider 1 Hotel Central Park.

title: Small rooms with good service
text: Stayed here for 4 nights.  We did not expect the room to be so small and dark.  We had to request extra lighting, but it did not help much.  The upkeep of the room is substandard with stiff shower door that could not be closed properly.  The room was not too clean when i did a wipe down which I always do at all hotels.  The air conditioning system was not working well, but it was acceptable.  There was a false fire alarm at 3am in the morning and we were all woken up by an announcement in the sound system in the room which scared us.  The person who made the announcement = was not clear and I had to get out of bed to find the phone to call the reception to find out what was going on.  The hotel made an apology to the incident with an email, a note and some cookies which as quite nice of them.  The staff were all very friendly with good service and common sense which is important when answering our questions.  The kitchen was under renovations, so only cold food was served in the morning.  Both the bagel and the croissant were horrible and the hotel can absolutely do better with those.  Coffee was not good either, so we opted to go to the Starbucks across the street every morning instead.  I would not stay at this hotel again as the rooms are too small. And I almost made a complain against the people who lived above us as they were walking around their room around 3am every night.  I would not recommend this hotel to anyone if you want to spend a quiet and peaceful time, but would recommend it if you like noise and a more trendy vibe.

title: Perfeito !!!
text: Um oasis no meio da turbulenta NY ...hotel para descanso e contemplação, ..muito verde, elementos naturais, formas orgânicas, produtos de excelente qualidade,...foi uma experiência maravilhosa... eu super recomendo.

title: Great hotel
text: The hotel is very cool inside the location is great, the room was very nice and clean and modern, the bed was comfortable and staff at the hotel are very nice and accommodating..we would stay there again

title: Would stay again and again
text:
This hotel was perfect for me and my husband, spending 2 nights in one of the City View king rooms. Highlights:
1) Clean and quiet (for NYC). The room and bathroom were immaculate and it didn't reek of harsh cleaning detergents, just the lovely cedar and vetyver aromas that they have piped in and coursing through their bath products. SCORE! The room honestly felt like a day spa setting. I had requested a "quiet" room and it indeed made for 2 blissful nights of sleep. Yes, the walls are thin - we could hear people in adjacent rooms coming and going, but we didn't have any people partying through the night around us.
2) The reading/window seat and decor were a delight for relaxing after a day of travel.
3) Loved all the eco-friendly components from the re-usable take home socks, to the optionally timed shower, exposed wood paneling, organic sheets, to the little comment card at the end that has SEEDS YOU CAN PLANT and the list goes on and on.

Loved the stay so much that I bought the fragrance and searched their job listings to see whether there was anything appropriate for me in their West Hollywood location. I want my house to be like this hotel. That is all.

title: The best hotel to experience New York in the summertime!
text:
We spent four nights at the 1 Hotel in Central Park for my husband's birthday. The staff make this hotel special. Christopher at the front desk was incredibly friendly and helpful (in fact we found every staff member brilliant). Michael at the front desk let me borrow his power bank for my phone when the whole of midtown Manhattan experienced a blackout between 7pm-9pm on 13th July (caused by a transformer fire on the subway).

This hotel SMELLS amazing, it is almost like sleeping in a really luxurious treehouse, apparently very rare in New York! We also visited the 1 hotel in Brooklyn which was also absolutely gorgeous with a rooftop bar overlooking Brooklyn/Manhattan bridges and the statue of liberty. 

The blackout meant that our plans for my husbands birthday were cancelled (through no fault of the hotel) which was a shame, but the staff were helpful and let us know what was going on and what time they expected power to be back on. I am a fitness coach and competitor so I visited the gym, it has a Peloton which is brilliant. 

We were also upgraded to a King room when we arrived. It was spacious with high ceilings! The rain shower was amazing and they give you cosy robes and socks.

The windows can be fully opened (in England that isn't allowed). So I don't think this would be suitable for children. 

If anyone wants to do the doors off helicopter or see a little more about this hotel, feel free to find me @kirstyjoannafitness on instagram :) 

We will be coming back!

title: Best Home Away from home again!
text: The Hotel is great and in a great location.... But it’s just a building.... It’s the staf that set tho pace apart! Concierge is at Hotel 1 is elite! trust me! The Bellboys k ow your name, the cleaners in the room do an amazing job, the bar staff are wow! Do yourself a favor, go here and have the stay of a lifetime!

title: good stay
text: I struggle to find hotels in NY with the right balance of room size, comfort, service, location. I really liked this hotel. Very well located, friendly staff, nice rooms and amenities, buzzy bar and restaurant. Would recommend for a business trip or leisure, couples or families. You also have use of the house Tesla for local trips which is a nice touch.

title: Disappointing
text:
We had a great experience at the 1Hotel in Miami so we thought we would give it a try in NYC.  We booked for eight nights and left after one day. 

The person that checked us in was totally disinterested, could not smile and never looked at me directly.  I certainly did not feel welcome.

I think the hotel is badly designed.  We booked a City View Suite.  It was pretty expensive and we had reasonably high expectations which were soon shattered.  The suite consists of two rooms.  The bedroom is small. The "living room" is reasonable.  But the real problem is the bathroom.  The door/wall is glass.  The bathroom faces the outside window.  By City View, they mean looking across 58th street at another building.   People in that building had a view right into the bathroom including the toilet. We had to close the drapes when we used the facilities.  There was no way to turn on the bathroom lights when I got up in the middle of the night to go to the toilet without waking up my wife.  

We asked at the front desk about upgrading to a Park View room which had a bathroom that did not face an apartment. across the street. We were told the cost of upgrading would be $250 and that was after a discount.  But when I checked on the hotel's web site, I found the difference was about $195.  

The location is great if you want to be in midtown.  Most of the staff was friendly and helpful.   We had dinner at the restaurant and it was good.

title: High expectations but not what I expected
text: Amazing location, great design but poor operations.  Paying $600 a night for a JR Suite corner room which has issued. We let staff know the Nespresso machine was broken, staff did not fix or attend to it.  Towels were in bad shape.  Asked Concierge to send us clean new towels and nothing happened, we had to resolve it ourselves next day with housekeeping.  Asked for water in the lobby because they have $9 rainwater in the room, no luck they had no water in lobby.  Didn’t get room cleaned one day even though we didn’t have the DND rock outside door.  Bunch of other stuff went wrong and we lost patience and checked out to the Public Hotel not what I expected for $600 a night.

title: Mrs Bonnie Buerosse
text:
Where do I start? From the moment  my husband and I stepped out of our Uber we  knew our experience at 1 Hotel was going to be wonderful . From  the doorman, front desk  and concierge personnel everyone was friendly and accommodating. No was NOT in their vocabulary. The manager in the morning at the Jams restaurant was so down to earth & took her time to speak with us when I asked of recommendations for our first time visit to NY.
Both shift front desk mangers I worked with always were friendly , courteous & asked my questions with a smile ... As well the concierge. The rooms were clean , comfortable & cute !
Everything you need was in the room
Hair dryer , steam clothes presser, safe , shower wash , shampoo, conditioner & toilettes. They even put a pair of house socks with non stick soles on our pillows one night.
If you want to be treated like Royalty, then stay at 1 Hotels & ENJOY!
Will definitely stay again !

title: Incredible hotel and staff at 1 Hotel Central Park!
text: My wife and I were in New York for a night and stayed at 1 Hotel Central Park. We will be back for sure! The location is great. Accommodations fantastic. And the customer service was perfect. All of the employees were friendly but Andrew at the front desk/lobby was exceptionally helpful. Our stay at 1 Hotel Central Park has made return customers out of us! We will be back and will stay in their other city locations on our travels!

title: Superbe
text:
Nous avons passé 8 jours dans cet hôtel 
Il est magnifique 
Deco très cocooning 
Service au top
Emplacement idéal 
Des l arrivée on se sent très bien 
Je visite beaucoup d Hotels dans le monde 
Celui là est dans mon podium
Top

title: Love the 1 hotel- our new favorite family hotel
text:
We love the 1 hotel- the staff is warm, friendly and welcoming- especially Andrew,   Luis, and Shane. 

Traveling with two kids and a dog, the 1 stands out providing dog treats, bowls and a bed.   The neighboring king/queen rooms are a perfect setup for families. 

Our first visit was far from perfect but every time we stay, it gets better and better.  It’s become our choice of hotels in nyc.  We can’t wait to come back!

title: Cool Hotel with great staff
text: We stayed in the 1 hotel for about a week on our last holiday in New York. The location is great a 2 min walk to Central Park. The staff were professional, friendly and super helpful. The hotel is beautiful and has wonderful eco friendly modern rooms.The hotel restaurant "Jams" was excellent, the food was delicious. Try to stay in the studio king room for the great views.

title: Business Traveler and Father
text:
Our stay at this hotel was one of the best experiences we have had at a hotel.  We typically stay at a 5 star place like the 4 Seasons but wanted to give 1 Hotel a try.  We loved the fact that everything in the hotel is recycled which helps save our environment.  Also the location is as good as it gets for NYC, being right next to Central Park as well as all the major shopping areas and theaters.  Also the designer of that hotel should get a reward because I am rather picky and must say the glass, steel and wood were used perfectly together that made the rooms very functional, masculine and warm all at the same time.  Lastly the rooms in NYC are all small if it’s a newer hotel but at this hotel we were very pleased having a suite with two adjoining rooms separated by a small living room.  

Also the gym was well appointed next to a great business center that was very functional to do some work and host meetings.  The restaurant Jams has great food and a cool bar so definitely don’t need to the leave the property if you are there for a short stay.

I am shocked I am still writing this review because I usually don’t have the time and think most of the BS and fabricated by the staff of the institution and or friends/family of the owners.  I assure I am not and just wanted to say thank you for such a wonderful and comfortable experience.  

Thumbs up 1 Hotel and it’s refreshing to see a company actually do more than is expected!

title: A wonderful escape in the heart of NYC!
text: From the moment you walk into the lobby of the 1Hotel Central Park you know you are in for a very different hotel experience.  The lobby is covered with plants and intriguing reclaimed objects. We felt like we were camping in the heart of the city. The rooms are unique and make good use of every inch of space. We weren't fans of the glass walls in the bathroom and Michael at the front desk was able to work magic to put us in a room with a solid bathroom wall. The bed was one of the most comfortable we've ever slept on and we loved our window alcove bed for taking in the views of the city. We will definitely stay here again on our next trip to NY!

title: Best Place to Stay for Business or Fun
text: After bouncing around NY hotels whenever I come for business or fun, I've stayed here three times in the last year, including most recently for a week.  It's got a perfect location, good rooms, great in-house restaurant and bar and, most importantly, great service.  Special shout out to Michael at the front desk, who always goes above and beyond to make every trip special and solve the smallest of problems.

title: Celebratory visit
text: 1 Hotel Central Park carries the nature from the front door through the lobby, into the elevator and right on up to the chic guest rooms. Thank you to Mr. Farina, Ms. Oh and Ms. Lee for taking such good care of finding the perfect spot for us. The place is warm and inviting, smells wonderful and is in a word, spectacular! Our service was outstanding. We were celebrating our fortieth wedding anniversary, and concierges Brianna and Joshua helped us get tickets and reservations to make our long weekend special. Ohi brought us coffee when we needed some revival! Thank you for making this place the perfect location for our celebration!

title: Pleasant surprise!
text:
My business partner and I spent 3 nights at the hotel.
Perfect location, great friendly service. They also recovered and returned $600 bucks my partner dropped while sitting in in the lobby)
Rooms are cozy and spacious enough, not a stuffy hotel but no douche young crowd either, good crowd perfect.

Very reasonable summer rate and good bar restaurant.

Thx!
Allen

title: Eco Friendly but very friendly indeed !
text:
Great staff and concierge services!
Rooms a bit dark but comfortable. A lot of sustainable ; recyclable and eco friendly details all over hotel. I had a broken hair drier but was replaced immediately. 

Jams bar downstairs is also must mention! Great food!!! 
Hotel location is excellent. 
Finally I have found a homy hotel in NYC

title: Green and Hip Hotel
text:
Hotel is very eco friendly and hip, with lots of cool details all around! Location is good especially for NYC first timers! The thing I enjoyed best in the hotel is their free Tesla car service that can shuttle you within 15km radius on first come first served basis! Service is great and staff are very helpful. 

Rooms are clean and chic but I feel is not worth the published rates of hotel. Overall great experience, if you don't mind the price.

title: Ótima localização
text:
Hotel moderno com excelente localização- a uma quadra do central park
Concierge muito atencioso onde todas as solicitações também podem ser feitas por app e prontamente respondidas
Servico de motorista com Tesla incluído a disposição sem custo
Quarto aconchegante apesar de não ter lugar para guardar as roupas
Hotel ecológico com certificação Leed

title: Avoid at all costs
text: We wanted to love this hotel after reading positive reviews but sadly have to advise...never, ever stay here. The staff is friendly enough but there was one issue after another. Just a sampling: couldn’t check-in at 5:30pm because room wasn’t ready, calls and knocks on door at all hours of day and night even though privacy/do not disturb light was on, broken hair dryer that took 30 mins to replace (in towel post shower!), and more. Avoid at all costs.

title: Home away from home
text: 1 Hotel is the best.  We stay in both 1 Brooklyn and 1 New York.  The people make it the best!  The hotel is beautifully designed and the rooms are superb.  But, I must reinforce that the staff are simply incredible.

title: Solid
text:
I think the best part of this hotel is the service. Concierge was remarkable (especially Richard and Lorenzo) - extremely service-oriented, constantly calling to get us a reservation. The front desk staff were friendly and accommodating. There was always someone to hold open the door and grab us a cab. We only used the car service once but that too was efficient and the driver very friendly.

The hotel is in an excellent location. Very clean. 

Eco-conscious, which we very much appreciate, yet did have one noticeable drawback for us which was the shower water pressure. Sorry, I appreciate good water pressure!

Gym was excellent. They have Peloton bikes which I LOVED as I have one at home and could use during our stay.

The restaurant was disappointing. Prices are expected for New York...slightly a bit overpriced for what you get. Service was terrible. Only ate there once on the first day and did not go back.

Overall it is a solid choice.

title: Amazing Property with great location
text: Loved the property. The employees are the added bonus. I enjoyed my day and will be staying there again when I go back to New York. The location is great as well. A block from central park while still walking distance from time square.

title: Wonderful stay
text: Loved this hotel! Great location within walking distance to Central Park and numerous shops and restaurants. Beautiful room with super comfy bed and amazing restaurant on property. Will definitely be back!

title: Fun day exploring Central Park
text:
Loved this eco friendly hotel one block from Central Park.
Plenty of restaurants and bars within walking distance.
Bed was very comfortable and the rain shower was awesome.
Clean rooms and friendly staff. Michael B was very helpful.
I would definitely stay here again.

title: Mini Break to NYC - 1 Hotel Central Park
text:
We have recently returned to the UK after a min-break to NYC in celebration of our 30th wedding anniversary. we stayed at this hotel which was simply amazing; the décor, theme and the values that are exuded in everything is incredible. The room was wonderful in both its layout and facilities, given that the size of rooms in New York are normally small.

Whilst we spent a lot of our time walking and sightseeing, to be able to return to such a relaxing and calming environment really did help re-charge the batteries. The staff were all incredibly polite and helpful, in particular Josh and Brett were very welcoming and provided that ‘personal touch’ each time we spoke with them. We were amazed one evening to find a bottle of Prosecco in our room from the 1Hotel team to help us celebrate our anniversary; a most thoughtful gesture, followed on the night after by receiving handmade chocolates . 

We ate in the restaurant on our final evening and the food was simply superb.

title: An oasis within a metropolis
text:
Searching for the perfect base in such a large city can be mind boggling but I certainly found it at 1 Hotel Central Park.  Being only one block from Central Park and within walking distance of many of the city's other incredible landmarks, we could not have chosen a better location.

The hotel itself has an amazing ambience and all of the staff we encountered during our stay were very friendly and made us feel very welcome.  We reserved a City View Room so were  more than pleasantly surprised that our view also encompassed the beauty of Central Park. 

We enjoyed breakfast at Jams, the restaurant at the hotel, only once, but that was merely because we wanted to take in as much as the city as we could during our stay. The service was impeccable and the food was excellent.

I would like to thank Spencer, the concierge at the hotel for arranging the delightful birthday message, bottle of plonk and delicious cake to greet us on our arrival in our room.  A lovely and much appreciated gesture.

This was our first time in New York, in fact in America, and I cannot wait to return and will definitely choose this hotel again without hesitation.

title: Outstanding as always
text:
This is the place to stay if you want to visit Manhattan. The natural feel and environment of the hotel is very inviting and quite relaxing.

This was the third time celebrating our anniversary at 1 hotel Central Park.
The staff are second to none. It seems they’re number one and only focus is our comfort and satisfaction.

From being welcomed at the front door, the main lobby, the help from the concierge desk… I could go on. The accommodations are exceptionally clean, comfortable and relaxing.

Richard at concierge desk, Lorenzo, Maryam, Catherine… Hotel manager, Shane, Austin, Brett, Dan, housekeeping staff… All contributed to our absolute relaxation and enjoyment.

What a find!
We can’t wait to be back.

title: Great hotel and location
text:
fantastic location with a walk to everything. very clean and eco friends rooms. Helpful staff and concierge.  Would absolutely recommend for couples visiting New York. 

restaurant downstairs has great food and drink.  

Tesla car service was very handy and driver was knowledgable about where to go etc.

title: Amazing hotel!
text: Loved our stay at 1 Hotel.  When I made reservations I mentioned that it was our anniversary and we got an amazing corner room with 2 large windows and a bottle of sparkling wine.  Everyone was super friendly and provided excellent service.

title: Birthday Celebration
text: My stats at 1 Hotel are always amazing. Staff is always very warm and welcoming, I love the concept of the organization and I love the decor and feel of the rooms. I had the pleasure of staying in the greenhouse suite this time (I usually stay in the king room) and it was beyond amazing. I had my friends there for my birthday and it made it even better than I could’ve imagined. Couldn’t recommend one hotels more!

title: By far the best hotel
text: Staying here with my wife and my in laws. We booked two king rooms with city views . Excellent service from the luggage handler to valet and reception. Very friendly staff and professional customer service. Jams restaurant at the lobby is excellent and offers great food verity including vegan and gluten free. One of the nights we were having dinner there and my wife was not feeling well so she didn’t join us for dinner and when I asked our waitress for some ginger she went out of her way to make a pot of hot water and ginger and delivered it to us. Small thing perhaps but it meant a lot to me and my wife. I think it showed the culture of this hotel and management training . We are extremely impressed and will come back for sure and will recommend family and friends. Although a bit pricey it is definitely worth it.

title: Best hotel!
text:
NY bästa hotel! Vår familj bodde här i två nätter i slutet på maj. Hela familjen älskade hotellet.
Ett stort tack till alla på 1 Hotel Central park som gjorde vår vistelse så fin! Tack för bästa service. Rummet var underbart!

title: Another Enjoyable and Relaxing Stay
text: This was our 3rd or 4th visit back to 1 Hotel and they never disappoint!  It truly is such a unique and tranquil setting right in the heart of New York City.  With great views overlooking Central Park, and only steps to the park itself, it makes enjoying all the city has to offer as well as a relaxing stroll through the park very easy and fun to do.  The staff could not be more friendly and accommodating.  They make us feel right at home every time we go.  We have dealt with Brett at the front desk in the past and again last week, and he makes getting you checked in a breeze. We also were helped by a new member of their team, Josue, and he was very friendly and helpful.  We just love the unique design and décor of the rooms and will continue to come back!

title: A mini oasis in the city that never sleeps
text:
One of the most BEAUTIFUL hotels I've ever stayed at. Everything from its furnishings, decor, ambiance, and service--this hotel provides a unifying experience. My room was spotless, gorgeous, and was so inviting and cozy.

I stayed here for a work trip, and after a long day at the Times Square offices, I could walk away from the flashing lights, traffic, and crowds of tourists--this hotel was like a mini oasis. Only a few blocks away from the action, but I could get away and relax anytime I wanted; best of both worlds.

On the morning of my departure, my flight was cancelled due to a winter storm and the staff quickly arranged an extended stay at a great rate; didn't have to move rooms or anything.

Every detail, from the helpful staff to the interior design to the hotel room keys--top notch. When I come back to NYC, I'll definitely try to stay here again.

title: don't walk, RUN....to the 1
text:
this was our second stay at the 1 Hotel, and it will not be our last.
great team; excellent rooms/ and an atmosphere and message that make you feel great.
as someone who has frequented the St Regis and Mandarin Oriental ion nyc for years, i am now a faithful convert to the 1Hotel.
and at a fraction of the cost!!!

title: Plus que parfait
text:
Famille de 4 avec 2 jeunes enfants. 
Très bonne expérience. C'est le genre d'hôtel qu'on a envie de garder pour soi tellement on y a eu une bonne expérience. C'est trop nul n'y allez pas !!!!!!!

Pas un grand ensemble avec des centaines de chambres aussi identiques les unes que les autres... on est ici dans le chic et intime. 

Les chambres sont très bien décorées et équipées. Pas de vue particulière sur la ville mais une localisation idéale pour de multiples activités : business, tourisme, culturelle. 

Le personnel est très gentil. 

Les tarifs sont quand même très élevés mais pas de regret d'avoir fait cet effort pour passer un bon séjour. 

Le bar en bas est très sympa dès 16:00. Serveurs un peu débordés quand il y a beaucoup de monde.

title: Excelente Hotel
text:
Gran hotel con un estilo rústico y natural, me encantó, la atención del personal fue de primera ya que siempre están atentos. 
Ubicación cerca de central park, 5.ª avenida y museos. 
El restaurante con un ambiente agradable en todo momento.

title: Best visit to NYC
text:
After booking the 1Hotel, I reconsidered because I wanted a’fancier’ hotel. Boy am I glad I did not change it!!! The 1 Hotel is absolutely BEAUTIFUL. It’s clean, organic feel is refreshing in the city. The rooms are perfect. They have full size toiletries, robes, even a yoga mat. The reading nook was my daughter’s favorite. She just wants to sit there. The shower was great. My daughter has never wanted to shower so often. Haha!! The restaurant, Jams, is good as well. The concierge and staff went above and beyond. Christopher made our stay beyond perfect. He made dreams come true and surprised my daughter with a park view room. He was just great, truly a nice guy. 

You are a block away from Central Park and all the 5th ave shops. The hotel location is perfect. It’s close to Time Square, walking distance. 

When I return to NYC, this is my new go-to hotel!

title: Wonderful oasis in NYC!
text: This was our second visit to 1 Hotel Central Park. I really can't say enough good things about this hotel! It is very unique with its cool eco vibe, with living plants and reclaimed wood everywhere. It feels very organic and warm, in contrast to most Manhattan hotels, which tend to be modern and cold. The staff at this hotel is exceptional. Every single person we interacted with was friendly and accommodating, and they made everything easy. We also had a great experience at Jams restaurant, where we ate several times. Our waiter Bruce was truly one of the best waiters we've ever had anywhere, and because of him we returned 3 times during our stay. Our room was wonderful, with an incredibly comfortable bed, great sheets, and a very well-appointed bathroom. The noise of the city was loud on the weekend nights, so I suggest picking up some earplugs at the front desk if you forget to bring your own.

title: Great location, unique concept
text: The hotel is just off Cental Park, an easy walk to so many sights. The natural concept of the property seemed a bit overdone, with plants in various stages of life everywhere. The design of the room was lovely and comfortable.  I thought the use of cardboard products in the room was a bit odd, and the variety of scents in the hallways and lobby was at times too strong. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The bathrobes were luxurious, and the in room yoga mat was a nice touch

title: unique hotel
text: perfect location for this hotel with a small hotel feel to it.  Rooms are great, but be prepared for very small place to hang your clothes or put any items away.  bathrooms are glass enclosed, which can be off-putting, but overall this is a great place to stay.  Very nice staff as well.

title: Lovely & Interesting Room; Superb Service; Excellent Location
text:
Fascinating & lovely hotel, rooms and mezzanine lounge level. LOVED the window seat over the street, missed having a tub, but its closeness to Central Park (1block away) - our focus for this long weekend - is excellent. Service is unflailingly friendly. Loved the decor in the rooms, comfy lounges in the mezzanine (almost fell asleep there despite the rumbles of conversation from the restaurant below) and interesting decor throughout the hotel.

We booked through TripAdvisor Hotels for Everyone at a great price (still not cheap by any normal person's standards at $385/night) but for a milestone anniversary - we splurged. Very comfortable beds & pillows - usually an issue for me.

We walked everywhere. There was a little grocery store across the street with snacks & the necessaries you can't fly with. Angela's Sandwich shop 1/2 block away saved us big bucks for fast & plain breakfast and lunch. Jams downstairs was great for late afternoon snack & delicious but loud/expensive brunch. Close to our favorite dinner at Quality Italian and a hike to Ocean Prime. Taxis to & from airport easy to get.

title: Superb
text: The best combination of trendy, comfort and good location off Central Park. The restaurant is excellent, service great and the Concierge service if you hang out in NYC is the best of the best. Been here twice and will keep coming back.

title: Bom descolado e apertado como quase tudo em NYC
text: Já fiquei no 1Hotel de Miami e realmente são diferentes, em espaço principalmente. Em NY o hotel é bem mais compacto e atende pela localização excelente a uma quadra do Central Park, porém o quarto é bem apertado, charmoso, no estilo do hotel com pegada eco-sustentável. Quarto com piso de madeira, sem carpetes empoeirados, esse talvez o ponto alto para mim. Lobby com decoração rústica charmosa e restaurante ok!

title: Will Definitely Be Back
text: I left Hotel 1 Central Park (after a three night stay) with a very positive impression. The staff members that I encountered were terrific and I found my room to be quiet at night(which is not something I can say about many Midtown hotels). An inquiry about Wi-Fi connectivity resulted in a hotel technician in my room in under five minutes and my internet issue was rapidly resolved. I wish I had the opportunity to sample a few items from the dinner menu in the hotel restaurant – breakfast was great.

title: Oasis Property
text: 1 Hotel takes your stress away as you enter.  Thank You to Christopher who took very good care of my room choice. Christopher and Brianna were so fabulous to work with.  It is very rustic, not glamorous.  But it's theme makes the property unique.

title: Excelente opção para quem deseja aproveitar NYC!
text:
O fato de tratar-se de um hotel sustentável e com cardápio 100% orgânico, fez toda a diferença na escolha!

O staff é de primeira linha! Sempre com mimos para tornar a sua estadia especial!

A localização é estratégica, próximo de tudo o que importa!

title: Pienamente rispettate le migliori aspettative
text: Ho trascorso in questo hotel i 4 giorni delle vacanze pasquali, approfittando di un'offerta grazie alla prenotazione fatta in gennaio. Location centrale, struttura originale che rispetta pienamente gli standard ecologici, anche nell'arredamento, camere non molto ampie, staff estremamente professionale. Il rapporto qualità-prezzo (esclusa la prima colazione che costa 30 dollari a persona) è sicuramente interessante se si può usufruire di un'offerta prenotando in anticipo.

title: Exceptional accommodations and location!
text: We stayed for just 1 night while in the city for a show at the Lincoln Center. The staff were incredibly helpful and friendly and clealy loved their jobs, which was refreshing to see.   Our room was amazing! We loved the window seat with a view of Central Park, the free standing shower and the nespresso maker was a great perk.  We will definitely be back for another stay and/or try their other location in Brooklyn with views of the Bridge!

title: Great service
text: We had just recently stayed at this hotel and the service was amazing. From getting dinner reservations to finding us a perfect nails salon, you can count on the concierge desk to handle it! The hotel is super friendly and the employees there are amazing! (my favorite is Spencer)

title: Perfect base to see NYC
text: With so many hotels to choose from in New York, it`s easy to get overwhelmed about making the wrong decision. No need - this hotel really ticks all the boxes for me, most importantly an excellent location to base from. It`s close to Central Park, subway stations and really easy walking distance to Broadway, West Village, Upper East Side, Times Square and plenty of other places. Several good restaurants nearby and The Plaza food hall is down the street, which is a great place to grab a morning coffee and snack before wandering through the park. The hotel itself is quite unique - I think they have done something pretty impressive in setting up an eco-focused hotel that is still high-end. The small details are all there and the service was excellent. I particularly liked the little differences from other hotels, such as the push lighting and do not disturb buttons, the steamer instead of iron, and the reading nook that looked out over 6th Avenue. While a little on the expensive side depending on when you visit, you definitely get what you pay for in terms of location, vibe and service and I would honestly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting NYC.

title: My Go-To hotel in NYC
text:
Love this hotel! It is my go-to for whenever I'm in New York. I usually come to NYC to do business in Soho but I refuse to stay anywhere else despite the distance because this hotel has captured my heart. 

Beautiful decor, love that they care about the environment and recycling as it's promoted throughout, the space in the rooms are thoughtfully planned out, the food is delicious, the shower is fantastic, the beds super comfortable, and the hotel has a fabulous smell that I wish I could bring home with me. 

This will spoil you on any other place!

title: Sustainable living
text:
My friend booked the hotel for us, and it helps if you do your research.  The 1hotel is all about sustainable living and up cycling/recycling of pretty much everything that can be done.  The interior is amazingly build from products that we’re going to landfills (as far as I could tell).  All of the thought and sourcing for up-cycled materials to be used in the construction of the hotel means you have a very cool, somewhat industrial feel mixed in with natural tones.  All in all no complaints about the hotel so long as you’re interested in helping the environment!

It you’re looking for all the grandeur of a 7 star hotel then this will miss the mark- instead of slippers they provided wool socks.  The lighting is quite dim (perhaps to save energy?).  Other than those two points, everything was great!

I gave this hotel 5 stars because the service was impeccable, and knowing why they didn’t have items like disposable slippers (covered in plastic), I was perfectly happy with the hardware.  Also happy to know that the hotel is making real steps vs just marketing steps to be more sustainable.

title: It's not as much of a bargain as you think
text:
We picked this hotel because it was the least expensive of the nice hotels in this area.  We saved a little bit of money, but not a lot, and in the end it was a bad decision. We would not stay here again.  A few notes:

1. We paid for a 'park view' which is barely a view of central park. Such a marketing scam!
2. The rooms are really small, even for NY standards.
3. The heating and cooling system is temperamental and very frustrating.
4. The room service is a clown show.  They couldn't get our orders right and we gave up.  If you stay here, don't order the room service.

title: My go to hotel in Manhattan
text: This has become my favorite hotel in Manhattan -  the location, the ambience, the staff, the rooms, the restaurant, it has it all without fail. Concierge, Spencer Howard, takes care of business with grace, humor and efficiency. The location is perfect, close enough to be able to walk from the theatre and at the entrance of Central Park.  Perfection.

title: Stellar!
text: The gentleman when checking in was very nice and helpful. I do not remember his name but I checked in on a Friday April 5th, 2019 around 4pm in the afternoon. I also spoke to Michael H. and Lorenzo via email and they were extremely accommodating. Luis also sent up a nice bottle to celebrate a special weekend. The staff here is courteous and kind and I’ve already spread the news about this location and plan to visit the others!

title: A Nook with a View in New York
text: A quick trip to the Big Apple brought us to theater and 1 Hotel Central. We had a king-size  city view (that actually has a nook with a fun window seat and a peek of Central Park). The hotel is eco-friendly---which we love (BUT wish the lobby was cruelty-free, as the seats were cow hides and sheep skins---ugh!). Other than that, we love this hotel. Free apples, cool layout of the rooms, friendly service staff---even a Tesla to drive us to the theater! Really cool vibes here. Would stay again on our next trip!

title: New Work Home in NY
text: I travel to NY a lot for work. Recently, I sampled 1 Hotel Central Park and was delighted by the staff, the stylish aesthetic, the great lobby restaurant and proximity to my favorite gym, Exhale. The use of reclaimed wood, recyclable decor, live plants and fragrant candles throughout is awesome. This is bound to become my new home away from home.

title: Awesome hotel, awesome location, awesome staff!
text: We just spent 6 nights there and it truly is a great place to stay in the Midtown area.  The staff are very happy and helpful.  The hotel is housed in a very creatively renovated older building that is about 100 yards from Central Park.  We loved walking out the front door (which is very heavy but there is always a helpful attendant manning the door) and being right in the middle of the action.  Short walk to the 6th Ave subway station.  Loved the hotel's Tesla "house car?" and used it several times.  The interior of the hotel and the rooms are nicely done and the "window seat" in the room is great.  Our room on the 17th floor had a view of Central Park!  The rain shower was awesome.  The restaurant was always busy with great food.  The polenta was the best I have every had but I think they only serve it in the winter.  Easy walk to Times Square, the Theater District, and Columbus Circle.  Shout out to Michael B and the rest of the staff.  Thank you for making us feel so welcome.  Can't wait to visit again!

title: Nefasto
text: No puedo explicarme como un hotel que presume de cuidar el medioambiente tiene una contaminación acústica tan escandalosa. Nos han cambiado la habitación y la solución es todavía peor. De la 1001 hemos pasado a la 1801. Con el ruido de las máquinas es imposible descansar. La respuesta de la recepción absolutamente decepcionante.

title: Loved it
text: The staff are so friendly and helpful. When we left they asked what they could have done to improve our stay, the answer was nothing. Ideally located only just south of Central Park and an easy walk to all of Uptown.   Our room was excellent, spacious and really thought the bathroom was great.  We were on the 5th floor so not a great view but was ok.  The Bar area is unbelievably busy all the time and served great cocktails.

title: Exceptional hotel, amazing service!
text: My fiance and I had such a wonderful stay during our visit to the 1 Hotel Central Park.  The entire staff provided us with exceptional care and service and made us feel right at home! Maryam the manager was very kind, welcoming and attentive to all our needs! The shuttle service that they offer at the hotel was also a great plus too. Rooms were very clean and and well decorated. Perfect location and great views of the city from our room. We will definitely be back!

title: Outstanding
text: The location is excellent right by Central Park on 6th Avenue and a good starting point for exploring midtown and uptown. Downtown can be quickly reached by subway right on the doorstep. The service at the hotel is exceptional and there is a genuine care and attention to detail. The rooms are well appointed, modern, clean and the decor is very chic whilst living up to the eco-chic credentials. The food is very good and the breakfast although a la carte, is delicious and the service very fast. The concierge team is very knowledgeable, helpful and professional. This was my first trip to NYC and as a female solo traveller, I can’t recommend it enough. I’ll definitely stay again and have recommended to my family and friends.

title: Another home fun!
text: I stayed at the Brooklyn 1 Hotel last year so thought I would try the Central this time. This was another great experience. The rooms are really wonderful and the mattresses are superb. The front desk staff are truly great, you feel like old friends after staying a few days. Had a great breakfast in Jams. This is one of the only places I have ever been were they did soft scrambled eggs to perfection! I am a huge fan of the 1 Hotels!

title: Fun times
text: My wife and I came to visit family and received phenomenal bar and restaurant recommendations from Spencer Howard!! We had the best time and are so grateful for his assistance. We will definitely return.

title: Beautiful Hotel with Breathtaking Views!
text: Everything about this hotel alludes perfection! From the "enchanted forest" ambiance to the extremely kind and welcoming staff, my stay at 1Hotel CP was nothing but a dream. The rooms were extremely clean and cozy! The entire staff was lovely and helpful! Our nook overlooked Central Park and it was my absolute favorite area to cozy up with a cup of coffee each morning before I headed out. Mary helped us out A TON during our entire stay and even gave us great suggestions for Brunch and Dinner spots. This location is extremely convenient for my fellow shopaholics as it's just steps away from all the amazing shops on 5th ave. There's also a pharmacy, Starbucks and a convenience store right across the street from the hotel which I found very helpful during my stay! Definitely my go-to hotel every time I visit the city! Also, make sure you purchase their candle at the front desk before you leave! It's such an incredibly calming and relaxing scent!

title: Best Hotel in NYC!
text: When you first walk into the 1 Hotel it truly takes your breath away. The hotel scent is amazing and the decor was very modern and up to date. I loved the fact that this hotel was environmentally friendly, you don't really see that a lot. All the team members at the hotel were so friendly and helpful. When I first checked in to the hotel, Chester was there to take all our luggage and help us get situated in our rooms. I loved the rooms, they were very modern and loved the fact that there was a complimentary nespressso machine. The location of this hotel was perfect too! Central Park was literally in front of you and it was just a 7 minute walk to all the shops on 5th avenue. When I wanted a recommendation or reservation to a restaurant Brianna and Richard were very knowledgeable and again very friendly. I was not able to get a reservation to a restaurant on my own but they were able to for me! The entire staff was very approachable and very easy to talk to. I loved my stay so much and cannot wait to be back in NYC!

title: Not what I was hoping for
text:
I was pretty excited when I booked 1 Hotel; it's got a very cool looking exterior and very positive reviews. The rooms looked airy and stylish. Actually staying here, however, is a bit underwhelming. The hallways are beautiful, but everything else lands somewhere between eco-lodge and just plain cheap. There is very little staff - just basically one guy in a tiny lobby - and while they're very nice, they have very little to offer. There's a small gym, no spa, no pool, no dedicated hotel bar or spaces. Inside the room, they have this bizarre totally glass bathroom door which you'll inevitably run into at night. And there's lots of broken drawers / fixtures, etc. Lastly, they completely forgot to clean our room. :(

I do love the little nook we have in our room - that's a cute idea.

I should be clear - it's still a nice hotel. But given that I'm paying about $900/night, I expected a higher level of quality, finish, personal attention and service. 

I'll update if things improve.

title: Great service, beautiful hotel
text: I showed up at this hotel at 10pm after a long day of work and discovered I'd booked the night before and thus missed my reservation.  The desk clerk said it was not a problem, rebooked me for that night and I was good to go. Amazing service!  The rooms are beautiful and clean. The restaurant is also excellent.  I will be staying here everytime I visit NYC.

title: Incrível mas precisa de algumas melhorias
text:
Toda a filosofia do hotel e incrível e inovadora em NY! Hotel todo sustentável, que utiliza basicamente madeira de demolição e produtos reciclados. Todo a arquitetura do hotel é comtemplativa , moderna, linda e aconchegante. A localização é ótima e tem tudo perto. Os quartos são pequenos, por isso não ha espaço para deixar malas grandes abertas, mas são aconchegantes. As camas são muito confortáveis e há na janela um delicioso sofá para relaxar e tirar belas fotos!! Café da manha ébpago a parte, mas toda a comida é orgânica e deliciosa!! Entretanto, tivemos alguns descontentamentos e decepções com o hotel : 
1) Fizemos reserva de 2 quartos pelo Booking, porém ao realizarmos o check in eles não encontraram a reserva do segundo quarto, mesmo mostrando o email de confirmação do Booking das duas reservas. Felizmente, havia apenas 1 quarto disponível ( de qualidade inferior ao que tínhamos reservado) . No sexto dia de hospedagem ( ficamos hospedados durante 10 dias) o gerente nos procurou e disse que havia achado a reserva primária, e que iria estornar o valor da terceira reserva. Foi um transtorno tudo isso!! Nunca passamos por nada parecido em nenhum hotel que nos hospedamos, e não imaginava que isso pudesse acontecer em um hotel de 5 estrelas!! Ainda bem que tinha limite no cartão para passar mais uma reserva. Resolvido a situação, nenhum "mimo", agrado , ou sinceras desculpas foi nos dada. Realmente foi decepcionante! 

2) O hotel disponibiliza carro com motorista para te levar a pequenas distancias próximo do  hotel, no entanto, isso não é falado aos hóspedes e só descobrimos no último dia da estadia, pois perguntamos sobre transfer para nos levarmos ao aeroporto. Nesse momento, por acaso, um funcionário acrescentou sobre o carro à disposição para pequenas distâncias, sendo que todos os dias perguntávamos ao concierge sobre como nos deslocaríamos a determinados locais, gastamos com Taxi e Uber e em nenhum momento foi nos informado sobre o carro incluso no valor da hospedagem.

3) Não há isolamento acústico nos quartos. Acordavamos todos os dias com muito barulho e conversas ou brigas do quarto ao lado do meu ( 1206) Me hospedei no quarto 1208 e as brigas e gritarias dos vizinhos eram insuportáveis. Foi difícil dormir certas noites.

4) A arrumação do quarto ficou a desejar 3 vezes. Um dos dias até esqueceram o pano de limpeza em cima da cama. 

5) Staffs simpáticos e atenciosos ( principalmente o concierge chamado Spencer), mas o serviço de check in e check out é demorado, fazendo filas de espera na recepção do hotel.

title: 1Hotels - Breath of Fresh Air
text:
I absolutely loved my time at 1Hotels CP. Walking into the lobby I immediately felt relaxed. The nature inspired green decor and wooden tones were a much needed break from the bright lights and city streets. I especially loved the stamps I found on several pieces that showed me where the object was originally sourced from. (If you didn't know, the entire hotel concept is based off of sustainability and repurposing.) 

From start to finish, the service was superb. We received some toasted granola at checkin from JAMs and thoroughly enjoyed it. The full service JAMs restaurant was lively for happy hour and had delicious food. The housekeeping staff were little fairies, tidying up my room throughout my stay. (Special shoutout to Emily, who helped me choose the perfect room with a window nook overlooking 58th street.) The doormen even flagged down cabs for my husband and I during the day. 

I can't recommend this hotel enough. BONUS: The entire facility smells incredible.... and you can purchase a candle with their signature scent!

title: Has it all for a hotel in New York
text: We checked in on the weekend of St Patrick and it was our first time in NYC. The rooms were very clean, design and atmosphere were very cozy and nice (especially the reading corner by the window). Although compact, the room had everything we need. Location was great: meeting points of tours are walking distance , and so are the nice restaurants of NYC. Concierge were very friendly and helpful in finding places to go out to and arranging reservations.  Definitely would return on our next trip to NYC.

title: Cozy hotel in a great location!
text: 1 Hotel Central Park is fabulous!  The staff are professional and friendly. The decor is inviting and warm. The location cannot be beat!! Check in was a breeze.  The restaurant is lovely wlthoguh we did not dine there this trip. We will be back again and again!

title: Amazing weekend away
text: Stayed at 1 Hotel Central Park for a weekend in the city.  The hotel was perfect.  We loved the atmosphere in the hotel - it was like staying in a high end eco-oasis in the middle of the city.  The staff was so friendly and helpful.  We were constantly amazing by the little details the hotel thought of - we forgot a toothbrush and the front desk sent up a bamboo toothbrush rather than the plastic toothbrush that any other hotel would have provided.  That type of attention to detail is found in every aspect of the hotel.  I highly recommend staying there!

title: Hotel med bra läge
text: Ett trevligt hotell med mysiga rum där vissa rum har fönstren som man kan sitta i och titta ut över 6:e Avenyn. Det ligger bara ett stenkast från trevliga Central Park. Trevligt bemötande i receptionen.

title: Amazing!!!!!
text: My husband and I had a fantastic night at this hotel! Loved the rustic/trendy decor, yummy scent throughout, beautiful view, prime location, and hot restaurant/bar...but the best part was Spencer Howard, the hotel’s concierge-he was extremely friendly, energetic, warm, welcoming, knowledgeable, accommodating, and fun! He really made us feel cared for, so we’ll definitely be back for another visit!

title: Friendly staff and sexy rooms
text: This hotel has the most natural, plant filled lobby in all of New York. It was amazing to walk in off the busy street and be greeted by friendly staff and the organic elements.
