From our first contact with them to try and get in last minute - (we made a switch from another hotel we booked for a wedding event) ...  to drinks at the bar, breakfast in the restaurant and big kudos to the doorman who made sure I got a cab to the airport during a crazy traffic day in midtown (Trump in the city & UN session ), - I couldn't have been more grateful. The location is awesome, Central Park, subways, and pretty much everything you might need... (but then again, it's NYC) --- to it's vibe, comfort and ambiance - I highly recommend. My fiancee and I will be back!!!! Kudos to everyone who made our stay so wonderful.

title: Hermoso hotel
text: El lobby es precioso, lleno de plantas y todo en general es material reciclado, es súper acogedor y las habitaciones son preciosas aunque muy pequeñas, para lo que pagamos por 4 noches esperaba una habitación con vista a la ciudad, nos tocó en sexto piso con vista a una pared y los aires acondicionados, demasiado ruidoso. La última noche pedí cambio de habitación ya que era muy difícil poder dormir con el ruido, el concierge fue muy amable y atento, la vista mejoró un poco pero a la próxima vez creo que elegiría el que está en Brooklyn

title: The Hotel IN NYC
text: I spent 1 week at the 1 Hotel and I loved this hotel for so many reasons. Upon the very first moments of entering felt transported through a door that leads into a tranquil tropical forest. The sense of awe and wonder continued throughout the entire space and time of my stay. The hotel itself is very modern and minimalistic which goes with it is environmentally friendly theme. The earthy modern decor is very appealing with the added bonus of being environmentally friendly. The beds are quite comfortable and the room had everything you would expect. There is careful attention to detail, lighting, and surfaces which make for very nice ambiance. The location is fantastic; just a block from a Central Park South, the Plaza Hotel and 5th Avenue. The concierge was very helpful and gave us some great suggestions as well as assisting with reservations.

title: Awesome environmentally conscience hotel
text: I walked into this hotel and loved the smells that engulfed me.  The decor is up to date with the latest look combining the outdoors with the simple contemporary lines.  It's fresh and nice to be in a hotel that's not your typically dark and heavy decor of the 'old' NY days.  Service was great and food in the restaurant was delicious. They even had a yoga mat I could use for my morning stretches.  So far this is my favorite place to stay in NY.

title: A tranquil oasis in the ‘concrete jungle’
text:
Upon the very first moments of entering 1 Hotel Central Park I felt transported through a secret door that leads into a tranquil tropical forest. The sense of awe and wonder continued throughout the entire space and time of my stay. I was grateful for a most attentive staff who seemed thrilled to be a part of this amazing hotel experience. Typically, I am indifferent about departing from a hotel, but I somehow connected with the vibe, feel and comfort of this cocoon and truly cannot imagine staying anywhere else during my next trip to NYC. Some of the details I enjoyed was the comfy window seat, which provided a view of Central Park in combination with the vibrant scenery of the intersection below. The confluence of modern design & elements of the rainforest and most comfortable bedding made my stay cozy and relaxing. The location is fantastic- just a block from a Central Park South, the Plaza Hotel and 5th Avenue shopping. I hope you will get to experience 1 Hotel Central Park for yourself. Enjoy... 
p.s. a special thank you to Lorenzo G./concierge, who was very accommodating when I had to check out just a bit past the regular check-out time and also enthusiastically told me about the 1Hotel Miami, where I most definitely hope to stay in the near future.

title: Perfecta ubicación
text: Aunque el hotel está muy bien: camas muy cómodas, buen servicio de habitaciones, moderno y limpio, lo mejor es la situación. Está en la mejor ubicación para visitar NY. Dos cosas a tener en cuenta: no dan desayunos, aunque en los alrededores hay muchos y buenos establecimiento para ello. Otra cosa, el tamaño de las habitaciones es algo reducido. Repetiremos.
